1b1(rgyud): /rtag smra du/sa mo mamam
1b2(rgyud): tA/bod srud du/'phags bya don yod zhags pa'i stong po zhes bya ba theg pa
1b3(rgyud): chen po'i mdo/'phags pa don yang zhugs pa la phyug 'tsha'o//sa s+yA
1b4(rgyud): rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal//'di skad bdag gis/
2a1(rgyud): /thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das po ta la ko'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
2a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gnas sa ma la dang /ta ma la dang /rtsom pa ka dang /mya ngan med pa dang /a ti mr-i ta ka la so
2a3(rgyud): pa mang po dang /sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par rgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong
2a4(rgyud): phrag bco brgyad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /gnas
2a5(rgyud): gtsang ma'i lho'i bu stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du byos nas mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso/
2b1(rgyud): dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshangs rnyis kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to//de nas byang chub sems
2b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan+da las longs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus
2b3(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas//zhal 'dzum par
2b4(rgyud): gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das pa dog la drin yod zhugs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba
2b5(rgyud): yid de/gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/'jig
2b6(rgyud): rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhini ge shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/
3a1(rgyud): gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang /dbapung phyug/chen po gtsor byas pa'i gan sagatsa mA
3a2(rgyud): kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po yung 'duso//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso
3a3(rgyud): zo'i ting 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do//gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu
3a4(rgyud): rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/bcom ldanAM 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshungs
3a5(rgyud): ris ga cir byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis srung ba dang //bskyab pa dang /sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro//
3a6(rgyud): gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig pa de mchod rten du 'gyur ro//sems
3b1(rgyud): can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrug khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyuraro//de bcom ldan 'das
3b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro//gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig
3b3(rgyud): po'i skyon byed pa/sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'dobs pa//dam pa'i chos la smod pa/mnar med pa la gzhol
3b4(rgyud): ba sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de/gal te 'gyod par gyur
3b5(rgyud): cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid bsnyung bar gnas pa gtsogs de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongasu dag
3b6(rgyud): cing yongasu zad par 'gyur ro//phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro//rims nyin gcig pa'am/nyin gnyis pa 'am/nyin gsum pa'am/nyin bzhi
3b7(rgyud): pa 'am de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru bo 'am/chad pa 'am/lag pa na ba 'am/rkang pa na ba'am/mgon pa 'am/ha la ha la yis brtags pa'am/
4a1(rgyud): mdze'am/rkang shu 'am/'brum bu phra mo 'am/lhog pa 'am/'bras sam/bye'u 'bras sam/grwayan pa 'am/mtshan
4a2(rgyud): ma rdol ba 'am/'brum bu 'am/brjed byed dam/khyab par na be 'am/gsod pa 'am/'ching ba 'am/rdeg pa'am/bsdigs pa 'am/mi snyan
4a3(rgyud): par brjod pa 'am/mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha 'am/sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/rmi lam ngan pa mthong ngas de'i las yongasu dag cing zad par
4a4(rgyud): 'gyu ro//sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems can dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro//gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang /
4a5(rgyud): rigs pa ni ngas ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed//gang 'dir don yod zhogs pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang /don 'dzin par byed pa
4a6(rgyud): 'chang bar byed pa/klo ge bAr byed pa/'dri bar byed pa/'dror 'jug par byed pa/kun chub par byed pa/sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par
4a7(rgyud): byed pa 'am/tha na dud 'gro'i skyo gnasu gtogs pa'i rna bug du gtugs te zlos par byed/sngags kyi cho ga 'di sems par byed pa dang /dor bai nid pa
4b1(rgyud): gzugs med pa/rnam par mi rtog pa/yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/rgyu med pa gos pa med pa/mnyam pa'i sems g.yong ba
4b2(rgyud): med pa phung po lnga dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rje su dran par bya'o//de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro//khyed
4b3(rgyud): bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro//ji snyed po tir bri bar byas nas khyim du bzhugasu gsol bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das mang po ci bya ste/phan tshun
4b4(rgyud): 'gren pas nyan pa 'am/rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/gzhan gyi rjesu 'jug pas sam/gzhon smad par bya ba'i che du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras
4b5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug byin gyis brlabasu mkhas pas shes par bya'o//de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/gang la
4b6(rgyud): la'i skyes bu'i tsin dan nam/ge bur ram/gur gum nam/gla rtsi ga nur zhing brgyad cing rdo ba 'am sa la bzhibs nas bdag nyid le byugs na/de la tsan+dan nam/
4b7(rgyud): ga bu ro ram/gur gum mam/gla rtsi ga nur ba 'am brgyad pas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyuraro//yang dri zhim po yang de nyid//bcom ldan 'das de ltar kho nar
5a1(rgyud): bdag gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang /snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la rgyu dang g.yos mchod pa de
5a2(rgyud): dag ni bcom ldan 'das rma rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de phyi ma la yang ngo //gang dang gang
5a3(rgyud): du skyes pa de dang der tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do///
5a4(rgyud): gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen name/dge bsnyen ma 'am/dI las gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod
5a5(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos brgyad la bsnyung bar gnas par byas te/lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod par yongs
5a6(rgyud): bzlas na/de la bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu them pa so sor 'dod par bya'o//nyi shu paM gang zhe na/gang de'i lus lanang mi 'byung ba dang /las kyi dab
5a7(rgyud): gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyuraro//snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dkar bar yang 'gyur ro//skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//dbang po sbub su nub pa dang /nor
5b1(rgyud): rnyed par yang 'gyur//nAr yod pa yang dran pos sbrer bar smin so//mes mi 'tshig go//rgyu mi khyer ro//rgyal ba'i yid kyis kyang 'brog par mnus//de'i las kyi mang thus pang chu/
5b2(rgyud): ro//de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur//rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byod bar mi 'gyur//lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu'am thal ba la yod du/
5b3(rgyud): bsngags te phyogs dang /mtshams dang /steng dang /'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//madrangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi
5b4(rgyud): nus so//sems canA thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//dgra yis 'jig pa byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyuraro//mi yis 'jigs par mI 'gyuraro//khyab par na pa'i 'jigs
5b5(rgyud): dang /mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur//nyon mongs pa drug po yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur//me dang nu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/
5b6(rgyud): lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar snang ba dang /sgrib pa dang /sbrid par byed par 'gyur//gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang drir byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btong snyoms dang
5b7(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro//phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sar 'dod par bya'o//gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor thob ste/brgyad po gang zhe na/'che ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras ga
6a1(rgyud): dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro//bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyuraro//mthong bar 'khrul pa med do//lag pa
6a2(rgyud): g.yob pa med do//bshang ba med de//gci ba med do//rlung gi rnam pa med do//shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyu ro//kha 'og tu bltas nas tshe'i dus
6a3(rgyud): byed par mi 'gyur ro//'chi ba'i dus nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyuraro//
6a4(rgyud): dge ba'i bshis gnyen dang 'bral par mi 'gyur ro//nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o//chang dang /sha dang /gtsong dang /sgog skyo dang /bde byed
6a5(rgyud): la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du srung bar 'dod pas de rnams spang bar bya'o//don yod zhugs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus
6a6(rgyud): sna ma myi nus shes par byas lnga nyin du gzhug par bya'o//slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri mi spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
6a7(rgyud): yin no//sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa'i phyir byang chubo sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro//shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la
6b1(rgyud): sems dpa' ni thabs te/de gnyisu drug gis sems can gyi don nyid thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rje su zlos shing snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun
6b2(rgyud): du brjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don gyi phyi ro dang /sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
6b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag lo bka' stsal pa/gong 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bapa ste/de bzhin
6b4(rgyud): gshegs pas kyang rje su yi rang ngo //phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
6b5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spun mi 'dzums por gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gson cig/sangs rgyas
6b6(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la rjesu brtse
6b7(rgyud): ba dong /skye dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /rnam par thar pa'i don gyi phyir yang ngo ////na mas+t+r-i ya d+hA a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sitwe
7a1(rgyud): ma t+ta ye/nAm AH d+h+ye ya m+b+ha Sh+ye mid+b+ha ba d+d+he sad+g+ha sad+d+hi r+m+ma na maHsu pa? tISh+NI te shr-ISh+Tin+na nAM dzAM prA su khe b+h+yasar+b+ba tIb+hU gtA b+hU Ad+he r+dz+dza/sam+b+haSh+Ta bud d+h+web+h+yaHthA ga de
7a2(rgyud): rnaMs sug smr-i pA tiSh+Thas ni tishU ra rA d+g+ha ya tAr+dz+dzakr-id+hI /rnamad+d+hi Sh+Ta gad+hA/sa d+d+hi/tu hU~M ka trU~M nA~M/na seM su
7a3(rgyud): Sh+T+ri dzAM ga~M/tASh+Tha ga d+hA ya/na maHsa m+b+ha ga shwekyA rA ng+ga ya/trAHgaid+hA yai/nim na tathAg d+hA /nAm ng+ge d+d+he /num
7a4(rgyud): tathAg tI ye/ne maHkA kuts+tshe na drA ya/tA thA ga tA yA/na man+takan kA mrinA yai/ta thA gA d+hA ya~M/na marbak+Sha shrA pA ya ta thA ga d+hA ya/namaHshAHmun ye ta d+h+r-i gA d+hA ya/
7a5(rgyud): sa myak+saM byAd+d+hA ya/tad+ya thAM/oM mu ni mun mad+h+ya mA na ye sAd+g+ha/A~M sha ye sha ma mA d+hu sha me rak+Sha dak+Sha m+b+ha sarba~M sAd+d+hi sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne sUn+ta/ni man+ta su Tha r-ik+Sha ta nA ma d+hArmA
7a6(rgyud): shr-i ye ta thA ga tI ya//na maHsa man+t+ri a wa d+h+waM sa bi dzi ta sa~M grA ma shrI ye tA thA ga tA yai/na maHin+d+ra ki tud+hA dz+re sh+tsa yai tA thA ga tA ye/na mo rat+na prASh+Ta sa~M shA ri rAdz+nyA
7b1(rgyud): Ag+h+nAHA/nA / d+hA yA k+Sha t+na k+Sha/nAsad+ga rmAm+b+han+nad+d+haHk+Sha d+hA g+sa rna byA d+hag+hA/na mrAd+harmArmA/nAm+b+ha/s+'uk+kAm+b+ha/nA s+yA A.An+ta k+sha r+m+ma t+ma/
7b2(rgyud): pa ni b+h+yo/sarba budad+d+ha \u0f7fd+d+hi sa Sh+T+r-i/ni Ti b+h+ya teHnAM/smr-i ti nAM/mai tI g+harmA ga ti bad+hAni/ti bad+ha naM/bra /prA ti dz+nyAn bar+d+ha ni/d+hun bad+hA ni/sA ma d+h+ye bad+hA /
7b3(rgyud): sh+tsanI bad+hA ni/sar+b+ba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+hamA bad+ha nI/sa~M ku la brudad+had+harma pa ri b+hu ra NI ye s+t+wa~MH/na mA rAt+natrA~M yA yaM/nA maM AR+tha A wA l-i ki ti shwe rA yAM/bo d+hi satwA yai/ma hA satwA ya~M/man+ta/
7b4(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA yaM/na mo mAtwAM s+thA mi h+lA d+h+we ya br-id+d+he satwA ya/mAr+d+he sa~Md+g+ha ya/man+tik+Sha dwe Ni kI ya~M/e b+h+yonI maskr-i tI/i daM Ar+ya.a~M pra lo ki ti shA ru mu khe de g+hISh+Ta/oM mag+na bA sha rA dzA nI ma dzad yAM/
7b5(rgyud): thA ga tA sa mA kha~M Sh+kaSh+Ti ti/min+ta taM pa ra dza~M ma~Mdz+nyo a t+ma mi d+hi nI m+me bar+t+ta ya~M Sh+Ti mo/sid dz+nyAn tu mi man+ta bai tA/sad+g+hak+ShAr+thA d+hI/sarba b+hA yai b+hU ma maM sa~Mrba sad+ha mAT+TA rAk+Sha b+hU ban+de/tAd+d+har+m+ma
7b6(rgyud): nu dra tsu dra/mar ma raM/ /mu ru mnga?/mahA kA ru NaM kA/sa ras pa seM sor/su du s+ya dr-i/tsu dra ts+tsha r+ra/d+hAd+hi/
7b7(rgyud): rab pa/hU~M hrIHs+yai/ka ka/kau zhi kr-ish+tha/ nA~M hU~M sahA/dra rbad+d+ha/ AhU~M ba~M Shi ng+ga sa/ka ka//kaN+Di
8a1(rgyud): Nu kru N+yA/pA ra ma shud d+ha sat+kA/ka ra ka rA/ka r-i kr-i ri/ku ru ku ru/ma hA sA ma prAp+tA/tsa la tsa la/sany+tsa lA swany+tsa la/bi tsa la ba tsa la/prA tsa la pra tsa la/a Ta Ta a
8a2(rgyud): Ta Ta/b+ha ra b+ha ra/b+hai ri b+hi ri/b+hu ru b+hu r+ra/ti ra ta ra/ti ri ti ri/tu ru tu ru/e h+ye hi ma hA kA rI Ni ka/ma hA pa shu pa ti be ShaM d+ha ra/d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+hi r-i d+hI ri/d+hu ru d+hu ru/ta re ta ra/
8a3(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/tsa ra tsa ra/pa ra bai ra/ba ra bar/mar ma ra/la raM la ra/ha rahA rA/d+hAdz+nyAn+ti tIt+t+raH/oMk+ShA ra pyA trA be Sha d+ha raM/d+hA ra d+hA raM/d+hI r-i d+hA dzi/d+hu ru d+ha d+yaM/ta ra tA ra/
8a4(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/tsa ra tsa ra/ya ra ya ra/ba ra ba ra/ha ra ha ra/rasmai sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI re/dz+wa la dz+wa le/te pa ta pa/b+hU sa b+hU saM/b+hU ma b+hU ma b+ha ge wanau so ma/A di t+ya/
8a5(rgyud): ya ma/ba ru Na/ku be ra/brah+men+na/bA yu/ag+ni/d+ha na da/de ba/ri Shi ga Ne a b+hu ra tsi tA tsa ra Na/su ru su ru/tsu ru tsu ru/mu ru mu ru/g+hu ru g+hu ru/sa na ta ku mA ra/
8a6(rgyud): ru dra/bA sa ba/baiSh+Ta/d+ha na daM/bA yu/ag+ni ri Shi/nA ya ka/bi nA ya ka ba hu bai bi d+ha bi Sha d+ha ra/d+ha ra d+ha ba d+hi ra d+hi r-i/d+hu ru d+hu ru/te ra ta ra/tha ra tha ra/g+ha ra g+ha ra/ya
8a7(rgyud): ra ya ra/la ra la ra/ha ra ha ra/pa ra pa ra/si ra sa ra/ba ra ba ra/ba ra dA ya ka/sa man ta a wa lo kai te/bi lo ka ti/lo ke sha ra/ma he shwa ra/tri b+hU ba naM shA ra/
8b1(rgyud): sarbagrAr+N+Na sam a lok+ShA tA/a ba lU k+Sha ta shArA/mu d+h+yam+bAd+hu/mU ru mu ru/mu ya mu ya/muny+dza muny+tsa/rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sar+b+bA sad+g+ha sh+tsa sar+b+ba b+hU ye b+hUHsar+b+ba pA drA po b+hUHsarba pa sar+b+bo d+hAH
8b2(rgyud): swarba br-i he b+h+yaHsarba byA d+hi b+h+yaHsarba bi ShAM b+h+yaHsarba dzA ro b+h+yAM/e bi/ba d+hi banA d+hA ne/tA Den/ta na/r-I dza/tiskA raM/ag+nI/ud ka/bi ShaM/shastA pa ri mo tse ko/ka Na ka Na/kiN+Do ka
8b3(rgyud): Ni/ku Nu kuM N+ya/tsa rI tsa rau/tsi re tsI ri/tsu ru tsu ru/aun+d+ra ya/ba la/bo d+h+yaM gaM/tsa tur ar+ya satwa saM pra kA shwa kA/ta pa ti ba/tam tam/dam da ma/sa ma sa ma?/mA sa ma sa/d+hA
8b4(rgyud): mAd+h+ya ma?/mo hAM kA ru Ni ka/mat+ta tu mo an d+hA k+She ra bi d+hi ma~M na/ShA Ta pA ra mi twA pa rI pU ra ka/mA la ma le/mi li mi li/mU lu mu lu/Ta Ta Ta Ta/dzAThA d+hA ThA/Ti Ti Ti Ti/Tu Tu Tuma?//
8b5(rgyud): tr-iShIr+the/thu Tu dz+r-i dz+ra/e na ya tsar+m+ma kri ta pa ri ka ra/e h+ye ti ma dI ka ru Ni kAM/I shI ra/ma he shwa ra/ma hA b+hU ta ga NA si b+hAny+dza k+Sha/ka rI ke rA/ki ri ki raM/ku ru kA ru/pi ri bI ra/
8b6(rgyud): ha rA ha ra/be ra ba ra/sa ra sa ra/me ra ma rA/ka ra ka ra/ka Te ka Ta/ki Ti ki TaM/ku Tu ku Tu/ma Ta ma Te/ma hA bi shud d+hi bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ma hA kA ru Ni kau shI ta yadz+nyA u/
8b7(rgyud): pa b+h+ri ka/rat+namu kuT/mA lA d+hA ra/sarba dz+nyA shir/saM kri ta dzaT mu kuT/mi hA ed b+hU ti/ki ma la a le kr-i ta ke ra la ti/d+hAn/sa mA d+hi/bi mak+Sha oM pra kam+b+ha/ba dz+ra sid+d+hi/
9a1(rgyud): san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ma hA kU ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/sarba d+hA d+hA na pa ri pU ra kA/sarba b+hU d+hi pa ra ma tsa ka/sarba satwa a shra pa ri pU ra ka/sarba/
9a2(rgyud): satwa swa mA shA sa ka ra na maHstu ti swA hA/a mi g+hA ya swA hA/a me g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/a dzi tA ye swA hA/e pi rA dzi tA ya swA hA/a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/a mi tA b+ha su trA ya swA hA/
9a3(rgyud): mA ra sai n+ya pr-i marda nA ya swAhA/a b+hi yA ya swA hI/a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/dzA yAM ya swA hA/bi dza yA ya swA hA/dza ye bi dza yA ya swA hA/bai ra dA ya swA hA/ba re pra dA ya swA hA/
9a4(rgyud): e kA la mIr+t+ta pra shA ma nA ya~M swAt+ma/oM dany+tsa maM karma ku ru na mo stu tI swA tAM/oM ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT swAt+ta/oM dzaM yA hUM phaT sAt+ma/a~M dz+r-i dz+r-i dz+r-i swA hU~M/oM hUM dzA ya swA hA/oMhrI
9a5(rgyud): lo kya bi dza ya e mo g+ha pA sha a pa ti ha ta hriHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/oM baM su pa ti swA hA/oM A ro laM ka swA hA/oM be tu le bi hu le swA hA/oM I ro li ka hrIHhrIHhUM phaT swA hA/
9a6(rgyud): ni ya ta a ni ya ta be dA nI ya a shre b+ha s+ya maM b+ha ga wi na karmaM Ne a shre Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru sA hA/oM pad+me hastA ya sAhA/oM bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swAhA/bklegs pasi las/
9a7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub pa yin no//dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyu ro//las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
9b1(rgyud): a ga ru'i bdug spos dang /thal ba dang /chu dang /yungs kar dang /seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo //rims nad thams cad la srung skung bcing bar/
9b2(rgyud): bya'o//nad thams cad la ma ra ram/mar nag gam/chu la yongasu bzlas te sbyin par bya'o//lus las khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas bcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o//ljon
9b3(rgyud): bo la cha chus nyams par byed pa 'am/'jim bag gam/chus kyang bya'o//mig gi nad la skud pa dkor po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o//so'i nadA la ka ra bi ro'i so shing
9b4(rgyud): giso//mtshams bcing ba la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongasu bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir
9b5(rgyud): gdab par byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no//thams cad du srung skud dam//chu 'am/thal bas bya'o//bza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o//
9b6(rgyud): rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o//sbrul dang /srin bu dang /ba s+phu byi ba dang /lhog pa dang /gre ba 'gags pa rnams la spring rtsi po pi ling dang ldan//
9b7(rgyud): pas bya'o//mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/rgya skyegs kyi chu'am/sbrang rtsi'amo/shing mngar gyis bya'o//rtsod pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa dang /mi snyan par brjod pa la
10a1(rgyud): chu la yongasu bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o//yul gzhan gyi rgyal ba'i 'tsho ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas gtsang mas
10a2(rgyud): gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur//de yi chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sems can thams cad srung ba yin no//nye bar
10a3(rgyud): che ba thams cad dang /yams rnams zhi ba yin no//phyag rgya tsan dan gyi thig lI la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongasu bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do//
10a4(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas na khyim srung ba'o//pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad kyi srung ba'o//tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis bza' dang /'byung po dang /rgyu skar thams cad las
10a5(rgyud): srung ba'o//rgyal ba dang /rnam par rgyal ba dang /gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /na guM li dang /dri'i na gu li dang /d+hA ra nI dang /mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang /dbang po'i lag
10a6(rgyud): pa dang /dri'i pri yang ku dang /ta ka ra dang /'khor lo dang /'khor lo chen po dang /rnam par gnon pa dang /so ma rA dzi dang /su nad dra zhes bya ba ste/de dag gang yang rung
10a7(rgyud): ba la brgya rtse brgyad kyi bar du yongasu bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang /dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o//byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o//bud med rnams
10b1(rgyud): dus skya ba sman du shAng+gAn chug tu sbrul du dang ldan par byed //g.yang med pa nyams nas bu la gyur ro//nur bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du spyad du byas pa yin na//drug
10b2(rgyud): dang mes mi tshugs//dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur//bza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//rlung dang sprin dang thog ni chus ra
10b3(rgyud): par byed do//ka ra bi ra'i lcug mos ni las thams cad byed do//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams
10b4(rgyud): byed do//de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon snam lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i
10b5(rgyud): cod pa nu 'chung bar dgas kyi lpags pas smad dkris byis shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chung brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o//lha bzla mkhan gza sbyong dang ldan
10b6(rgyud): pas ri mar bri bar bye'o//de nas rtsub pa pos mu gzugs de'i dun du ba lang gi m+b+hi bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar ba pokram dri zhim pa'i rgyus bku pa'i
10b7(rgyud): pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o//nye ba'i spyod pa brgyad dang /nye bar me 'i'i drug nu rtsa bzhi dang /khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o//a ga ru'i bdug sbas bsre/
11a1(rgyud): la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o//nyon zhag gcig du bsnyung bar gnas pa 'am/dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas
11a2(rgyud): gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o//de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyuraro//ji srid du 'phags pa
11a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do//lding ros sam mig sman la yongasu bzlas te mig la bskus na de nas mi
11a4(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur zhing na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro//yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo//sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de
11a5(rgyud): 'dis byed do zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
11a6(rgyud): phyag dang /dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i
11a7(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcomo ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
11b1(rgyud): rdzogs so///rgyu gar gyi mkhan pa am+b+ha g+hA badz+ra dang /bad kyi mats+tsha ba dge slong rin chen grags byas bsgyur ning zhus te gtan la phab ba'o//
11b2(rgyud): dpal lha ma sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur//mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa
11b3(rgyud): yi//shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la sgrub su mchi//phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma//'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shes//drang srong rig
11b4(rgyud): gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs//de ni spyod pa rgya tshon rnams las byung //sems can don phyir phrin las chen po'i khur//spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad//
11b5(rgyud): sa dad pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas//dge ba'i tsho gros brtan yid bzhin la su bsgyur//zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyus//thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig
11b6(rgyud): byed pa//duso ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs//de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud//byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma//lha mo mchog
11b7(rgyud): de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes//ther tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags//shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang //rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi
12a1(rgyud): bdag/'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la//sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyon mchog pas//mu su tog go ba rnams kun kyang mdud//yan//
12a2(rgyud): lag rnam par 'byas shing gsungs snyan pa//yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings//rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa//blo myur tshig 'ching skabs
12a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog stsol cig/sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa//mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs//thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang //
12a4(rgyud): dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs//'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun//sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te//phan tshun shes shing
12a5(rgyud): yang dag brda sprad pa'ang //dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab//gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa//dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen
12a6(rgyud): can//lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang //yid 'ong smras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed//byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mes//bdag dang gan
12a7(rgyud): don phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i//lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la//bcom ldan 'das mas rtog tu don mchog stsol//bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub
12b1(rgyud): lam brtson dang //lce yi dbang po dag rnying tshig btsun la//rig pa'i gter ldan sgra la thogs med dang //bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub du gsol//rig pa'i yum gyi
12b2(rgyud): rang bzhin rtog las dben//snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyed//mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar//mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan
12b3(rgyud): gting mtha' med//na mo b+ha ga pa te/prah+ma Ne/na maHsa ra swa t+yai da~M bi sid d+hAn+t+ra man+to pA da taM brad+d+hA nu man+t+ri swAhA//dpal lha ma sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogaso////rgya gar skad
12b4(rgyud): du/Ar+ya shrI ma hU~M de bi byA ka ra Na/bod skad du/'phags pa lha ma chen mo dpal lung ba ston pa/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//
12b5(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b6(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
12b7(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /byang chub
13a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa'
13a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /
13a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang /'jig rten
13a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
13a5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhun
13a6(rgyud): so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
13a7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song stau byin nas/bcom ldan
13b1(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang mgo bos
13b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas rgyun cing /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongasu bskor te/brgya
13b3(rgyud): byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngagaso//lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas/tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub
13b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/blon po 'am/dge
13b5(rgyud): slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen mo 'am/bram ze 'am/rgyal rigs sam/rje'u rigs sam/dmang rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal
13b6(rgyud): gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na/rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang /sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang /yan+da/
13b7(rgyud): kyi nad gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang /g.yo can dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/nor dang /'bru dang //
14a1(rgyud): mdzod dang /bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro//rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas byung
14a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legaso//legs so//
14a3(rgyud): legs te/gang dag lha mo chen no//dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang /thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang /phan yon ni de dag lagaso//de
14a4(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
14a5(rgyud): 'das lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i
14a6(rgyud): klung gi bye ma rnyed lnga dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba
14a7(rgyud): ni/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me togo yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
14b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i
14b2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'brel ba dang /'grub par byed pa dang /rtag tu rje su 'brang ba yin te/de dag ni 'dir lha mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang /sdig pa thams
14b3(rgyud): cad sel ba dang /nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang /lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang /nor dang /'bru rnams 'dra zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang //
14b4(rgyud): dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad
14b5(rgyud): 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang /yams kyi nod dang gnod pa dang /'thab pa dang /'khrug pa dang /'gyed pa dang /rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa
14b6(rgyud): dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub por byed pa'o//'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon/
14b7(rgyud): tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra
15a1(rgyud): shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa can dun gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs
15a2(rgyud): pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin
15a3(rgyud): gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gash+ye
15a4(rgyud): pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das
15a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongasu brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag
15a6(rgyud): 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dang l-I la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs
15a7(rgyud): nga'i dpal la phyag 'tshal//de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gsor mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag
15b1(rgyud): b+hUmAstu ts+tsha /da sa phyug n+d+hal//de bzhin gshegs pa shrIs rab dz+nyAnA mA glang sna med pa'i rangs tog gi dang lal+lA drug 'phrul lo//de bzhin gshegs pa srung
15b2(rgyud): med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs po tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i
15b3(rgyud): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa thob mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
15b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i sgron ma 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa
15b5(rgyud): spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug
15b6(rgyud): sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tsha lo//de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal lo phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po
15b7(rgyud): lhor skyes pa'i dpal lo phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'bro rgyu
16a1(rgyud): mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa sman lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen
16a2(rgyud): po'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dbul
16a3(rgyud): la phyug 'tsha'o//de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad spyod pa'i dang tshul phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs bzhi pa 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tsha'o//
16a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal l-i phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim g+hor byas te/btsung bar bya'o//
16a5(rgyud): bklags par bya'o//de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 'gyu ro//lha mo tshon mo dpal de bzhin gshegs
16a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis lung bsnun te/lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches rgyun pa zhes par de bzhin
16a7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal ni bu ngan po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jog rten gyi khams de yang
16b1(rgyud): na pan sna chags kyis rtun par 'gyuraro//'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/'jig rten gyi khams don gnas dran
16b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang lis 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur//na mkha' lIm+b+hi kyang sangs rgyas dpe chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sku 'byung bar 'gyur//
16b3(rgyud): songs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po dag los skye bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan te//de la ming po
16b4(rgyud): rtswa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbade phyug lha motshan ma dpal gyi ming rnam par
16b5(rgyud): nyon cig/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/lha
16b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ma/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgya sa thams
16b7(rgyud): cad kyi dpal dang tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/gnas thams cad yod po'i dpal/lha
17a1(rgyud): dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mri 'am ci dang /sto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/rigs sdug smra/
17a2(rgyud): 'chang dang /lag na rdo rje dang /rdo rje 'tshong thams cad kyi dpal/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /lnga'i dpal/gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpa'o//
17a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i bu 'am/yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal bkra shis ma/sems can gyi mo/rnam par rgyal me/gang ga ma/mu stegs thams cad me/bkra shis thams cud
17a4(rgyud): ma/dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/rgyags byed ma/zla ba'i dpal/nyi ma'i dpal/gza' thams cad kyi dpal/seng ge la zhon
17a5(rgyud): ma/pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bka be ma/pad+ma/pad+ma las byung ma/pad+ma la gau nas ma/pad+ma 'dzin ma/pad+ma dang ldan ma/rin po che 'od 'bar bya'i phreng ba du ma dang
17a6(rgyud): ldan mA/nor sbyin ma/dkar mo/dkar mo chen mo/lig dker+ya ma/bkri shis thams cad 'dzin ma/bsod nu mes thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/shes
17a7(rgyud): nyin gyi bu mo log pa 'bum ldan me/mig 'bum ldan ma/mgo 'bum ldan ma/nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/gzugs bzang ma/kun
17b1(rgyud): b+h+yo ga drug sa can ma/blugasu ma/shin tu glags na/shrIm+b+ha/skyon 'du A g+sa cung ma/zla ba ltar mdzes ma/dgam/dge byengs/sems can thams cad la mngan du
17b2(rgyud): phyogs pa'i dpalnga/'phags pa me tog go dpal me tog gi dbang phyugI ma/rang rgyal pa de rab thams cad kyi dpel/chu klung dang /mtsho rnams cad kyi dang le/chung skye
17b3(rgyud): mtsha thams cad kyi dngul/mu stegs thams cad mngon du byugs pa'i dpal/sprin dang / dang nags che lha dang /nar dang /'bru rnams cad kyi dpal/gsu na
17b4(rgyud): mA/zas dang sgom sbyin ma/'dugs lam/snang ma/lus gtsang ma/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/lce'i tshogs thams cad la mngon rje
17b5(rgyud): phyogs kyi dngal/gshin rje dang /rmu k+ta da /lus dran dang /bad+ma byin la sogs pa'i dpal/sbyin byed mo/longs spyod ma/gni brji dum/gzi brdadu ldan mi
17b6(rgyud): phun sum tshogs ma/'byor pa ma/rnam par 'phel ma/mthong ma/chos kyi dpal ma/khyab 'jug lo rte nA mA/ku mu da la gnas ma/gnod sbyin ma/bzod sbyin ma/
17b7(rgyud): mthu la gyi gnas ma dge byed dang bkri shas thams cad kyi lag ldan mo/bkra ma shes pa thams cad 'jig byed me/bsod nams rjems cad byung pa'i sa/
18a1(rgyud): sa thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/'byung po dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /yi dwags
18a2(rgyud): dang /sha za dang /grul bum dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/lha'i gnas dang /lha thams cad kyi dpal/bzlas brjod dang /bzlas brjod du bya ba dang /sbyin
18a3(rgyud): sreg dang /sbyin bsreg du bya ba dang /bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/'od ldan ma/mchog dga' ma/skal pas 'gyur ma/drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod
18a4(rgyud): pa'i dpal/bud med thams cad kyi gnas kun gyi gtso mo dpal gyi mchog/mi 'am ci mo thams cad dang /lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/kha na ma tho ba
18a5(rgyud): med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/yid 'ong ma/sim byed ma/lus ngan la sdug ma/chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol
18a6(rgyud): cig/thar par mdzod cig/bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hUM/oM gang ga sarba tiR+Sha mu khe swA hA/oM sarba bi tre swA hA/
18a7(rgyud): sarba me ga la d+hA ra Ni swAh+ma/tsa tu ra be da sarba nak+Sha tra gA hA ga tA ga/nA d+hA mUrta ye swAhA/brad+d+hA ya swA hA/biSh+Nu ye swAhA/ru drA ya swA hA/bi shA mu khA ya swA hAM/oM gri ni glin sarba tAH
18b1(rgyud): nA/na m+b+ha sU /dweshA/ shUm+b+ha/ s+'uk+Sha sma/d+hanAd+d+haH/s+yAkaN+DaHAH/sar+b+ba du d+d+ham+b+har+b+ba/ kaHb+h+ya.Am+b+ha/swAHm+mu thA ga swAH/
18b2(rgyud): oM lin+d+ra pra sha maHswAd+d+ha/sarba ta thA ga ta e b+hI Sh+TaM ka yau s+yAt+tha/sarba daM ba tau A b+hI mu kho shI yai a yur po la~M pat+ta ki ra ye sItA/sarba bitet+ta mAM ga l+ya hastA ya swAh+na/sig
18b3(rgyud): ba ha ni ni swA hA/pad+ma saM b+hu ta yo swA hA/sarba kr-i ti ka kho rda bai nI sha ne swAhA//'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming /nyes
18b4(rgyud): sdig thams cad med par byed pa/sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa//
18b5(rgyud): dpel dang /bde ba dang /skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshon 'di dag 'chang ba dang /klog par byed pa des nang
18b6(rgyud): par langs te gtsang bar byas la/sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsan den gyi bdug pa phul te/bklags
18b7(rgyud): na des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/bde ba dang /yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /spang po byed
19a1(rgyud): par 'gyur/de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa'
19a2(rgyud): 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /lha mo chen mo dpal da dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar
19a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzog s+ho///
19a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya ma hA shra yAHsUtra/bod skad du/'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//
19a5(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugaso//de nas byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
19a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das lo bskor
19a7(rgyud): ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
19b1(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bstun nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/de ma yin pa gzhan//
19b2(rgyud): yang rung ste/gang gis shes pa dang /gang la la 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /'dri ba dang /'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul por te phyug por 'gyu ro//de nas 'byung
19b3(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta
19b4(rgyud): ste/dpal ldan ma/bkra shI saM ma/pad+ma'i phreng ba tsan+da/nor g+hi bdag mo//dkar mo/glegs pa chen mo/pad+ma'i spyan/'od chen mo/byed pa mo/zasu sbyin ma/rin
19b5(rgyud): paM che rab tu sbyin ma/dpal chen mo/s+yA di ya thai danra/dzi ni/g+h+ri NaM/sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/sha shi nI/a lak+Sh+mI Ni/me nI sho ya/sid d+han+na me man+tau pa dAHsA hA/a b+h+r-i ku TI pa ra
19b6(rgyud): mya su b+hA gai swA hA//lanA gsum du brjod pararu bya ste/gang la la dus gsum du 'don pu de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyu ro//skal pa bzang
19b7(rgyud): po dang ldan par 'gyuraro//'byor pa zad mi shos par 'gyur ro//mi dang phyed du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad pa byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur
20a1(rgyud): te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do//rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs
20a2(rgyud): par 'gyur la/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
20a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogaso//
20a4(rgyud): rgya gor gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tri dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa////dpal gyi lha mo mtshan bcu gnyis pa///dkon mchog
20a5(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshalo//'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo//dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis/
20a6(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom
20a7(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas//bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
20b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po dpal lha mtshan mo yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der song ste/drung du phyin+da nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig/
20b2(rgyud): tu 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
20b3(rgyud): dge slong ngam/dge slong me 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te 'chang ba dang /klog
20b4(rgyud): pa dang /sgrub par byed pa dang /brjod par byed na de dbul ba spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyuraro//de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur
20b5(rgyud): cig ces smai so//dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis 'di lta ste/bkra shis ma/dpal ldan ma/pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma/nor bdag ma/dkar sha ma ma/grags chen ma
20b6(rgyud): pad+ma spyan mnga' ma/'od chen ma/byed pa mo/zas sbyin ma/rinr-i chen 'odi ldan ma/dpal chen mo ma/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshulo//spyan ras gzigs dbang
20b7(rgyud): phyaphyug lo phyag 'tshalo//dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo//'di lta ste/dzi ne/b+hU ni/dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad me/si mi si mi/ni mo ni mi/bdag gi mi
21a1(rgyud): /sa pa ga sma par 'du na grwa swA//bcoMms dus kyis / b+h+ya sgyus pA nga/b+h+ya ba sa snang pa sem sa n+d+ha/
21a2(rgyud): smya gzigs dpang rgya kyim ldan 'dus kyis /la sa man par dag // la man /
21a3(rgyud): mkhan pa dzi na mit+ta dang /rgyurkyen gyi lo ts+tsha ba b+hen+te ye shes rjes bsgyur cing gus twAM gtan la phab pa//t+yA grwar skad du/Ar+yA bAdz+nyA pA tA la nA mat+pan+d+ha rA /bod nang
21a4(rgyud): du/'phags pa rjes tog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/zlu ma nga 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal//'di skad bdag gisuM b+hAs p+ta dus gci ga n+ta/bcom ldan
21a5(rgyud): 'das mnyan yod kyi gtsug la'o khang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag byed
21a6(rgyud): dang bcu gsum dang /tshogs dang /byang chub snyoms dpa'i dge 'dun dang thobs gcig tu bzhugs pa l+yA m+b+ha ste/byang chub sems dang dri ma mad
21a7(rgyud): bye byas dang /byang chub sems dpa' bas ma byas mi khyab pa'i bya gros dang /bya gas thams cid po dang /bla gros 'phel ba dang /'jig rten gsum rnam pa
21b1(rgyud): gnon pa'i blo gros dang /namakha'i mdzod dang /kun tu bzang po dang /'jam dpal gzhon nu 'gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' slong mod kyi bu dang /mi rngub sgrol dang /byung /
21b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu drug dang /nyan thos kying dgi 'dun
21b3(rgyud): la 'di lta ste/rab 'byor dang /ka t+ya'i bu dang /'od srung dang /lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /glang po'i mchod rten dang /sha
21b4(rgyud): radwa ti'i bu dang /de dag la sogs pa nyan thos stong phrag nyi shu r+Na brgyud kyi sde bcom ldan 'das la yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te bzhugs//gzhan yang lha dang /
21b5(rgyud): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mI 'am ci dang /ci'i skyes bu dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang du chos
21b6(rgyud): nyan pa'i phyir lhag so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/dri ma med pa'i
21b7(rgyud): blo gros khyod kyis shar gyi phyogs kyi snang ba chen po 'di mthong ngam/de nas byang chub sems dpe' dri ma med pa'i blo gros stan las langs te blo gos phrag pa gcig
22a1(rgyud): tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sA la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi byos mngon par btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
22a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so//shwar phyogs kyi ngos kyi snang ba shin tu chen po yongasu 'phro ba 'dri 'tshal lags na/bcom ldan 'das
22a3(rgyud): 'di lta bu'i snang ba 'di ci lags/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
22a4(rgyud): 'od chen po 'di sus bgyis pa bka' stsal du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis cung zad bzhad pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa'
22a5(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dri ma med pa'i blo gros 'dir byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang tshim pas rang gi reg pa'i tshogs
22a6(rgyud): kyis yongasu bskor zhing /gzhan yang lha ma yin dang /srin po dang /sha za dang /'byung po stong phrag rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'khor gyi
22a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pa'i snang ba yin no//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje de nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil
22b1(rgyud): 'khor der phyin par gyur to//phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogasra gcig tu 'khod do//
22b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod par mkhyen nas mkhyen bzhin du dgyes shing rangs pas yongasu dris pa/lag na rdo rje galo ti nga'i thad du cung zad gleng /
22b3(rgyud): bAr 'dod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pas gdon mi za bar rtogs par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das
22b4(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas/de nas yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
22b5(rgyud): la rnam par bltas nas dI phab ste/cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 'khod par gzigs nas 'di skad ces
22b6(rgyud): bka' stsal to//rig pa'i rgyal po dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol tu gnon pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'khor thams cad spro ba'i sems gyur pas cang mi smra bar
22b7(rgyud): 'khod kyis smros shig smros shig /dend ces bka' stsal pa dang /lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su gnang ni sa
23a1(rgyud): bdag g+hu m+ba yin gyi dbang po gzhan len zhes bya ba sna nye bar bos te/lA ma yin b+hI 'khor rnon pos yongasu bkor nas rang gi kun sumatshos//bcom
23a2(rgyud): ldan 'das gnas der bdag gis sngon ma 'tshal ba'i khang pa dang /sgo dang rta babasdu dang /pang thog dang /phyir dang /mtsho dang /mtshe'u dang /rje dang /khron pa dang /
23a3(rgyud): sgra dang /sgra gseng rnams mthong lagaso//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting 'dzin gyi khyad par gang gis kyang sngon ma 'tshal te/bdag gis de'i rnam par rnal 'byor
23a4(rgyud): pas bsam gtan mchog la mnyam par bzhag lag so//der lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis bdag la bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med cing bsam gyis
23a5(rgyud): me khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang stobs dang rnam par rol pas na mkha' khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba/'jig rten gsum lngas rnam par rgyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
23a6(rgyud): ci'i phyir bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par gyur/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gnas khang na nyams mi dga' ba cung zad kyang ma mtshos na/gang gi don du
23a7(rgyud): bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa lags par bka' stsal du gsol zhes mchi'o//de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po des sgyu ma thams cad dang /'khrul 'khor dang /
23b1(rgyud): zlogs pa sogs pa gleng lags//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir snang ba chen po badzin par nga rdzon po chen par rjes 'oganas brgyad
23b2(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor thams cad kyi bla ma'i bla mar gyur pa/'khrul 'khor brgya rtsa brgyud po thams cad 'joms par byed pa/nye bar zhi bar byed pa/ltung bar byed pa/nges
23b3(rgyud): par 'joms par bya shwad lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rje su mkhyen no//bdag gis dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bshad pa dang /skye bo mang po la bon pa dang /bde
23b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar bac+doMs phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tham la sems can skyabs med pa rnams zhi ba dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
23b5(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor brgya rtse ba rgyud po thams cad 'joms pa'i rdo rje sa 'og ces bya bo 'khrul 'khor thams cad kyi bla ma'i bla ma bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o//don sa bcom
23b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis log na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje smras pa 'di srog chags rnams kyis sgrub par dka'o//lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/bcom
23b7(rgyud): ldan 'das brjod pa 'di sgrub par dka' ba ma lags kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pas rjesu gnang ba mdzad du
24a1(rgyud): gsol/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgrub par dka' ba brjod par mi bgyi'o//lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyi 'khrul 'khor bde blag tu sgrub
24a2(rgyud): par byed pa de dag gis rje su dran te bshad par bgyi lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis dri bdag la rje su gnang ba mdzad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
24a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad cesra bka' stsal to//ngas rje su gnang gis khyod kyis rje su shod cig/lag na rdo rje skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la
24a4(rgyud): bde ba dang /thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gsang ba chen po ston cig/
24a5(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su gnang nas ca co'i sgra yang dang yang du phyung nas/rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
24a6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/N+Do r+d+he sa 'og gi bresang sngags smras pa/na mo rat+na t+yA yU yA/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma dU yak+Sha se nA pa ta yo/oM hrIHpo tI badz+ri pA tA lud+d+hA nA ma/
24a7(rgyud): b+hU b+hin+d+he pA ta ya mA tsi rim badz+ra kI d+hA hU~M phaT/de nas rje rje khro'i chen pos kun 'od zer gyis snang bar byis te/sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug dru g.yos so// me yin rdo
24b1(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams rdo rje khro bos gzar byas skyabs med par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas
24b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces smra zhing 'dud par byed de//bcom ldan 'das bdag srung du gsal/bde bar gshegs pa yongasu bskyed du gsal/rdo rje khro bos bdag cag yongasu gzir to//
24b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bo 'odi bshad pas bdeg cag gi khang po rnams kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams med par gyur/sgo gtan rnams med par gyur/sgo rnams grol bar
24b4(rgyud): gyur to//bcom ldan 'das me byung ba'i sems can rnams kyang byung bar gyur te//bcom ldan 'das 'dir ji ltar gnas par bgyi bka' stsal du gsol/bcom ldan
24b5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs pa dag mu 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig la mnos cig/de ltan bde ba la gnas pa 'gyur//de nas
24b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la gzigs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje lha ma yin gyi dbang po la sngags pa la rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig ston par
24b7(rgyud): la bde bar gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /phyag na rdo rjes lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi chung ma dag la bka' stsal pa/'dir
25a1(rgyud): thog mar rdo rjes 'og gi khra ba chen po'i sa 'og gi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la gang 'jug pa de dgu 'dir 'khrul 'khor chen pa bla ma'i rtsi sman dang /phye ma
25a2(rgyud): dang /rtsa ba dang /sbyar sman dang /grub pa'i rdzas dang /dngul chu dang /bcud len dang /gzhon nu ma dang /lha ma yin gyi bu ga dang /sgor 'jug pa dang /'khrul 'khor thams
25a3(rgyud): cad 'joms pa dang /snyoms par byed pa de dag ni 'jug ngogs bde bar 'gyu ro//gzhan du ni de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir sa 'og gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug par
25a4(rgyud): bya'o//lha ma yin rnams la bka' stsol pa/bu gar 'jug nus pa dang /bya ba'i rgyud kyi khams dang /gser 'gyur dang /dug sman dang /sa 'og dang /zhing gi dngos grub dag
25a5(rgyud): rong nyid kyi khang par 'jug pa ltar rdo rje'i bye brag gis 'grub par 'gyuraro//zhes nga smra'o//gzhan du na dkyil 'khor ma mthong na nyams par 'gyuraro//rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po
25a6(rgyud): 'dir rang nyid kyi rtog pa dang /rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i sgrub pa'i thubs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mi bye la/rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga 'dod pas bsgrub par mi bya'o//de skad ces
25a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang /lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po dga' zhing rangs te rab tu tshim pa dang mgu bo skyes nas rang nyid kyis phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas nges par
25b1(rgyud): byung byu s+ya//cos ldan 'das thams da kyi b+h+ya gyur//de nas ban pa ldan 'das byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' rgyun po phyugan rdo rjes lce'i mig gis
25b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas dam chog gi dkyil 'khor bka' skyel pa/grong de ma grong khyer gyi sa'i phyogs legs par brtags nas dbang ldan
25b3(rgyud): phyogs nas brnams te rdo dang /gseg ma dang /rus pa dor nas rgyu skar dge ba la rjesu 'thun pa'i mtshon rtsi lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/khru bzhi bsgo 'i
25b4(rgyud): pa drug pa can yang dag par bri bar bya'o//sgo dang sgra'i mtshams rnams rdo rje dring yungs kar bzhag par bya'o//shar phyogs kyi char sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o//
25b5(rgyud): byung du 'jig rten dbang phyug/lhor rdorje/chung /nub tu chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyu mchog gi rgyu la mtshan can no//dbang ldan du dri ma med pa'i blo gros lag par rdu la ba 'din
25b6(rgyud): bya'o//mer skyong ba'o//lus ngan du rje su spyod pa'o//rlung du las thams cad pa'o//dbus su rdo rjes 'og lag par rdo rje dang dgra ste 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o//snying po dang rjes su
25b7(rgyud): spyod pa la dbyig gu dang tho ba bri bar bya'o//las thams cad pal rdo rje'o//shar gyi sgor sman thams cad dang /rgyan thams cad dang /dngul chu dang /bcud len dang /
26a1(rgyud): mA yin gyi bu mo dang /grub pa'i rdzas la sogs pa dang /smig sman dang /ldong rlos dang /ral pri dang /rin po che sngon du 'gro ba bzhag par bya'o//
26a2(rgyud): sgor lta ma yin brgyad ni stobs can dang /stobs can gyi bu dpya bde mchog dang /thag zangs ris dang /bde ldan dang /dus kyi mu khyud dang /gzhan ldan drang /dbyig
26a3(rgyud): za'o//nub kyi sgor 'khrul 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag par bya'o//de'ang brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri s+t+waM/srad bu dang /gri gug dang /bud med dang /seng ge dang /lug
26a4(rgyud): dang /mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu dang /chu rgyun dang /sbyin dang /mdo la dang /bdag nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor rnamaso//byang gi sgur bu ga brgyad pa dang bcas pa bri ste/de la
26a5(rgyud): lug gi rnam pa dang /chu srin gyi rnam pa dang /glang po'i gdong gi rnam pa dang /lto 'phye'i rnam pa dang /byi ba'i rnam pa dang /mi'i gdong gi rnam pa dang /dkyil 'khor gyi
26a6(rgyud): rnam pa dang /ma byas pa'i gdong gi rnam pa'o//stegs bu'i mtshamapa rnamasu sgo bral bzhi bri bar bya'o//me'i phyogasu ma'i thab khung ngo //bden bral du bdug spos
26a7(rgyud): kyi thab khung ngo //rlung gi mtshams rnams rba'i thab khung ngo //dbang ldan du rus sbrul bzhag par bya'o//de nas dri thams cad dang /me tog thams cad dang /bdug
26b1(rgyud): pathams cad dang /'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mA dang /mchod pa ston par bya'o//de nas skyes bu dpa' bo dag gi dri zhim byos yan lhag byugs la shin du phra ba'i ras kyis
26b2(rgyud): gdong ga phyogs te bsrung ba byas la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma'i bya ba byas la 'jug par bya'o//spyan drang ba dang gshegasu gsol ba la sogs pa'i sgonas so//'dir rdul
26b3(rgyud): mtshan gyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bsnun par bya'i//dro lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skyes bung pa'i bu de la bla mas rje su gnang ba byin la dam tshig shes pas 'khrul
26b4(rgyud): 'khor gyi bla mo'i phyag rgya 'am/lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya bcings pas dbang du byed par 'gyur ro//lha ma yin gyi chung ma dang khyim rnams 'jug par 'gyur ro//gzhan
26b5(rgyud): len gyi byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad los khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzas rnams dbang du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje
26b6(rgyud): sa 'og gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o///de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya dang stegasu gyur pa ni ser mo phan tshun khu tshur du byas la mthe bong sprul
26b7(rgyud): mgo'i rnam pa ltar byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o//sngags na dzi na jig/gnyen gyi phyogasu pad ma'i rigs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya
27a1(rgyud): dang sngags ni A ro li ka/lho phyogasu rat+na d+h+r-i kA/byang phyog du pad+ma d+h+r-ika/rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni badz+ra d+hAka/mthe chung dang /ming med sbyar la rtse
27a2(rgyud): gcig tu byas pa la bsngags mdzub bzhag po ni rdo rje sa ga gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//sngags ni na mo rat+na tra yAM ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/oM hriHpo tri badz+ra
27a3(rgyud): pA tA la d+ha nA ma tha b+hany+dza prA tA ya/mA tsi re badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya lus thams cad byin gyis brlab po//phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las ming med kyi rtse mo sbyar la mthe chung sbas
27a4(rgyud): te gung mo dang mthe bo'i rtse sbyar la g.yon pa'i mdzub mos phyi nas bkug ste/g.yas pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam pa ltar bskum pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas pa'i log pa dang g.yon
27a5(rgyud): pa'i lag pa mnyam par gzhag la mthe bo dang mdzub mo sbar te/g.yas pa'i mthe bos sor mo gsum gyi sen mo bka ba la mnyam par mdzub mo g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i rtse bar sbyar ba ni
27a6(rgyud): zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa la'o//oM bi b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT swAhA//snying khar ro//oM badz+ra pA tA la hUM phaT/spyi bor ro/oM haHbadz+ra hUM phaT/spyi gtsug go/oM hrI/ban+d+ha/
27a7(rgyud): ban+d+ha swA hA/go cha'o//oM badz+ra badz+ra sa twa shre shi ra se dzA yi ta a na la ha ne b+hany+dza uts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT/mtshames bcings pa'i sdig so//'di dag dang rtsa ba'i phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o//
27b1(rgyud): lag mthil mnyam por byas te mtho bong dang mtho chung sbyar la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'din las thams cad pas gsum gyi phyag rgya'o//sngags no//na ma
27b2(rgyud): tra yA ya/nu ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/mahA yak+Sha sa nA pa tu ye/hI ri mi raM bi ra ra ri Ni swAhA/so sor sbyar bar bya'o//ser mo phan tshun sbyar la khu tshur du byas te gung mo brkyang la sbyar
27b3(rgyud): nas de'i phyi rol tu mdzub ma cung zad bskums la mthe bong gnyis dbus su bzhag pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'o//sngags ni/na maHsan+ni bud+d+hA nAM ru drA ya swA hA dbang phyug
27b4(rgyud): chen po'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba 'di ni lha mo chu lon gyi phyag rgya'o//sngags ni/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ho ni u ma ya swA hA/thal mo phye ba las mthe chung rtsi mo sbyar la de'i rgyab
27b5(rgyud): tu srin lag sbyar nas de'i tshigs gsum par gung mo gnyis sbyar la de'i tshogs dang por mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni lha ma yin thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o//gnyis ga
27b6(rgyud): yang rdo rje mtshan nyid dang gcig tu sbyar bar bya'o//lha ma yin thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor 'joms shing 'bye ba'i phyag rgya ni 'dir sor mo rnams rnam par bzlog la rus
27b7(rgyud): sbal gyis rnam par bya ba ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o//spyi bor bzhag pa ni lha ma yin thams cad dbang bskur po'i phyog rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa 'og tu bzhag la de'i steng du lag
28a1(rgyud): pa g.yas pa sngar la mthe bongaso sor bya ba 'di ni du sprul dbang bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag+sa pa gA lan pa rje'i tshul du 'azhag pa lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thu su
28a2(rgyud): bzhag la thad kar sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya gzhan no//bla 'og gi lhag po rnam par bzlog la snying khar sor mo gyen du byas la mthe bong mnyam par gzhibs pa
28a3(rgyud): ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje sa 'og gi mdzub mo steng du mnyam du gzhibs pa ni rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o//khu tshur byas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang la gung mo dang srin lag gi steng du
28a4(rgyud): mthe bong sbyar ba ni dbyug gu'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong mdzub mo'i rtsa bar sbyar ba ni ba'i phyag rgya'o//khu tshur du byas la gung mo dang mthe bong mnyam por sbyar ba ni bya rog
28a5(rgyud): gi nichu phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje'i tshul du byas la snying kha'i phyogasu sbyor la lag po g.yas pa rdo rje steng du phyir nas rkang pa brkyang bskum du gnas pa ni rdo rje slong pa'i
28a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa snying kha'i phyogasu bzhag la/log pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum gyis rgyas btab nas brkyang bskum du gnas pa 'di ni rdo rje
28a7(rgyud): gzhan la smod pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags ni/oM bi bin+d+ha bi bin+do hU~M phaT/'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud ji snyed pa las sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
28b1(rgyud): byang gacha skyes bu dpa' ba dpal gyi sgor 'jug par 'dod par gyur na/des rdo rje khro ba'i bskyon pa sngon du byas la phyis 'jug par bya'o//de la sngun du bstan pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad
28b2(rgyud): slongs mo zo zhing smra ba bcad la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la dga' bas rten cing 'brel byer 'byung ba'i snying po'i mchod rten
28b3(rgyud): byas la/de'i mdun du ri bo 'am chu bo 'dus pa 'am/sheng gcig pa 'am/ba glang gi lhas sam/bas mtha' 'am/mchod rten gang yang rung ba'i gnasu byang chub kyi sems rjesu
28b4(rgyud): dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sdig pa bshegs te/bla na med par bsngo la dam pa'i chos bton te rje su dran par byas la/mchod rten gyi las
28b5(rgyud): la rje su gnas nas lus dang sreg la dga' ba dor te/dus gsum du phyag rgya dang /dbang bskur zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/de'i lta bu'i tshul gyi bsnyen pa bya'o//gang dag
28b6(rgyud): rmi lam mam mngon sum mtshan ma mthong na re shrIg mi 'jug ste/de'od rmi lcam ni glang po che chen pos zil gyis mngon pa'om/gzir ba 'am/bros pa 'am/'gyel ba 'am/ga
28b7(rgyud): dag shi ba de lta bu mthong na/de nas 'jug par bya'o//yang ni mngon sum te sgo 'phar gyi 'tshams btsam pa 'am/rdo chen po ltung ba 'am/khros nas gza' chen po 'gugs pa
29a1(rgyud): 'am/gdug pa rnams dang /gtum po dang /'jigs byed dang /klu dang /glang po che chen po dang /seng ge dang /stag dang /ma he dang /dgra'i dbus su phyin yang /
29a2(rgyud): blta dka' bar 'gyur ba dang /de dag thams cad byams pa'i sem su gyur na de nas 'jug par bya'o//lha thams cad mngag gzhug tu 'gyuraro//'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rjes
29a3(rgyud): 'og gi sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///bu ga'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba//chu 'bo ba gang dag rtse ma med//sa yi sgra ni sgrogs pa dang //ltos 'phye'i gnas
29a4(rgyud): khang ji lta bar//rdo rje sa 'og mtshan nyid ni//mkhas pa yis ni mtshon par bya//rnam pa gang gi tshul gyis ni/bu ga rnams brjod pa yi//'jug pa na ni dog gyur la//bu
29a5(rgyud): gder ni phyin pa na//kun nas sa gzhi mnyam pa ni//dpal gyi sgor ni rnam par bstan//gla rtse me chog gi dri ldan zhing //'khril shing lcug mas khyab pa dang //dri snum ldan
29a6(rgyud): pa'i kha dog can//dpal gyi sbyor ni de gshad do//dri dang ldan zhing ngos brlan pa//dro ba yis ni 'khrugs 'gyur gA//zhugs bcom gyis yang dang yang //'khrug/
29a7(rgyud): ba nyid du 'gyur ba ni//dpal gyi sgong ni de shes bya//de na dngul chu yod par bstan//bu ga yi ni sgor zhugs pas//de yi sems ni 'dod ldan 'gyur//khra bo'i sems su
29b1(rgyud): gyur po ni//bu gar mdzes ma gnas pa yin//'jigs pa med cing nga rgyal dang //rlom pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis//der+ya ni zhubs pas tshim 'gyur na//bu gar dkar rdzas
29b2(rgyud): ldan pas khyab//bu ga dag ni gang dag tu//tshul med nga rgyal can khro bo//brtse med ser sna dang ldan zhing //phan tshun du ni rnyong byed pa'am//yang na bu ga'i sgron ni//srin bu rnams
29b3(rgyud): ni rten gyur pa//der ni ltos 'phye shes bya ste//bu ga der ni rnyed dka'o//gang dag dkar po'i bya ba ni//bu ga sgor yang dag ga nas mthong na//de na bud med stong phrag gnas//gser//
29b4(rgyud): ni rnam pa du ma gnas//nor bau mu tig bye ru dang /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //bcu do len du ma'i rdzas rnams ni//bu ga mchog der gnas pa yin//bu ga gang gi sgo la ni///
29b5(rgyud): rkang 'dug sgra ni grags gyur na//bu ga di ni rin chen gang //bud med stong phrag de na gnas//bu ga glang gi sgo na ni//tshad bye'u gar byed gnas gyur na//bu ga de ni 'bras med shes
29b6(rgyud): der ni blo ldan 'jug mi bya//gang gi nang na rkang gnyis ni//yang dag brten par mthong gyur na//deng ni rab tu spro ba yis//mkhas pa yis ni 'jug par bya//mi gang 'thungs
29b7(rgyud): pas 'chi med pa'o//mchog gi bcud len de na gnas//gang dag bu ga'i sgo la ni//glang po yang dag rten mthong nas//mthong nas ma mthong gyur na ni//bu ga des ni las
30a1(rgyud): kun byed//gang dag bu gdor 'jug pa'o//ltos 'phyo'i dbang phyug rnams mthong nas/dpa' bos dor ni 'jug mi bya//dem thug tu srog 'phrog byed//bu ga'
30a2(rgyud): dru na 'jigs byed pa'i//ce spyang me yi sgra grag na//der ni bag med mi bya ste//'khor dang bcas pa skrag par 'gyur//gang na khrud khrung sgra sgrogs pa//bu ga'i nang na gnas
30a3(rgyud): byung na//bu gdon kun gyis gang //'dod pa rnams kyis rnam par rgya no//gang dag bu ga'i sgor rten pa'o//nyin yang dag mthong gyur na//dar ni brdzun pas 'jug par bya//
30a4(rgyud): bud med stong gi bdag por 'gyur//bud med gzhon nu bum pa'i lag/bu ga'i snod ni yang dag mthong //gdan mi bza' bar bu ga'i las//der ni grub par shes par bya//
30a5(rgyud): bu ga'i las la 'jug pa na//sgra skad chen po byung gyur ni//bu ga dA ni mtha' med shes//der ni yi nI sbyo ru yang //byi ba ka ka ru dkar po//gang dag lhan cig gnas mthong /
30a6(rgyud): na/bugu de ni lus kun byed//bu ga'i sgyu ru khyad par du//der ni ras kyi dri byung na//bu mo rnams ni stong phrag dag/dgu dang bdun brgya rnams dang ni//bcud kyis len
30a7(rgyud): dang gser dang ni//don chen rnam pa sna tshogs gnas//gang du bzhugs pa'i 'byung 'gyur ba//ka ra bi ri'i me tog rgyas//de ni dngul chu gnas pa na//mkhas pa yi
30b1(rgyud): d+hub+hU bu g+h+ra/ drug g+hA du man//gnas pAd+ma mdzod nA pra byAt+ta//lu la 'khyur med par shes byas la//do nI brtaglu dbyung mi byA'o//bud med dag ni tshig sbyang dang //brgya phrag dag/
30b2(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis ni//pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam zhing //rta ga tu ngal pas spyod par byed//thams cad kyang ni tshul cig gcig/kun thos mthong na dga' ba'o//de la rin chen du me dang //
30b3(rgyud): gis ngag dang ni rgyan dag dang //bcud kyi len gyi gtso bo dang //rnam po sna tsha gos mdzes pa'o//de nas ldong ngos dag dang ni//mig sman dang ni dngum chu dang //mdzes pa'i mtshon
30b4(rgyud): sna chags rnams//bu ga'i glang gi mchog na'o//bu ga de yi nang 'graman//du ba 'dzul ba mthong gyur ni//gser ni rnam pa mang po dang //der ni dngus chur shes par bya/
30b5(rgyud): gdi yi legs la ni//tshangs pa khyu dog sna tshugs pa 'am//rang bzhin dkar po rten gyur na//bu ga de yang las kun byed//dbus nas mche ma 'dzag pa yi//bya rog 'thon
30b6(rgyud): pa gang yin pa//de ni bza' ba sna tshogs pa'i//bu ga ru ni rnam par bstan//gang ni ma he mthong ba na//khyad par du ni sprin gyi mdog/bu ga der ni 'bad pa yiso//mkhas pa
30b7(rgyud): yis ni 'jug par bya//ma myos pa dang lhan cig tu//lag na ral gris rgyun du ni//bu ga der ni dor bar bya//thams cad du ni byang gi char//zab mo sprin gyi mdog 'dra ba'i//
31a1(rgyud): dngul chu der ni shes par bya//gang na me tog dri yod cing //khyud par du ni skang smos dri//bu ga de yin na ni//bud med gnas par rnam par bstan 'jug
31a2(rgyud): pa pos ni khyad par du//dir ni the tshom mi bya'o//de nas rab rnam lnga dang //rgyal po'i sgo dang rta babs dang /gser gyi rang bzhin ka ba ni//bud med rin chen rnams kyis
31a3(rgyud): spras//bcud len rnams dang rin rnams//gdon mi za bar de na gnas//bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du//gang na pad+ma'i dri yod dang //gzhan len bu gar der shes bya//
31a4(rgyud): 'dod pa kun gyis rnam par rgyan//brtul zhugs tsan+da g+his der 'jug go/brtul zhugaso med pas nam yang min//de nas rnam pa du myu gnas//gang 'dod don brta
31a5(rgyud): par bya//bu ga'i spyi ru khyad par du//gang na sbrang rtsi'i dri yod na//bu ga'i logs ni thams cad la//de na bung ba yod pa ste//de la the tshom mi bya'o//den gnas pa'i
31a6(rgyud): bung po sogs//rig pa 'dzin pa khyad par du//sngags grub pa la rdzid mi 'gyur//bu gA'i sgra ni thams cad du//gang na sa ye dri yod pa//sa la rin chen ji snyed
31a7(rgyud): pa//rgya mtsho yang ni khyad par du'o//lha ma yin rnams kun gyi dang //mi yi gtso bo rnams kyi dang //gnod sbyin dag ni rnams kyi yang //bu ga'i mchog der thams
31b1(rgyud): cad gnas//rig pa 'dzin pas der bzhugs pas//'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur//bu ga'i nang na lug gi dri//gang dag yod na bu ga de//'khrul 'khor med par shes
31b2(rgyud): par bya//'dod pa kun gyis rnam par thu ni//chu skyur dang ni chu sbyar ma//mnyam du spyod cing lhan cig tu//bu ga'i nang na gnas na ni//bu ga de yi 'khrul 'khor med//de na dngul
31b3(rgyud): chu btso gcig yod//de ni bu ga'i dam pa'o//bu ga dag ni ba rkos pa na//gang du lugs kong mthong gyur na//bu ga de ni rin chen gang //mkhas pa yis ni 'jug par bya//
31b4(rgyud): zhugs pa tsam na mthang 'gyur ba//dkyus su dpag tshad phyed pa yi//de na thang ni legs par yod//'dzam bu chu bo 'dra ba'i 'od//der ni me yis 'bras thob ste//lo ni khrig
31b5(rgyud): phrag brgyar 'tsho'o//gang na mi mo sgron ma'i lag/bu ga'i nang na gnas pa na//'di ni de yi bu gar shes//gdon mi za bar dngul chus gang //bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du/
31b6(rgyud): geng na sha yi dri yod pa//srin po rnams kyi bu gar shes//blo dang ldan pas der mi 'jug/bu ga'i drung na gar byed pa'i//rma bya mthong na bu ga de//'khrul 'khor med par
31b7(rgyud): shes par bya//'dod pa kun gyis rnam par rgyan//bu ga'i sgra ru khyad par du//gang na khrag ni mthong ba na//gtsog pu nyid du dor 'jug ste//rang gi khyim bzhin 'jigs
32a1(rgyud): ba med//gang na nya yi dri yod cing //khyad par du yang zhag dri yod//de dang der ni brtson pa yis//mkhas pa yi ba ni 'jug par bya//zhugs pas chu rgyun mthong gyur//
32a2(rgyud): na//'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste//de yi 'gram du bzang ldan pa'i//khang pa rab tu sbyangs gyur pa//lha khang dang ni shing khang la//ba dan rnams kyis mngon par spros//de na rin
32a3(rgyud): chen bzang po dang //dga' ma 'dra ba'i bud med dang //de na dngul chu mang yod par//thams cad du ni the tshom med//bu ga gang dag brkos pa na//khrag gi char pa ba'i gyur na//der ni
32a4(rgyud): 'jug par mi 'gyur ste//de ma thag tu srog 'phog byed/bu ga brtags shing dpyad pa na//gang na mun pa yod par gyur na//der ni 'jigs pa med par 'jug/bu ga de ni rang khyim
32a5(rgyud): mtshungs//bu ga'o sgo ru khyad par du//gang na ras kyi dri yod pa//de na rin chen du mo dang //dngul chu ldong ros de bzhin du//mig sman bzang po rnams dang ni//rin chen rnams kyi rgyan dag
32a6(rgyud): ni/du ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang //gser ni rnam pa du ma lod//bu ga'i ne bo ni gang dag na//sgren ma ye ni dri yod pa//de ru yang ni 'jug par bya//'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/
32a7(rgyud): bu ga yi ni 'gram logs na//gang na gdug pa gnas byung na//de ni sha za'i gnas yin zhing //bzang gnas par gdon mi za//gang na ha ho'i sgra sgrogs pa//dbang ldan gyi ni
32b1(rgyud): phyogs pa s+ho// na nas //da sgyu ba sa pa g+sa//shAng na mang gagis pa la/shAngakyi phyogs sa yang dag sbyin//u byu m+b+ha/m+bA //bla grod spyod la sman /
32b2(rgyud): byed//bug de yi thon 'khor du//gang ni rdo rje'i char 'bab na//deng ni dbul chur shes bya ste//sems can thams cad grub par byed//bu ga de yi tho na la khar du//me tog dri ldan bu ga //
32b3(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor med par shes par bya//'dod pa thams cad sgrub par byed/bug de yi nang nini//gang na rgyal po'i sgra yod pa//bug 'khrul 'khor med shes bya//de ni mkhas
32b4(rgyud): pas 'jug par bya//bu ga yi ni tho na 'khor du//gang na khyu mchog mthong ba dang //de yang dpa' bos 'jug gar bya//b+ha ga de yi rin chen gang //gang na skyes bu gr-i cer bu ni//nag
32b5(rgyud): po sha nga'i khya chen po dgo//mthong nas yang ni ma mthong na//bu ga deng nga las kun byed//gang na dge sbyong gcer bu dang //spyi gcer dang ni sna ring po 'am//gang dag tu ni khyim mthong na/
32b6(rgyud): dengan grub par brtan pa'o//drug glang giblon 'khor du//rna ma yonA ya na// de yang la sum+b+ha rgyud/dpa mang n-i shes pA //gdun ci gsum mtshan nyid ni//tham
32b7(rgyud): cad du ni mthong ba ni//mi rnams kyis ni khyad par du//'ug dang 'jug nus ma yin//gang du me tog dris rgyan pa'i//bram ze mthang na bu ga de/'khrul
33a1(rgyud): 'khor med par shes bya ste//'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu 'grub//bu ga'i sgo ru yang dag brten//gang na dkar po'i sbrul yod na//der yang brtson par byas na su//
33a2(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni 'jug par bya//bu ga'i sgra yi than 'khor ni//gang du dom ni mthong ba na//bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya//'dod pa kun gyi don 'grub byed//bu ga'i las ni byed pa
33a3(rgyud): na//gang du phag ni mthong gyur na//bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya//gdon mi za bar rin chen gang //bu ga'i sgo yi thon 'khor ni//gang na chu yi dri yod pa//der ni dngul tshur
33a4(rgyud): shes bya ste//sems can kun la phan par byed//bu ga de yi thon 'khor ni//gang la bdug pa'i dri yod pa//bu ga 'khrul 'khor med shes bya//gdan mi za bar rin chen gang //
33a5(rgyud): bu ba'i sgo la gnas pa yi//gang na bur chad dri yod na//bud med rin chen gzugs mdzes dang //bza' dang btung bar shes par bya/bu ga yi ni thon 'khar na/gang nar yi
33a6(rgyud): dri yod pa//deng yang dpa' bos 'jug bya ste//dga' zhig dang ni 'jug ma yin//ma myos par ni zhugs na su//der ni ji ltar 'dod pa bsdang //dad ldan gtsang zhing mkhas
33a7(rgyud): pa dang //bya ba byas pas khyad par du//dokon mchog gsum la phyag bya'o//de bzhin rig pa'i bdag po dang /rig pa'i rgyal po lha mo dang //rig pa'i tshogs la'ang khyad
33b1(rgyud): bar du'o//oM ba rA badz+ra hU~M phaT/'phags pa rdo rjes 'og gi snying po'o//lAsa? thams cad pa'i nye ba'i dbang po 'ang de nyid do//oM hrIHhUM phaT/a'i b+hi na d+ha bi bin d+ha hUM phaT/'angs su
33b2(rgyud): dang 'khrul 'khor gyi phyogs sem mchod pa'i dus su bsrung bar bya'o//'di ni rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las bu ga'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////sngags pas
33b3(rgyud): dpal gyi sgor 'jug por 'dod na/des brjod pa dang sbyang ba byas lo 'jug par bya'o//de la brjod pa ni gang /sbyang ba ni gang zhe na/de la theg mar sa rnying pa dang /chu dang /sman
33b4(rgyud): gyis lus nye bar byugs la/ku mu da dang /ud pa lo dang /ru rta dang /Dir guN+Di dang /ldong ros mnyam por sbyor ba'i sman gyi dam pa 'dis srin po 'joms pa dang /dug 'joms
33b5(rgyud): shing gzhon nu rnams skyed 'phel ba dang /mchod sbyin gyi bgegs sel ba dang /tshangs pa'i srin po srung ba dang /drag pa dang skem byed kyis bzung ba dang /gang dag lus srul
33b6(rgyud): pos bzung ba dang /bud med mngal nyams pa rnams kyis nye ba gnas la byugs pas bzang por 'gyur ba dang /de dag gis yan log byugs pa gang yin pas ni dug ha li ha
33b7(rgyud): la yang 'thung bar byed do//de dag gis 'ding yan lag byugs nas zhugs pas sgo grol bar 'gyur la//sgo bsgribs pa de grol nas gang dag mtshams ring du sbyar ba'i rlung
34a1(rgyud): yang 'byung bar 'gyur//de dag ni brjod pa'o//sbyor ba yang ma tu lung ka dang /ka rany+dza dang /n+ya gro nga'i yal ga la sogs pa'i shing rnams kyis bu ga'i sgo bkag
34a2(rgyud): lnga mtshams med par byas te/sgo 'phar gyis kun nas bsgribs la me sbyar bar bya'o//gang dag nang na gnas pa'i me rab tu zhi ba ni sbyor ba'o//de nas skyes bu dpa' bas ma
34a3(rgyud): ser skya'i lci ba sa la mo lhung bsdu dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la bu ga'i sgor mchod pa dang gtur ma'i chog byas te/a pa mna'i yum shing la maM rab tu sbar la//am+b+ha na'i
34a4(rgyud): 'bras bu dang /mar dang /sbrang rtsi btags te bsregs blug ga brgya rtsa brgyad khro bo'i khrul 'khor gyi bla mas dbul bar bya'o//'dis 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung ba dang
34a5(rgyud): brlag par 'gyuraro//de nas ra'i lpags pa'i ral gu gyon la//nyam shar ba na 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sman gyis lus byugs te/bya ba byas la grogs bzing po dang
34a6(rgyud): 'jug par bya'o//shing bdar dang /ko bi d+ha ra dkar ba dang /ku Da ka blugs pa'i yung ba gnyis kyis sbrul gyi dpa' ba 'joms pa dang /mngon par 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa dang /
34a7(rgyud): skyes bu gnon nu srung ba dang /bud med skul ba bzang po de byed pa dang /'dod pa'i bsrung ba thams cad sel ba dang /rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa dang /sa'i bdag pos rgyas pa skye
