64b4(rgyud): bsten//'di yis byang du bshad pa dang //dbang ldan gyi yang de bzhin no//phyogs rnams kyi yang mtshan nyid ni//bston pa 'di la the tsam med//'di ltar shes pa'i mkhas pa
64b5(rgyud): yis//phyogs kyi 'khrul 'khor mtshon par bya//sngon bzhin legs par shes pa yis//rdzas rnams kyang ni blo ldan gyis//de 'da'i phyog su 'khod nas ni//de yis lam ni blta//
64b6(rgyud): par bya//gnyis pa yi ni lam gyur pa//'khrul 'khor med pas brtags mi dgos//gsum pa yang ni shes bya ste//bzhi pa yang ni mtshungs pa'o//lam ni rnam pa bzhir
64b7(rgyud): ga shod pas//'dod ldan la ni 'bras bu ster//dang po ru ni mi dpyad par//bza' bar bya ba ma yin no//gnyis pa ru ni bza' bar bya//gsum pa la yang de bzhin no//bzhi
65a1(rgyud): pa yang ni bza' bar bya//de dag 'khrul 'khor med par bstun//phyogs kyi cha ni thams cad du/yongasu phang dur shes par bya//phyi ma yi ni cho ga yis//chung
65a2(rgyud): 'dus ze 'bru rgyu ba'o//'phags pa rdo rje so 'og gi rgyud las phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o////'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdza
65a3(rgyud): //phyag ni rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo//de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mgon pa la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas
65a4(rgyud): thal mo sbyor te gsol pa/sbyor ba bcu gnyis po 'di d+hi gang dang gang 'byung ba dang /bu ga thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor nam med par 'gyur ba lags/bcomo ldan 'das kyis
65a5(rgyud): bka' stsal ba/de de bzhin te/dbyar zla tha chungs kyi nag po'i bcu bzhi la gza' phur bu'i nyi ma dang //ska re ma rgyal 'dzom pa la nges par bu ga'i sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro//ston
65a6(rgyud): zla tha chungs kyi gnam stong la phur bu'i nyi ma dang /rgyu skA ra sa ri 'dzom pa la nges par bu ga'i sgo grol bar 'gyur//gzhon nu ma rang nyid 'ongs nas 'jug par byed do//ston zla
65a7(rgyud): chungs kyi nye la phur bu'i nyi ma dang /skar ma bra nya 'dzom pa la bu ga thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor 'khor med par 'gyuraro//de gun zla 'bring po'i nag pa'i bcu bzhi la phur bu'i
65b1(rgyud): ma dang /skar ma rgyal 'jom pa la 'khrul 'khor thams cad grol bar 'gyuraro//dgun zla tha chungs kyi nag po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu dang /skar ma gro zhun la bu gu thams cad kyi 'khrul
65b2(rgyud): 'khor med par 'gyuraro//dgun zla tha chungs kyi dkar po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu'i nyi mo dang /sker ma rgyal 'jom pa ni 'khrul 'khor ma lus pa grol bar 'gyur ro//ston zla ra ba'i nag
65b3(rgyud): po'i tshes brgyad la phur bu'i nyin par dang /skar mAnam gru 'dzem pa na bu ga'i sgo thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro//dbyer zla 'bring po'i nag po'i bcu bzhi la phur bu'i nyin par dang /skad
65b4(rgyud): margyal lam nam gru 'dzom pa la bu ga thams cad nges par grol par 'gyur//grong gi mi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'jug par bya'o//ston zla ra ba'i nag po'i bcu bzhi la
65b5(rgyud): phur bu'i nyin par dang /skar ma phal gu ni 'dzom pa nu nges par bu ga'i sgro grol bar 'gyuraro//lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyis rje btsun 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rab tu
65b6(rgyud): dgyes pa'i don dus 'og gi gsang ba chen po smras pa'o//sngags dang sbyin sreg rnam paR+Ya spang ngo //sa 'og gi gsang ba chen po yongasu rdzog so////'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i
65b7(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal ba cheni pa rdo rje sa'og ces bya ba ji sbrid pa yong su rdzog so///rkye gar gyi paN+Di ta brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /sgra bosgyur gyi mdzes
66a1(rgyud): pab+hU'i gtsug lagu la mtshungs pa/gsang sngags 'dzin gsun dga' rgyal mtshan dang lta bzang pos dpalas sgyu'i dben gnas dam par bsgyu pa//
66a2(rgyud): lha min dbang po'i sgo glegs 'joms byed pa//gsung rab dam pa dpal ldan kun dga' yi//rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur 'di la sgra nyams pa/gang lags de la mkhas rnams
66a3(rgyud): bzod par mdzod//sa 'og 'khrul 'khor bde legs rin chen gter//gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dam pa'i bka'//gangs can 'gro la phan pa'i blo gros kyis//bsgyur
66a4(rgyud): ba'i bsad nams 'dzin bcas rnams la byin//rgya gar skad du/b+hu tA nA ma ra m+b+han+ta tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/bad skad du/'byung ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen pa
66a5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//de nas 'dir ni bshad bye ba/'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen rgyu la//'byung po 'byung ma kun sgrub pa'i//tshig rab tu rgyas pa'o//
66a6(rgyud): rje 'chang chen po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsung so//chu bo'i 'gram deng dur khrod dang /shing gcig pa dang /lha gnas pa'i khang pa dang /dpal rngo
66a7(rgyud): rjerdza 'chang gi khyim dang /rigs kyi gnas rnamasu bsgrub par bya ba skad cig nyid kyis 'grub pa 'gyur ro//gal te ma 'grub na 'byung po dang /'byung mo rigs dang rgyud
66b1(rgyud): dang bcos pa ma lus pa phung bar 'gyur ro//de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lha chen bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to///
66b2(rgyud): khro bo'i bdag po chen po gdug pa dang /ma rungs pa rnams gsod par byed pa bshad du gsol/de nas dbang phyug tshon po yi lha chen po legaso leg so zhes bya ba byin nas 'byung
66b3(rgyud): bo thams cad gsod pa'i sngags kyi tshig gsungs pa/oM badz+ra dz+wa li hau na ha na sarba b+hU ta na hUM phaT//de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis dpal rdo rje 'chang gi ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas
66b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba du ma byung bar gyur te/'byung po thams cad kyi lus bskams shing //brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug la sogs pa lha thams cad bsad par gyur to//
66b5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo mtshar dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsungaso//legaso dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i tshe ma
66b6(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung po dang /'byung mo tshar gcod par byed pa ni legaso//de nas ya ngo slar ro'i rnam par shes pa 'gugs pa'i sngags gsungs pa/oM badz+ra A yu She
66b7(rgyud): sar sA rA sr-i na/de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis dpal rdo rje 'chang gi shangs kyi bu ga nas rlung chen po ro 'tsho bar byed pa byung por gyur ti/de byung ba tsam gyis 'byung po dang
67a1(rgyud): 'byung mo rnams kyi lus lo zhubs//zhugs pa tsam gyis 'byung po dang 'byung mo namasA langs te tshor 'jigs shing rab tu 'drang bar gyur pas ba ma tan
67a2(rgyud): 'das bskyab tu gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin bgyid do zhes smras//de nas 'byung po'i bdag po gzhan gyis mi thub
67a3(rgyud): pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i bdag po chen po dpal srid pa gsum las rnam
67a4(rgyud): par rgyal ba bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das yongasu bsgrub tu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'byung de'i bdag tha
67a5(rgyud): gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi mi rnams la dngos grub rdzogs par byin cig 'dzamu gling po'i'o mo rnams la dngul chu dang bcud kyis len pa'i rdzas rnams sgrub cing bde bar byin
67a6(rgyud): tsog/dbyig dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mu tig dang /bain+d+har+ya dang /pad+ma d+h+r-i ga dang /me dang chu'i shel dang /smyos dang /lha'i na bza' rnams byin cig/'di zlos pa'i 'bras
67a7(rgyud): bu 'grub por bgyis shig/bsnyen bkur gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zlos pa'i rin pa che'i cod pan dang /gos dang /dri dang /bdug pa dang /mo
67b1(rgyud): tan la sogs pa dang /yo byad dang /rdzas thams cad bgogs med par byin cag/rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /dgra'i 'jig pa dang /sed blo'i 'jigs pa dang /stag gi 'jigs
67b2(rgyud): pa thams cad bzlog cig/kye kye gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'byung po'i dbang phyug chen po myur du myur du nyon cig nyon cig/le lo can dang /tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /sdig pa byed pa dang /
67b3(rgyud): brdzun smra ba rnams la nges par dngos grub byin cig/gal te rig sngags 'chang la dngos grub mo sbyin nA klu mo dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /sa la 'joms ma dang /lha ma yi no mo dang /
67b4(rgyud): mi 'am ci mo dang /na mkha' lding mo dang /lto 'phye chen mo dang /sha za mr-i dang /'byung mo dang /dri za mo rnams kyi spyi bo mi phyed pa'i rdo rjes 'gras par bya zhing dmyal ba chen po brgyad du
67b5(rgyud): ltung bar bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad du leg so ldeg sa//lag na rdo rje logs por bshad do//mi rnams lo phan pa'i phyir byang chub sems
67b6(rgyud): dpa' semos dpa' chen po brtson 'grus dang /stobs dang /pha rol gnon pa/mi phyed par grags pa/lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khams gsum po'i chos kyi rgyal
67b7(rgyud): po chen po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khanams thams cad grub par byed pa/chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad bskor bar byed pa sdugo bsnol thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i
68a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs rgya chen po cho ga sna tshogs pa phyag rgya dang /sngags kyi tshig gis sgrub pa'i thab khro bo'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po bdag
68a2(rgyud): bo shod cig ces gsungaso//de nas rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen pos ro 'tsho bar byed pa'i sngags gsungs pa/oM kar+d+ha kar+d+ha mi tA saM dzI ba ya tid+hA ya/de nas 'od gsungs pa
68a3(rgyud): tsam gyis lha thams cad myos te/brgyal zhing dgyel nas cher 'jigs shing rab tu 'bad par gyur te gnaso//de nas lha chen pos gsol pa/byang chub sems dpa' chen
68a4(rgyud): po skyob shig skyobs shig/de nas rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen pos 'di skad ces gsungaso//ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/kye 'byung ba'i bdag po khyed rnams
68a5(rgyud): gzhon las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir lha thams cad du dbang du bsdu zhing 'byung po thams cad tshar bcad par bya'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po dang lha'i bud med thams
68a6(rgyud): cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol//dpal rdo rje 'chang rgyal po chen pos bskyab du gsol//de nas khro bo chen po rdo rje 'chang gis 'di skad
68a7(rgyud): ces gsungaso//kye dud med rnams go bar gyis shig/dpal rdo rje 'chang rgyal po chen po la sogs pa'i bsnyen bkur byos shig/dbyig dang /gser dang /mu tig dang //
68b1(rgyud): rin po che dang /bai DUr+ya dang /pad+ma ra ga dang /rdzas thams cad phul cig/de nas lha'i bud med la sogs pa lha'i bu mo dang gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
68b2(rgyud): ldan 'das 'gu mo'i gu mo//dpal ldan rdo rje khro bo zlos pa rnams kyi bran mo bgyid do//gal te khro bo bzlos pa'i bsnyen bkur mo bgyis na rigs dang rgyud du bcas pa brlag par
68b3(rgyud): gyur cig/dam pa'i chos spangs par gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la smad par gyu cig/bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje sa spyi bo khos shig/lan
68b4(rgyud): brgyad rnam par bshegs shing nas myur ba nyid du dmyal ba chen po brgyad du 'jug par gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha'i bud
68b5(rgyud): med thams cad dang /klu mo dang /gnod sbyin mo rnams la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/lha'i bu mo dang /klu mau dang /gnod sbyin mo rnams legaso leg so//ma 'ongs pa'i tshem
68b6(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa zlos pa'i mi rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyis shig/de nas 'byung po'i rgyalnga po gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa
68b7(rgyud): langs te/dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po'i zhabs la mgo bos btud nas rang gi snying po phul ba/oM shrI ma hA b+hU ta ku la sun da ri hUM/oM shrI bi dza ya sun+da ri tiH
69a1(rgyud): oM shrI bi ma le sun+na ri a/oM shrI ra ti sun+da ri d+ha/oM shrI ma no ha ra sun+da ri au/oM shrI b+hu ShaM suny+dza ri mAM/oM shrI ba la sun+di rI maM/oM shrI tsak+Shu ra ma d+hu ma sun+da r-i ti/zhes pa 'di//
69a2(rgyud): rnams ni 'byung po'i rgyal mo chen mo ste//dpal gyi sgra yis rab tu grags pa'o//de nas dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thebs bklags pa tsam gyis dngos grub ster ba ste/dpel rdo rje 'chang gi
69a3(rgyud): mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis 'byung po dang 'byung mo thams cad mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gi tshe dam tshig las 'das na 'phral du 'byung /
69a4(rgyud): po dang 'byung mo thams cad rigs dang rgyud du bcas te phung bar bya'o//de nas 'byung po chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pas 'di skad ces gsol to//lha chen po'i dam tshig la gnas shong
69a5(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga thams cad kyi dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o//dpal rdo rje 'chang bzlas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/gal te ma grub na
69a6(rgyud): rigs dang rgyud du bcas pa po rlag par gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i dam tshig nyams par gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo rdo rje spyi
69a7(rgyud): ba 'gas par gyur cig/myur ba nyid du shi ste rnam pa thams cad du dmyal ba chen po brgyad du 'jug par gyur cig/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//sgrub pa po yi gnas
69b1(rgyud): mchog s+ho//chu bo'i 'gram dang dur khrod dang //phyag na rdo rje'i khyim dag ste//der ni 'byung ba 'byung mo kun//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//'byung po'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad kyi sgrub
69b2(rgyud): pa'i gnas//de nas phyag rgya bshad bya ba//'byung mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa ste//lag g.yon khu tshur dam bcas nas//gung mo rab tu brgyud byas pa//spyan drang mchod pa'i phyag rgya ste/
69b3(rgyud): rigs kyi mchog ni skyob byed pa'o//khu tshur phan tshun ba nangs nas ni//mdzub mo rab tu brgyud byas pa//rang gi dam tshige srung ba yi//'byung mo skong cig de la sgrub//lag g.yon
69b4(rgyud): khu tshur dam bcangs ni so mthe chung rab tu brkyang byas pa//nye bar byed pa'i phyag rgya ste//'byung po thams cad rjes 'brang ba'o//lag pa ga yon pa brkyang nas ni//mdzub mo bskyil
69b5(rgyud): ba byas nasu//mthe bong g.yas ni mnan byas po//'byung kun dbong du byung pa'o//lag gA yon khu tshur bcangs pa las//srin lag rab tu brkyang ba ni/'byung mo thams cad
69b6(rgyud): 'grogs pa ste//bgegs kun bzlog par byed pa'o//lag g.yon khro tshur bcas nas ni//mdzub mo rab tu brkyang byas po/'byung mo mngon phyogs byed pa ste//gdug pa
69b7(rgyud): thams cad ze byed pa'o//lag pa g.yon pos khu chur bcangs te mthe chung brkyang ba ni 'byung mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/thams cad du las thams cad byed pa'o//lag pa
70a1(rgyud): gnyis ga'i sor mo rnams gcig gi steng du gcig bskyon pa byas pa la lag pa grayas pa rgud pa g.yas par bzhag la/lag pa g.yon pas g.yas
70a2(rgyud): mnan pa'i steng du gzhag pa ni mchog gi snying po ste 'byung mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di dag bcings pa tsam gyis 'byung mo rnams myur du 'ong ste/gal te ma 'ongs
70a3(rgyud): na megra dang spyi bo 'gas shing bskams te 'chi bar gyur cig/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'tshong khro bo'i bdag po chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gal te 'byung ma rnams
70a4(rgyud): dam tshig las 'da' bar byed na khro bo 'di dang bcas pas dgug pa'i phyir bzlas te/oM ka Tu ka Tu sr-i tro hri che ge mo b+h+r-i ti ni hU~M phaT//khro bo 'di dang bcas pas brgya phrag brgyad
70a5(rgyud): bzlas na myur bar 'ong b.ro 'gyur ro//gal te myur du ma 'ongs ni mig dang spyi bo 'gas pa 'am/bskams te 'chi'o//de nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bshad pa/chu bo'i 'gram
70a6(rgyud): du song ste tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas me tog gcal da bkram ste/gu gul gyi dud pas bdug cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro//mtshan mo yang
70a7(rgyud): stong bzlas na 'ong ste/'ongs nas 'dod pa sbyin par 'gyur te chung mer 'gyuraro//gser srang brgya mel du dor nas tho rangs kyis 'gro bar byed do//nyi ma re re 'di ltar byas
70b1(rgyud): na zla ba gcig gi bAr du nges par 'grub po//chu bo'i 'gram du song ste/tsun dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas zho dang 'bras chan gyi gtor ma byin na nyi ma bdun na nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs
70b2(rgyud): nas tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na dga' bar gyur to/sdug pa ngas ci bya zer te/sgrub pa po yi sa rgyal srid blang cig ces smra'o//de nas yul 'khor yang yongasu skyong bar byed do//
70b3(rgyud): gos dang /rgyan dang /bza' ba la sogs pa 'thun par sbyin par byed do//dpal rdo rje 'chang gi khang par song ste/ka ra pi ri'i me tog sbyin zhing gu gul gyis bdug pos bdogs
70b4(rgyud): la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur te/mtshan mo yang stong bzlas na nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la me tog gi bstan sprin zhing legs pa 'ong so zhes brjod na chung mar
70b5(rgyud): 'gyur te/lha'i dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len dang /rdzas kyi dngos grub ster zhing dag thams cad 'joms par byed do//rgyab tu zhon na mtho ri su yang khyer bar byed do//lo stong
70b6(rgyud): phrag bcur 'tsho'o//chu bo'i 'gram du song ste spos dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas nAs me tog dkar po byin to//du ru ka sau bdugs la stong phrag bcu bzlas no 'grub par
70b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//mtshan mo yang stong bzlas ni nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la me tog go chu'i yon chab byin nas bsgo na sring mor 'gyur//dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len dang /rdzas
71a1(rgyud): kyi dngos grub sbyar zhing dpag tshod stong du song nas bud med bzang ma blangs nas sbyar byur byung cing mtshan mo slar khyer ro//lha khang spyod par song nas ji lta//
71a2(rgyud): gsungs pa'i gtor ma dang mchod pa byas te/stang phrag brgyad du bzlas na 'grub par 'gyuraro//mtshan mo yong gtor ma byin nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nges par 'ong ngo //
71a3(rgyud): 'ongs pa la 'dod pa byas na chung ma 'gyur te/ny+tsa mo re re dong rtsi stong stong ster zhing /rgyub tu zhon na ri rab la yang khyer bar byed do//gzhan rgyal srid sbyin par byed cing rgyal
71a4(rgyud): po'i bu mo bkug nas ster te lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho zhing shi nas kyang rgyal rigasu skye'o//chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste shrI'i bza' ba dang /ka ri bai ra'i me tog sbyin zhing gu
71a5(rgyud): gul gyi dud pas bdugs la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro//mtshan ma yang mchod pa rgyas par byas te/me rab tu sbar nas stong phrag brgyad bzlos na 'khor
71a6(rgyud): lnga brgya sa yongasu bskor nas rkang gdub kyi sgra chen pos 'ang ngo //'ongs pa la mi smra bar gyur pas 'dod par bya ste chung mar 'gyuraro//gal te spong bar byed na 'tsho bar 'gyur//
71a7(rgyud): rgya tu zhon na nyi me re re mtho ri mu yang khyer bar byed do//gzhan yang rgyal srid ster zhing stong phrag lnga 'chi la shi nas kyang rgyal rigasu spyi'o//chu bo'i'o 'gram du song ste chu
71b1(rgyud): gul myos dkyil 'khor byas nas/a kA ru'i bdug pa sbyin zhing ji ltar gsungs pa'i gtor ma byin+da nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur//mtshan ma yang mchad pa
71b2(rgyud): rgyas par byas te stor bzlos na rang nyid 'ong skye snang ba chen po byas nus tsun dan gyi chus mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur//sdug pa des ci bya zhes smra bar byed do//sgrub pa pos
71b3(rgyud): momi bgyis shig tsos smra ba ra bya ste/me bzhin du yongasu sbyong bar byed do//'khor lde brgya'i 'bras tshon dang /rgyan dang /gos rnams nyi ma ri R+Sho star zhing lo khro 'tshal/gang gi tshe
71b4(rgyud): 'chi ban bram ze'i ri rge su skye'o//chu ba 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste mchod pa rgyas pa byos na sde mar maM rab tu sbyar tAM mtshan thog thag bzlas//de nas nam phyed kyi dus su 'byung
71b5(rgyud): mo snang ba chen pa byas nas 'ong ste/sdig pa rjes ci bya zhes smra bar byed de/de nas rgyal srid byin cig ces smras ni nyi mA ri re/dang tshe 'bum 'bum sbyar ro//la khri che zhing gang ni
71b6(rgyud): nas bdag gi rgyal po byed do//'byung mo'i rgyal mo chen mo borgyad kyi brtag pardzogs///de nas 'byung mo chen mo dur khrod du 'jug pa rnams langs te dpal rdo rje 'chang
71b7(rgyud): gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rangan snying po phul ba/oM d+hI nA t+ya/mchog gi snying po'o//oM d+hukaT+Ta kaD+D+h+ya sarba b+hU ta nA ma sa mai ya ma nu pA la~M ya/ha ra hang ban d+ha ben d+ha/a kram
72a1(rgyud): a kram/b+ho b+ho ma tA ra dr-i smai shUn ba si ni A gats+tsha A gats+tsha shI g+h+r-i d+h+r-i ha hU~M phaT/'byung mau dur khyod na gnas pa rnams dgug pa'i sngagaso//oM ban d+ha ban d+ha dz+ha na d+hu na/
72a2(rgyud): tsA la tsA la/tsa la yA nI la ya/pr-i pA~M shaM/pre p+na sha dU r+ya d+ha ra hi ni ti nA/toSh+Tha tiSh+T+r-i/si ma ya ma nu pA la ya b+h+yo s+thA shA na pra be sha ni hUM phaT phaT swAt+te//'byung mo thams cad kya ma/
72a3(rgyud): tshig gi sngag so//au tsa la tsa la/d+ha ka d+hA ka/ma hA b+hU ti ni sA d+ha kA nA pri ye/sa ra sa ra/bi sa ra baM sa ra/kaT+Ti kaT+Ti/tsA lA ya tsA l-I ye/b+hany+dza b+hiny+dza/rang+ga rang+ga/greh+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/
72a4(rgyud): hrIHswA hA/mche ba gtsigs ma'i 'o//aM g+ho rA mu khai sma shA ni baM si ni sIta ka a nu ku le/a pra ti ha ta sid+d+hi d+ha pe ti kaM/I au au a~M na maHswA hA/gdong drag mo'i'o//a dzi rje ri
72a5(rgyud): mu khi tsi re tsi ra tsin+ta A be sha/sarba sha tr-i b+hU yaM ka ri/he na he na/da ha di haM/pa tsA pa tsa/mA ra ya mA ra ya/ma ma a kA la mr-i t+yu k+Sha ya kA ri/sarba nA gA b+ha ye ka ri/aT+TA tA si ni sa
72a6(rgyud): b+hU te shwa re/thA b+hU thA thA/d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/oM ai aM au swA hA//rgan mo gdong gi'o//oM ka ma le lo tsa ni ma nu Shu pa tsa li/sarba duHkhaM ni nA sha ni/sA d+ha ka pr-i ye dza ya dza ya/dai byA rU pi Ni
72a7(rgyud): tr-iHgr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na dzA rje/hU~M hU~M phaT phaT na maHswA hA/pad+ma'i mig can ma'i'o//oM bi kad du mu khi daMSh+Ta ka rA la~M dz+wa li ta lo tsa ni/sarba yak+Sha b+ha yaM ka ra/d+he pa d+ha pA gats+tsha gats+tsha b+hau b+hi sA d+ha
72b1(rgyud): kA nA a dz+nyA pa ya ti s+yAhA/mi sdug gdong ma'i'o//aung+ga d+hA Di kar+N+Na pi shA tsi na~M ka T+ya ka T+ya/d+hu nad+hA na mahA sAR+ya pU dzi tI/ts+tshi na dats+tshin+na da mahA kaR+ShA pi shA tsI ni/b+h+yo b+ho s+t+ra d+hu ki ka do mi Ti/hUM hU~M phaT pa Ta
72b2(rgyud): sI hI//spyod ngan ma'i She//oM sa rA sa ra/kan+ta kar+m+ma/dzaM b+hi ya dza b+hA ya/stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha yaM/mr-i hA ya mo ha yai/pre dz+yo taM ka R+Sha li a pre te hau ta bA ri sid d+hi da yAM kaM ta ha ha hUM s+yA tAM//glaug lhor
72b3(rgyud): jigs ma'i 2//oM sam+ba mu khi A kAR+Sha yaM/sarba b+hU tAnA dza ya dzA ya~M/b+h+rU~M ma~M trA~M sA d+ha kan+ni tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sA ma ya ma nu pA la ya A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA//bzhin mdzes mi'i2//dur khrid du
72b4(rgyud): 'jug mtshan mo brgyad kyi sngags kyi tshig go/de nas 'dir dur khrod du 'jug ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa/khu tshur phan tshun bcangs nas mdzub mo/
72b5(rgyud): gnyis brkyang ba ni 'byung mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis dgug par yod bya'o//dur khrod du 'jug pa'i sha za mo chen mi brgyad kyi phyag rgya ba shad pa/g.yon pa'i
72b6(rgyud): 'dzub mo brkyang ba ni gdong drag ma'i phyag rgya'o//khu tshuraro so sor bcangs nis mthe'u chung gnyis mo khyud de mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas kha'i phyog suM sbyar po ni cho bu gtsigs mA'i phyag
72b7(rgyud): rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur btsongs te gung mo brkyang ba ni rgan mo gdong gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo bkug cing srin log brkyang ba ni pad+ma'i mig can ma'i phyog
73a1(rgyud): rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid lnga sa srin lag bkug nas mthe'u chung brkyang pa ni mI sdug gdong ma'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas mdzub mo brkyang
73a2(rgyud): ba ni spong ngan ma'i phyag rgya'i//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo bkug cing gung mo brkyang ba ni klog ltar 'jog so ma'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung rab tu brkyang bani
73a3(rgyud): bzhin mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o//dur khrod du 'jug ma'i 'byung mo chen mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rgyas po'i le'u'o///de nas 'dir ni bshod bya ba//'byung ba
73a4(rgyud): 'dul ba'i rgyud chen rgyal//dur khrod 'jig pa'i 'byung chen mo//brgyad po sgru ba'i tshi go ste/dbul po rnams la phan don du//bran mo'i sgrub thabs dam pa'o//dur khrod du srang
73a5(rgyud): nas stong phre ge brgya do bzlas ni sngon du bsnyen pa byis par 'gyur ro//de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas se ldeng gi yam shing zhu dang sbrang rtse dang
73a6(rgyud): mar gyis byugs pas sbyin sreg pa rgya byas na de nas 'byung mo dur khrod du 'dzugam myur du 'ong ste/ngas ci bya zhes me ge gzhug byed par 'gyuraro//zhing bskyed pa'i zhing gi
73a7(rgyud): las byed cing nyi ma re re dang rtse re re steraro//mtshan mo'i zhing gi gsib tu ma nga ste nyo dang shas ji ltar gsungs pa'i gtor ma sbyin zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlos
73b1(rgyud): na las kyi sha za mo ji ltar bstan pa'i lus thams cad byed do//mtshan mo dur khrod du skyong ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na sha za mo nyan rnam myur du bzang mo'i gzugs kyis 'ong ste/
73b2(rgyud): mngag gzhug mar 'gyu ro//khyim gyi les dang /bya bo dang /shugs dang /drag po'i las la sogs po byed de//mtshan mo dur khrod du sa nga nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas ni sha za
73b3(rgyud): mo nyan rnam 'byung mo'i 'khor l-I brgyas yongasu bskor te myur du 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la nya dang sha las byas pa'i gtor ma dmar po byin na dga' bar 'gyu ro//bran gyi las byed
73b4(rgyud): cing ras zung cig dang dong rtse gcig 'bras chan dang rgyan la sogs pa sgrub pa po dang 'gro ba lnga la nyi mo re re ster ro//dpag tshad baurgya nas kyang bud med bzang mo blangs nas ste ro//
73b5(rgyud): mdor na bran dang /bran mo dang 'dra bar ji srid 'tsho'i bur du las thams cad byed do//'byung po 'dul pa'i rgyud chen po las las kyi shwa za mo'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o///
73b6(rgyud): de nas 'byung mo gtum mo chen mo ka ta ya ni gtum mo chen mo langs te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der dpal khro bo'i bdag po chen po'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/rang
73b7(rgyud): gi snying po phul ba/aM truM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ka ta ya na zhi ba ma yi'o//oM b+hu dza la hUM phaT/ka ta ya na chen mo yi'o//oM au tri tri hUM hAM h+ye he phaT phaT swA hA//drag mo ka ta yan
74a1(rgyud): n+ya/yi'o//o rau dr-i b+hU yaM ka ri ar+thA ta si ni sA d+ha ki pri ye mahA da tsi ta ru pe rat+na kArI su bAr+N+Na ha te ya ma nA kr-in+ta ni/sarba duHkha pra sha ma ni/au ai au au/d+hu trA ng+ku twA/shI g+h+rA/
74a2(rgyud): sid d+hi pra yats+tsha hrIHdzA swA hA//byung po'i dbang phyugr-i ma gtum mo ka ta ya na'i 'o//au yaM mi ni kr-in+ta ni a kA la mr-i t+yu ni b+hA ri Ni/khang+ka shu la heste shI b+haM pra sid+d+hi d+hA tu sA d+ha ke mI dzI pa yai tau hIH/
74a3(rgyud): swAhA/ke ta ya ni dregs ma'i'o//oM he ma kuN+Do li d+haka d+ha dz+wa la dz+wA la dI byA kun+da laM b+hu Shi te dA ma ni b+ha ga ban A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ka ta yaM na rna tshan+danAM gyi'i//aM b+h+r-i ku Ta mu khi kaM ha ka ha/d+hA
74a4(rgyud): ba d+hi ba/dz+wa la dz+wa la/hu ta a sa na mu khi A gan+d+he A gats+tsha be ta hod tha bin/A bi sha A bi sha/hUM hUM hUM/phaT baiT phaT/b+ha ga banA Adz+nyA pa ya ti hrIHswA hA/ka ta naM yan rgyal ba'i bzhin
74a5(rgyud): tsan ma'i'o//oM b+hi ku ma tha ni ka ha ka ha dza ya dza ya/sirba a su ra pa tsa te hUM phaT swA hA/ka ta ya na mdzes ma'i 'o//oM su ra ta pI yi daM byA lo tsa ne kA mi shwa ri dza ga da mo ha ni su b+ha ge kAM/
74a6(rgyud): tsa na/a li b+hu Shi de na pu ra shab+de/A bi sha bi sha/bi pu ra pu ra/sAd+ha ka pi ye hrIHswA hA//ka ta ya na des na ma'i'o//ka ta ya na'i 'byung mo brgyad kyi rigs sngags bklag bcom
74a7(rgyud): gyis 'grub pa'o//de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dbyung po chen po'i gdul ba'i rgyud chen po las ka ta yan brgyad po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung mo thams cad sgrub par byed/
74b1(rgyud): pa bshad par bya ste/sor mo rnams phan tshun du bsnol nas mdzub mo brkyang ste bkug pa ni ka ta ya na zhi ba ma'i phyag rgya'o//sor mo rnams nang du bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis bskyil ba ni
74b2(rgyud): ka ta ya na chen mo'i phyag rgya ste 'byung mo ma lus pa 'gugs pa'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo kha ra gtad nas mtho'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni 'byung mo thams cad gsod pa ste/rigs
74b3(rgyud): 'joms par byed po sgrub pa po chen po dga' ba'i 'byung po'i dbang phyug mo'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis myur du 'grub par bya'o//khu tshur gnyis po so sor bcings
74b4(rgyud): nas/mdzub mau gnyis brkyang ba na ka ta ya na dregs ma'i phyag rgya ste dri dang spos dang /de bzhin du me tog gis mchod cing nya dang shi'i gtor ma yong byin na 'byung po thams cad skad cig
74b5(rgyud): de la bran mar 'gyur ro//khu tshur gnyis dam du bcings nos mdzub mo gnyis mkhyad pa ni 'byung mo'i phyag rgya ste/de nyid ka ta ya na gtum mo me 'gebs ma'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo
74b6(rgyud): gnyis brkyang ba ni 'byung mo thams cad sgrub cing 'byung mo rnams 'gyel zhing gsod pa'i phyag rgya ste/rigs rgyud du bcas pa sgrub pa rgyal ba'i bzhin can ma'i phyag rgya ste/'byung mo
74b7(rgyud): ma lus pa dbang du byed pa'o//khu tshur so sor bcings nas mthe'u chung gnyis mkhyud de mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sti bkug pa ni 'jig rten gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i phyag rgya
75a1(rgyud): //ste/drug pa dang tshangs pa dang brgya byin du bcas pa yang 'gugs na/'byu mo phran chags rnams ci smos tI de ni kA t+yA yan mAdzes m+b+ha'i phyug rgyu'o//'byung na
75a2(rgyud): chen mo ka ta ya na brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o////de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba gsang cher 'bying po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'byung mo ka ta
75a3(rgyud): ya na rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshod pa/'byung mo ka ta ya na rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs ni dur khrod du song na sa brgya phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma gsum na 'byung mo thams
75a4(rgyud): cad myur du 'ongs te 'ongs pa la thod pa khrag gis yongasu bkang ste/mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur te/sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra ste/sgrub pa posam gyis shig ces
75a5(rgyud): smras na ma dang 'dra bar yongasu skyong bar byed do//rgyal srid ster zhing bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed le/sgrub pa po rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ro//lo brgya phrag
75a6(rgyud): lnga 'tsho zhing shi nas kyang rgyal rigasu skyo'o//de nas rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na ngos sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro//mtshan mo yang dpal
75a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste bzlas no bud med bzang mo'i gzugs kyis 'dug nas mchog ster ro//mtshan mo ling ga gcig par song ste stong phrag gcig bzlas na nyi
75b1(rgyud): ma cig na rkang gdub kyi sgra thos so//nyi ma gnyis na bud myed bzang mo bdun du 'dug ste/sems sun mi dbyung zhing smra bar yang mi bya'o//nyi ma gsum pa la tshig smra bar byed de/kye
75b2(rgyud): sgrub pa po bka' ci stsal zhes smra ste/sgrub pa pos kye lha mo kye lha mo bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces smras na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bskyon bkur mar 'gyu ro//rgyab tu zhon na ro rab dbang
75b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho la sogs par khyer ro//gzhan yang ngal so ba'i khyim du song ste 'dug na rdzas blangs te//ster bar byed do//'dzam bu'i gling gi khongasu gtogs pa na gzugs mchog dang
75b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i bu mo blangs nas ster ro//de nas 'dod par byas ni lo lnga brgya mtsho zhing shi ba na rgyal phran gyi rigs skye'o//mtshan mo chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste stong phrag brgyad
75b5(rgyud): bzlas na 'byung mi bud med bzang mo'i gzugs can du 'khor dang bac+doMso nas 'ong ste/'ongs pa la 'bod par mi bya zheng sun dbyung bar mi bya ste/mi sme bar gyur pas chags pa spyang
75b6(rgyud): na nyi ma re re rtag tu gnas par 'gyu ro//dang tshe lnga dang ras phrugs cig ster ro//mtshan mo skyed mos tshal du song ste brgyad stong bzlas na nyi ma gsum ni rkang gdub kyi sgra thos so
75b7(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin 'byung mo 'ong ba mthong ngo //nyi ma ldan mdun na 'dug go//nyi ma drug na dong tshe lnga steraro//nyi ma bdun ni yang 'ong ste khyim dang bcas nas 'ongs pa la chags pa byas nas
76a1(rgyud): chung mar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du nyi ma brgyad pa la snga su man+tal byas la gu gul gyi bdug pa byin te/stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'byung mo'i bu mo'i gzugs kyis
76a2(rgyud): khyim dang bcas nas 'ongs te 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung ma re 'gyuraro//lha'i mu ti gi gi do shal mal du bor nas tho rangs kyis 'gro ste/des kyang mu tig gi do shal blang
76a3(rgyud): bor bya'o//blangs pa tsam gyis dong tshe nyi shu rtsa lnga da ras zung gcig ster ro//dgu thams cad 'joms par byed cing tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/shi nas rgyal rigs su
76a4(rgyud): skye'o//lha khang stong par spong nas mtshan mo brgyad stong zlas na nyi ma gsum na 'byung mo rang nyid snang ba chen po byaso nas 'khor brgyad brgyas yongasu bskor te nges par 'ong ngo //
76a5(rgyud): 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur te/chung mar 'gyur la/dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len dang /rdzas kyis grub pa ster ro//'khor brgyad
76a6(rgyud): brgya gos dang /rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro//lo lnga stong 'tsho zhing /gang gi tshe 'chi ba na rgyal rigs skye'o//mtshan mo rgyal po'i khab tu song ste//stong phrag brgyad
76a7(rgyud): bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro//nub sngar ka ra bo ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar te/ma la ti'i me tog zho mar gyis byugs te brgyad brgya bsregs na/'byu
76b1(rgyud): memi'i rgyal mo laSh+Tor lnga brgya'i rkang gdub kyi sgra chen pos myur du 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la me tog go mchod yon byin na/mA dang srod mo dang chung mar 'gyuraro//gal te mar gyur na sems
76b2(rgyud): sun 'byung bar mi bya ste/lhas 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster zhing gser srang 'bum ster ro//gal te sring mor gyur na ni rgyal srid ster zhing dpag tshing stong nas kyang bud med blangs
76b3(rgyud): nas stir ro//gal te chung mar gyur na ni bud med mdzes ma lta bus lus kyi longs spyod ster zhing ro ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do//lo khri 'tsho zhing gang gi tshe 'chi ba
76b4(rgyud): nA rgyal rigasu skye bar byed do//de nas zla ba nya ba la khri bzlas pa byas nas mtshan mo lho khang du song ste//mchod pa rgyas par byas nas mtshon thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par
76b5(rgyud): 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la khrog gi mchod yin byinu na dga' bar 'gyur zhing mngag gzhug par 'byo ro//nyi ma re re dang tse lnga lnga ster zhing lha'i 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro//lo lnga brgya
76b6(rgyud): 'tsho bar 'gyur//'di n+ti ka ta ya na brgyad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o////de nas rnam par bshad par bya//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen gyi//bran po dang ni byin mo dag/sgrub
76b7(rgyud): bar byed pa'i cho ga'o//oM rA hu rA hu ma hA tsa tu ka nan+da ri d+ha nan hi ta ha ra thA ya/oM hra tra hra tra hra/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/mAM sa sid+d+him+me pra yets+tsha swA hU~M//ra skyes nag po'i sha bcing ba'i sngags te/
77a1(rgyud): mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/sha thams cad btsong ba'i las 'grub par 'gyu ro//mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas sha srang brgyad
77a2(rgyud): khyer nas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/kye kye dur khrod na gnas po'i 'byung mo rnams sha nyo 'am zhes bos nas dam ze'i gzugs kyi mdun du 'dag ste/kye skyes bu chen po
77a3(rgyud): tso bzhed ces smra na/sgrub pa po yis gser 'dod do zhes smra ste/gser srang brgya ster bar byed do//de nas sha sbyin te/gral te mi 'dod na mig dang spyi bo 'gas po 'am 'chi bar
77a4(rgyud): 'gyu ro//de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen po rig 'dzin bye ba du mas yongasu bskor te//lho'i bu mo du ma dang /gnod sbyin dang /klu dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po khri
77a5(rgyud): brgyad stong du ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshon po der dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/zhabs la mgo bos pag
77a6(rgyud): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la mi phyed par bstan pa/khams gsum pa'i rgyal po
77a7(rgyud): chen po 'byung po dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /rig 'dzin rnams 'jig par byed pa/bgegs thams cad 'joms pa/sdug bsngal ba dang /nyon mongs po thams
77b1(rgyud): cad sol ba/gdon thams cad dang /ro langs dang /lus srul po rnams gsod pa/dkyil 'khor gsang chen thams cad 'grub par byed pa bya shad du gsol/de nas 'khor bya
77b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khar der gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'byung po'i dbang phyug lho chen po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/legs
77b3(rgyud): legaso//lha chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la phan pa'i don du 'byung po thams cad dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /me 'am ci rnamaso bra na mir sgrub pa'i
77b4(rgyud): thabs khro bo'i bdag po chen pos gsungs shig/de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen pos dam pa ste//gru bzhi pa lo sgo bzhi pa//rta babs dag ni bzhis brgyan
77b5(rgyud): cing //cha rnams bcu drug dag dang ldan//rdo rje ra bas mdzes bya ba//de dbus dgod bya drag po ste//'bar ba'i phreng ba yang dag 'khrug/khro bo chen po phyag bzhi pa//mig sman sbyangs
77b6(rgyud): ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //phyag g.yas kyis ni rdo rje gsor//g.yon pa'i phyag gis bsdogs mdzub mdzad//zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa ste//sbrul brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan
77b7(rgyud): thong ba'i phreng ba'i cod pan can//'jig rten gsum yang 'jigs byed cing //sgra cher drag tu bzhad mdzad la//'jig rten gsum po'i bdag po ste/g.yon brkyang ba yis/
78a1(rgyud): legs par bzhugs//nyi ma bye ba'i gzi ldan la//gzhan gyis mi thub zhabs kyis mnan//phyag rgya bcing bsdu bzhugs pa ste//sprin lag gnyis ni mkhyud//
78a2(rgyud): nas su//mdzub ma gnyis ni bkug byas te//mthe'u chung dang nI gung mo dag/mthe bo yis na mnan byas pa//dpal ldan 'di 'dra'i rgya 'dzin cing //'jig rten gsum gyi 'byor
78a3(rgyud): 'grub pa'o//khro bo'i mdun du u ma yi//bdag po yang dag bri bar bya//lho ru khyab 'jug bri ba ra bya//nub tu tshangs pa lha nyid do//byang du bdag po smin drug go/dbang ldan
78a4(rgyud): du ni tshogs bdag po//'od zer stong gis mdzes pa ni//me yi grang nau be bar bya//sgra gcan bden bral gr-i ru bri//dga' ba'i dbang phyug rlung gi grA ra//ga ser gyi kha dog lta
78a5(rgyud): bu'i lus//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//cung zad dged cing chags pa yis//bcom ldan 'das la blta ba yi//mchod pa'i lha mo gnas pa rnams//dkyil
78a6(rgyud): 'khor phyi rol bya bya ste//khro bo yi ni g.yon log su//lha mo um bri bar bya//khro bo yi ni mdun nyid du//dpal gyi lha mo bri bar bya//lag pa me tog thogs pa'o//
78a7(rgyud): bo yi nau g.yas logasu//rgyan kun gyis na brgyan byas shing //lag pa ni ni spos thogs pa'i//thig le mchog ni legs par br-i//khro bo yi ni rgyab kyi char//lha yi rna
78b1(rgyud): rgyus rgyan pa yi//la ka na mar me thogs par ni//zla ba'i lha mo bri bar bya//lha yi rna chas rgyan pa yi//lag na lha yi dri thogs pa//rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi//lha mo me yi gra ru/
78b2(rgyud): byi//klu dang snyan ngags mang smra ba'i//tshig dbang lha mo srin por bri//gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ma//sdug gu mdzes ma zhes grags pa//lag nA ron chen phreng thogs pa//rlung
78b3(rgyud): gA grAr ni bri bar bya//'byung po kun gyi dbang phyug rgyas//mi dbyung zhes bya'o 'byung mo ni//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ru//dbang ldan gra ru bre bar bya//bzhin bzang mig
78b4(rgyud): gi dkyus ring zhing //gzugs dang lang chos rgyan pa la//mdog ni gser dang 'dra ba ste//skra ni mthon mthing 'khyil ba la//yan lag kun mdzes lha mo ni//sgrub pa'i rigs la
78b5(rgyud): dga' rnamaso//brgya byin shar du bri bya ste//me ni me ru lags pa ra bri//lhor ni gshin rje'i rgyal po ste//srin po'i bdag po bden bral du//nub tu chu yi rgyal po'o//rlung du rlung
78b6(rgyud): gi lha nyid do//byang du lus ngan rgyal po bdag/dbang ldan zla ba bri bye ste//rang rang gnasu dgod par bya//de nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/rdo rje slob
78b7(rgyud): dpon bdag nyid gtsug tor sngon po bcings te/ras sngon po zung cig bgos nas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad ces brjod do//sems can kun la phan don du//myur du
79a1(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa//grub pa'i rdo rje khro bo che//lha nyid dam tshig la bzhugs shig/de nas dpal khro bo chen po lha nyid dam tshig la bzhugs shig
79a2(rgyud): ces brjod do//de'i 'og tu dpal khro bo chen po'i phyag rgya bcings ti gzhug cing 'di skad ces brjod de//hUM badz+ra phaT/'di skad brjid patsam gyis bdag nyid khro bo 'jug go//de nas
79a3(rgyud): slob ma gzhug par bya ste//ras sngon pos gdong g.yogs nas khro bo'i phyag rgya spyi borare bzhag ste/rdo rje'i chu khar sbyin par bya'o//oM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi hUM hUM 'dis sbyin par bya'o//oM
79a4(rgyud): pra bye sha kro d+ha tA hUM hUM oM/'di dang khro bo dbab pa'i phyag rgyas dbab par bya ste/yi ge hU~M gis ri rab kyi steng na 'dug pa yang 'o byebs shing 'das pa dang /ma 'angs pa dang /da ltar 'byung ba
79a5(rgyud): yod smra bar byed do//de nas me tog dor bar byas nas de'i 'og tu gdong g.yogs bkrol te lha'i rigs pa ston cing ming gi dbang bskur te mchod par bya zhing /phyag rgya dang sngags
79a6(rgyud): kyis bslob par bya'o//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzogaso////de nas 'dir 'byung po 'dul po'i rgyud chen po las cho ga rgyas
79a7(rgyud): par bshad pa/dang por shig lag pa gnyis la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/de dag gi dbus su yi ge hUM 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa bsams te/sngags 'di
79b1(rgyud): /bzlas par bya'o//oM sr-id+d+hi badz+ra hU~M/de nas sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags bzlas te/snying khur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/de'i steng du yi ger dmar po thig le dang
79b2(rgyud): sa pad+mo 'byung ba'i phreng ba'i blugs par ba sams nas sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i sngag sa 'di bzlas s+ho//oM han bi nas ya ba~Mdz+nyA nA sa ya~M/nA sha ya sa pad+hU hU~M/
79b3(rgyud): thothigs kho nar stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/mdun du me tog kun da dang /shel lta bur bltas nas de'i dbus su yi ge hUM dang /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par ba sems te de'i dbus su
79b4(rgyud): yi ge hUM 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun nas 'khrugs pa rnam par bsams la/khro bo dbab pa'i sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o//oM kr-i d+ha A be shA ya hUM hU~M hUM a/de nas khro bo dbes pa'i
79b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings te/sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o//oM badz+ra A b+he sha ya/A bai sh+tsa ya pA ta pI ShA ya ts+tshi na rang lha'i skur bsdam mo//de nas khro bo'i bdag po khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas
79b6(rgyud): yon log drug tu dgod par bya ste/oM ha na badz+ra hU~M/spyi bor ro//oM d+ha ra badz+ra hU~M spyi gtsug tu'o//a dIp+te badz+ra hUM/mig tu'o//oM badz+ra ro ShA na hUM/snying khyer ro//oM badz+ra dr-iD+ha badz+ra/
79b7(rgyud): hUM/go cha'o//oM ha na da ha pa tsa/kro d+ha badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na/mA ra ya hUM phaT/mtshon che'o//khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag yan lag drug la dgod par gsungaso//de nas dkyil 'khor
80a1(rgyud): gyi lha'i snying pos spyan drang sde/sor mo phan tshun du bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo bkug pa'i phyag rgya 'di la sngags sbyar bar bya'o//oM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha
80a2(rgyud): sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya shI g+h+raM/oM gats+tsha hrIHdzaHhUM phaT swA hA//'dis lha thams cad spun dang par bya'o//au saurba de ba ta pra sid d+ha hUM au au nA shi ya duSh+mA na da ha pa tsa duSh+Ten/
80a3(rgyud): b+hasmi ku ru hU~M hUM phaT phaT stang stabs kyi'o//oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA par+t+ta/ban d+hi ban d+ha/da shi dwe sha hUM phaT/phyogs bcing ba'o//oM b+huM d+hU ba swAhA/lha chen po'i'o//oM A shrI
80a4(rgyud): badz+ra ha nI yai swAhA/khyab 'jug gi'o//oM de baM ku ru d+he d+ha rI ya swA hA/skye dgu'i bdag pa'i'o//a hrIHkr-i tsa shak+te d+hA ra Ni phaT phaT/gzhon nu'i sngagaso//oM gr-i ga Na pa ta ya
80a5(rgyud): sA hA/tshogs bAdag gi'o//aM shrI tsa ya a tra kiM NaM swA hA/nyi ma'o//oM nar+t+ti shA rA ya/nA ta nA ta d+hIHsU hUM/dga' ba'i dbang phyug gi'o//oM tsin+na she kra pa ra kra ma ye hUM phaT/sgra
80a6(rgyud): gcin gyi'o//aM sa ra swa t+yai gAt+tA ye sarba swA hA/dbyangs can ma'i'o//aM shr-I tsa na ma/rtsom mi mo'i'o//oM tsan+d+ra ya shrI swA hA/steng gi zla ba'i 'o//de nas mchod pa'i lha
80a7(rgyud): mo rnams kyi snying po bshad pa/aM na maHlha mo u mo'i 'o//oM shrI na maHdpal gyi lha mo'i'o//aM na ma/thig le mchog ma'o'o//oM shrI na maHzla ba ma'i'o//aM yak+ShaM shA
80b1(rgyud): dasaH/sdug du mdzes pa gra/u U dz+nyA na mau 'byung ma'aM'o// nasmA 'byung mo sgra spyang ma brgyad gyu//oM ya shrA bam sa/'byung po brgyad kyi snying po ste snyam brnyan//
80b2(rgyud): 'byung 'dul ba tu b+haN+Dal pa chen po las dngas grub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshi ga rgyas pa'i lce'u dzAgs/de nas 'byung po 'du la ba'i hU~M kyi rgya la brten pal
80b3(rgyud): byug d+hA'i mtshan nyid kyi che ga rgyas pa bshad pa/sri ma phan tshun bsnol nas mdzub mo gnyis pakrab pA lca brgyung ba byas pa ni sdig pa'i joms pa'i phyug d+hA'o//khu DU
80b4(rgyud): phan tshun bcangs nas mdzub mo gnyis mkhyud pa ni khro ba dbab po'i phyig rgya ste/'jig rten gsum skad cig gis 'be'os pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o//de nas yon lag drug gis
80b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bshad pa/khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te/gung mo'i sor mo brkyang ba ni spyi bo'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo nang du bcug nas 'dzub mo khab ltar byas pa ni
80b6(rgyud): smyo gtsug gi phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo'i rtsar mthe bong do zhag ste/mtho bong g.yas po mgo g.yas par bzhag ste/mthe bong g.yon pa mig g.yon par
80b7(rgyud): bzhag pa ni mag gi phyag rgya'o//khu tshur so sor bcangs te//mthe'u chung gnyis mkhyud la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni snying kha'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya de nyid lasi mdzub mo bsgri
81a1(rgyud): ba byas pa ni go cha'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni mtshon cha'i phyag rgya'o//snying pa mnyam par byas nas mtho bong gnyis mdzub mo la bcangs/
81a2(rgyud): ba ni yon chab kyi phyog rgya'o//khu tshu ro so sor bcangs pa la mthe bong brkyang ba ni stang stabs kyi phyag rgya'o//khu tshur so sor thaM dad par bcangs te//mdzub mo g.yon pa
81a3(rgyud): brkyang nas dpung po g.yas pa'i rtsa bar bzhag go/g.yas pas mthe bong mthe'u chung gi sor mo mnan te/sor mo lhag ma brkyang nas phyogs bcur bskur ba ni bcing
81a4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nas lha chen po'i phyag rgya bshad pa/thal mo mnyam par sbyar te/mthe'u chung dang srin lag bkug pa ni drag po'i phyog rgya'o//thal mo mnyam par
81a5(rgyud): sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis mkhyud de bkug pa ni sred med kyi bu'i dung gi phyag rgya'o//sdor mo phan tshun bsnol nas mtha'u chung rab tu brkyong pa ni//skye dgu'i bdag po'i sde
81a6(rgyud): blugs kyi phyag rgya'o//lag po g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/gung mo sor brkyang ba ni/khrung khrung 'joms pa'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o//gung mo sor mo'i tshigs bkug pa
81a7(rgyud): ni tshigs kyo bdag pa'i dgra sta'i phyag rgyar//thal mo mnyam par byas nas bkri shis kyi log par byas te/g.yon pa'o mthe'u chung gis snying po byas nas g.yon pa'i
81b1(rgyud): mtha ba'i rtsomar gnag ts+tshang g.yas pa mtho ba de'i steng du bzhag pa ni nyi ma'i shing rta phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas sam mdzub ma dang smon lag pakug pan
81b2(rgyud): gcan gyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa gar gyi tshul gyis g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/mdzub mo dang gung me brkyang nas mthe bong gi
81b3(rgyud): mthe'u chung dang /srin lag gi sen mo mnan pa ni dga' ba'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o//khu tshur sor thA dad par bcings te mthe'u chung ma khyud pa ni lha mo dka' bzlog ma'i phyag rgya
81b4(rgyud): lag po gnyis ka gdangs ka ltar bstan te/spyi bar bzhag pa ni dpa lo lha mo'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do//thal mo sbyar nas ni mkha' la bskyed pa ni zla ba'i phyag rgya'o//khru
81b5(rgyud): tshuchu so sar bcangs la mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo mkhyud pa ni lha mo zla ba ma'i phyag rgya'o//de nas rin chen rgyan tsan ma'i phyag rgya bshad pA/ chur sA sor bcings te mdzub ma
81b6(rgyud): gnyis brkyang nas rin po che'i rnam pas dpral ba'i phyogasu phreng ba btsongs te bzhag pa ni rin chen brgyan can ma'i phyag rgya ste/sngags ni/oM rat+na shrI swA hA/de nas dbyangs
81b7(rgyud): can ma'i phyag rgya bshad pa/sor mo phan tshun ma khyod de/mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas khar bzhag pa'o//thig le mochog ma'i phyag rgya bshad pa/sor mo phan tshun du pad+ma 'a
82a1(rgyud): na bras dz+ra / ga gas mags ts+tsha //na rnam pa pa//ga sasas so ma
82a2(rgyud): cig brgyang ba myur bas ste nga g+sag pan rnam ma //de nas byung chog rgyas por ga ga/ shA sa swAH/shad du ba na//
82a3(rgyud): pa b+h+rUM/ Sh+T+rI nAg yad+hi bat+ta ma s+yA/nA/swA~M t+pa la ba ma la swAH/rlu dur+dz+dza ki wAl//oM ku b+he d+hA /yAm+b+ha s+ye d+h+web+ha tu mA~M /byed
82a4(rgyud): na a m+b+ha/dbang na na suM hU~M//oM yU shwad+hA ya sa/de ni hU~Mg su dbang ldan de//den pa zhi nang sbyin pa thams da
82a5(rgyud): sgyu ma jug su mdzes pa'i byug rgyu shing go/ snar shA 'o//den ste 'i smye / n+da sa
82a6(rgyud): mi ni nyis ma byang naso pa sngogs mdzub byas te 'dzin pa ni 'byung po'i dbang phyag 'byung mi thams ci kyi 'i phyin rgyu'o//de 'i rgyu ma /
82b1(rgyud): byugats+tsha bshad pa// chungs su brgyangs tu mdzub m+bu gnyis ma spyod pa ni 'byung mo brgyud /ga d+hA'o//ngan su sto //lag khar chog rgyas pad+ma bshud pa ni lag pa g.yas pa/
82b2(rgyud): byol mi mnyam par byas te/mthu bas mthe' rlung gis ram mnan nas sor mi lhag ma bonam pan ba rnon gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//lhag pa g.yon pa'i thal ma mnyam par byas
82b3(rgyud): ten+yang zad ba rgyud pon mi'i phyug nA'o//lhag po g.yas par khu tshur brdungs te mdzub mo btung ba ni gshin rje'i b+h+yog ti'i phyag rgya'o//lhag pa g.yas pa khwa rgyur brdungs/
82b4(rgyud): mdzu mo dang gling mo brgya dzin sbyin pa'i bdag pa'i ma gro'i hU~Mg d+hag/lag pa gtsun pa'i chung ba des ti ma dzu ma brgyu nas bskul ban nu lta nigs pa'i
82b5(rgyud): /lage g.yon pa'i tshur bcang sal mdzub ma dang phung po btung ba ni rlung lta'i bdun gyi phyag d+hA ka/lag pa g.yas pa khu na ro bcangs te mthi bang brgyang zin rnam
82b6(rgyud): bris kyi klud ba che'i byeg rgyu'o//lag pa g.yon pa khrin+da r+ya bcings te mtho dung gis sor mi mnanonas ser me lhag ma bat+tAng ba ni bye ldan gyi shu la'i phyag N+DI'o//nas
82b7(rgyud): sngags par byed pa'i rgyun rgya shad pa/thal ma byung zini rdzogs par byed pa'i phyin //sngags bsha ga/oM d+hi badz+ra/a su ya i su si hUM rdzogs pa byed
83a1(rgyud): pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o//de nas dngos grub dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bshad pa/khu tshur so sor bcangs nas mthe'u chung gnyis mkhyud de/mdzub mo gnyis
83a2(rgyud): brkyang nas bskyil ba ni dngos grub dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o//sngags ni/oM badz+ra ro Sha Na ma hA kro d+ha sid+d+he A kaR+Sha yaM hUM dzaHdngos grub dgug pa'i sdigaso//rgyal po chen pa'i dngos
83a3(rgyud): grub ni/khro ba'i bstan pa'i dngos grub ste/lha rnams kun gyi dngos grub mchog/bdag la myur du sgrib tu gsol/rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs de dang 'di brjod par bya'o//de nas
83a4(rgyud): 'byung mo'i gdong gi phyag rgya bshad pa/lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo mnyam par byas nas mo the bI s+tho s+t+rai lhag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis leg pa g.yon pa'i gzhan gyis mi
83a5(rgyud): /thub pa'i phyag rgya btsongs te g.yas pa'i mthe bong skrang ba ni rdo rje 'chang gi 'byung pa gdan gyi phyag rgya'o//oM dza ya dza ya ma hA kro d+ha e d+hi pa ti kro d+ha rA dza i maM b+hU ta A sa naM/daR+sha ya
83a6(rgyud): rak+Sha swA hA/gdan gyi sngagaso//de nas lha'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bshad pa/thal mo sbyar ba bya sau te sor mo thams cad bkram pa ni pad+ma'i phyag rgyar brjod pa ste/'di ni phyag rgya'o//
83a7(rgyud): sngags ni/oM pad+mo b+ha ga ba ni Shan Na sarba de ba tI swA hA//lha thams cad kyi gdan gyi pad+mo'i phyag rgya dang sngag so//pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo g.yon pa bsgrol bas lha
83b1(rgyud): /thams rgyud spyan drang ba dang /gshogasu gsol ba'i phyag rgyu ste/sngags ni/oM sA r+ya sa ra/bI sar bi sa ra/gats+tsha gats+tsha sarbado ba d+hAnA~M/shrI bad+d+ha d+ha rA sam Ad+b+ha ba ya ti s+yAH/gshegs
83b2(rgyud): su gso' ba'i sngagaso//khro chen thams cad grub mdzod po/dngos grub bde bar sbyin mdzad pa//mthu chen bla na mod pa ni//bdag la sbrul tu gshegs gsal//bstod pa 'dis
83b3(rgyud): bstod par bya'o//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/dngos grub kyi tshig dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa rdzogs////de nas khro bo'i bdag po chen po phyag na rdo rjes
83b4(rgyud): 'di skad ce so gsungs so//dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid 'thob cing 'di'i rdo rje 'chang bzlas pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par
83b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro//gal te ma grub na yang gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro//dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po bzlas pa tsam gyis 'byung po thams cad bran du 'gyur/
83b6(rgyud): ro//gal te sngags pa khros na khros pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad dum bu brgyar zhig par 'gyur ro//klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis
83b7(rgyud): gsod cing 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad hUM gi sgra tsam gyis 'bros par byed do//de nas dpol rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po'i sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba bshad pa/
84a1(rgyud): bdag nyid srung ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas na myur du 'grub par byed pa'o//de nas dpal rdo rje 'chang sgrub par 'dod na/ba gcig tu dus gsum du stong phrag re bzlas
84a2(rgyud): nenas de nas zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings te mtshan thog thag bzlas//de nas tho rangs sa g.yo ba dang /phyag rgya 'bar bar 'gyur te/'bar
84a3(rgyud): ba tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing /rga ba dang 'tsho ba med la lha'i gzugasu 'gyur ro//de nas lha mo sgrub par 'dod na/lha mo dka' bzlog rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas khri
84a4(rgyud): bzlas na lha mo rang nyid 'ong zhing /dngos grub kyi rjes dang dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len gyi grub pa ster zhing chung mar 'gyur ro//gal te ma grub na dug dang lan tshwas byugs te/rkang pa
84a5(rgyud): g.yas pas mnan nas khro bo'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ste/oM ha na ha na badz+ra mA ra ya che ge mo hUM phaT/khro ba 'di dang bcas pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/bzlas pa tsam
84a6(rgyud): gyis skye bo 'gas pa 'am bskams nas 'chi'o//de bzhin du khro bo'i sngags kyis bsad pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//de nas dpal lha mi sgrub par 'did na/dpal lha mo rkang pa
84a7(rgyud): g.yon pas mnan te khri bzlas na/dpal lha mo 'ong ste me tog gi stan byin zhing legs par 'ongaso zhes brjod la chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo nas ji ltar 'dod pa ltar spyad na
84b1(rgyud): rgyal srid ster bar byed do//de nas 'jigs byed ma rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te khri bzlas na/'jigs byed mA rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong ste bran mo'i las rnams byed do//tsa mun ti rkang pa g.yon
84b2(rgyud): pos minan te khri bzlos na tsa mun ti rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong ste/tsa mun ti bra ni mor 'gyuraro//de bzhin du ma ma'i bsgrub pa thams cad la mnan te bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur
84b3(rgyud): ro//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las sgrub pa'i thibs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba dang po rdzogaso////phyag na rdo rje gtum po l-i phyag 'tshalo//de
84b4(rgyud): nas shin tu 'da' bor dka' ba mchog tu drag po chen pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs shin tu drag po las thams cad sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa/l-i ka gcig po rkang pa g.yon pas/
84b5(rgyud): mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na lha chen po myur du 'ong ngo //gal te ma 'ongs na de'i mod lam tshe'o//sred med kyi bu mnan te nyi ma bdun du stong phrag bdun bzlas
84b6(rgyud): na nyi ma bdun pa la nges par 'ong ngo //gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas pa'am/bskams par 'gyur ro//nges par sred med kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pa mngag gzhug
84b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//tshangs pa mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun nu myur bar 'ong ste/gal tam 'ongs na bskams te mchi'o//mngag gzhug par 'gyuraro//bany+tsa
85a1(rgyud): byin rkang pa g.yan pas mnan te nyi ma bdun du snang phyug brgyad bzlas na nyo ma bdun na nges pa pa dang sgro gal to ma 'ongs na ngos parla 'tsho bar 'gyur /
85a2(rgyud): 'dis brgya byin mdog gzhug par 'gyur zhing pang na gnas pa blangs te ster bar byed do//gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing dum bu brgyar 'jig la/rang gi rigs
85a3(rgyud): rgyud rnams brlag par 'gyu ro//gzhon nu mnan nAs stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun myur du 'ong ste//gzhon nu mngag gzhug par 'gyur//gzhon nu'i gdon
85a4(rgyud): thams cad bran du 'gyur zhing /che ge mo'i tshe bar gyis shrIg/che ge mo song nAg tse swa sgras ni de dag thams cad byed do//tshogs kyi bdag pa mnan te steng phyug brgyad
85a5(rgyud): bzlas na nyi ma bdun ni myur du 'ong ste/gal te ma 'ongs na rigs rgyud brlag cing 'chi bar 'gyuraro//log 'dren thams cad mngag gzhug par 'gyur//nyi ma rkang pa
85a6(rgyud): g.yon pas mnan te brgyad steng bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong ste rgyal srid ster ro//gal te ma 'ongs na 'chi ba 'am/rang gi rgyud brlag par 'gyur//zla ba mnan
85a7(rgyud): te brgyad stong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong zhing mngagi gzhug par 'gyur la ga ser srang brgya ster ro//gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing bskams te 'chi bar
85b1(rgyud): 'gyur//rang gi rigs dang /rgyud phung bar yang 'gyur//'di ni zla ba 'khor du bsgrub par bshad pa'o//'jigs byed rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad
85b2(rgyud): bzlas na yang mtshan mo mchod pa chen po byas te she chen pos mchod pa byas na sa sha chen po'i gtor ma byas te/shi chen po nyid kyi til gyis mar me rab tu sbar te/nam phyed na
85b3(rgyud): sgra chen po byung ste drag tu dgod cing bsdad ni/kyo skyes bu chen po 'di bza' yis slang cig ces zer ro//des skrag par mi bya ste/gal te skrag par gyur ni yi ge hUM bzlas ni bde
85b4(rgyud): ber gnas par 'gyur ro//'jigs byed 'khor dang bcas pa bran du 'gyur ro//khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid ster zhing yi ge hUM bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten po'i lha thams
85b5(rgyud): cad 'jom so//gar gyi dbang phyug rkang po g.yon pas mnan te/nyi ma bdun du brgyad stong bzlas na skad cig de la 'ong zhing mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro//gal te ma 'ongs na skam
85b6(rgyud): pa'am 'chi bar 'gyuraro//nag po chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/stong phrag brgyud bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te 'ong ngo //gral te ma 'ongs na
85b7(rgyud): skad cig de nyid la 'che zhing rang gi rigs rgyud phung bar 'gyur ro//lha nag pa chen po 'khor gyi tshigs dang bcas pa mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro//gdong bzhi pa phyug po'i
86a1(rgyud): khang par song ste/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas khri phrag bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te 'ong ngo //gal te ma 'ongs na rigs dang
86a2(rgyud): brgyud brlag par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad kyis g.yog 'khor du 'gyur la/rgyab tu zhen nas mtho ri su yang khyer ro//pang pa na gnas pa blangs nas ster zhing dngul/
86a3(rgyud): chu dang bcud kyis lan bzang po ster ra//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'tshong gis de skad ces gsungaso//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mngag gzhug
86a4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzog so////de nas stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa/'jig rten gsum gyis phye ga byas pa'i bran ma sgrub pa'i thabs khris
86a5(rgyud): nyid kyis mi rnams la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa dngos grub kyi mchog rgyas par bshad par bya ste/le lo can dang /sdig pa byed pa dang /brdzun du smra bas kyang 'grub
86a6(rgyud): par byed do//tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /zang zing spangs pa dang /tshangs par spyod pa la rtag tu gnas pa dang /rtag tu khro bo'i bzlas pa la gnas pas 'byung mo dang /
86a7(rgyud): klu mo dang /gnod sbyin mo sgrub par 'dod na sngags kyi tshogs kyis dgug pa la sbyang bar bya'o//lha mo u ma sgrub par byed pa rnams la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur mar
86b1(rgyud): bshad pa'o//dang por bsgrub par bya zhing de'i 'og tu dngos grub kyi mchog bzang po rig 'dzin dang /phyogs kyi bdag po dang /nor gyi char dang /gter chen po dang /yid bzhin gyi
86b2(rgyud): nor bu dang /bum pa bzang po la sogs pa dang /gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa dang /sha za mo dang /sa la 'joms ma la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams 'grub ste/sangs rgyas nyid kyang
86b3(rgyud): 'grub na/tha ma la 'byung me bran du bya ba rnams lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro//'byung po 'dul byed kyi rgyud chen po la ni sgrib pa po rtag tu khro bo'i blos
86b4(rgyud): pa la gnas na slob dpon la smod pa dang /lha thams cad spyod pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /thams cad du dam chog nyams pa dang /med pa dang /sngags dang rgyud
86b5(rgyud): spangs pas kyang gal te 'dod na nges par de'i mod la myur du 'grub par 'gyur bar khro bo nyid kyis gsungs//bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag pos 'di skad ces
86b6(rgyud): gsungaso//de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs pa/dang po shig bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par byed pa bran//
86b7(rgyud): po dang /bran mo thams nad sgrub par byed pa/dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po bzlas pa tsam gyis myur du 'grub par byed pa/don yod cing bgegs 'joms la grub por byed
87a1(rgyud): pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams//oM hrI hU~M ka Tu ka Tu/cho ga ma hU~M hU~M d+hA dza/khra ba 'di dang bcas pas brgyad brgya bzlas pa tsam gyis myur du 'ong ste/thams cad
87a2(rgyud): bran dang bran mor 'gyur ro//gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gis shing bskams te 'tshe lo/rigs dang rang gi rigs brgyud brlag par 'gyur ro//'ubye mo'i gzugs ba lang gi
87a3(rgyud): ge'u ldeng gis bris te/rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na skad cig de la kye mra kye ma zhes zer zhing 'ong ste/'gu mo 'gum mo//kye sgrub pa po bka' ci
87a4(rgyud): stsol zhes zer ro//sgrub pa pos kyi 'byung mo bdag gi khol mo gyis shig ces smras na de khol mo'i las thams cad byed do//gro bo'i shun pa la ba lang gi gi'u wang gis
87a5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de'i mod la 'ong ngo //gal te de'i mod lo ma 'ongs na nyungs kar gyis kha la bsnun cing sgra chen
87a6(rgyud): pos bskul ni 'byung mo de rims drag pos 'chi'o//phyir gso ba ni ma ri dang spra rtsi khar bcug na slar 'tsho'o//'byung mo 'dis bran mo'i las byed cing sgrib pa po bdag
87a7(rgyud): nyid dang gsum la gos dang /rgyan dang /bza' ba nyi mo re ra ster ro//gtsug lag khang gi sgrar sing ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas ni 'dis pa glang mo'i blo gros zhes bya
87b1(rgyud): ba'i 'byung ma 'ong ste/'ongs pa la gtor ma byin na sdug pangs ci bya zhes smra'o//ma gyis shig ces bskyon/ma dang 'dra bar yongasu skyong zhing bdag nyid dang lnga la gos dang /rgyan dang /
87b2(rgyud): bza' bo la sogs pa ster ro//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/bran mo sgrub pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzog so////de nas mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gos
87b3(rgyud): ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshi ga rgyas por bshad par bya ste/dbul po rnams la phan pa'i don du dngos grub kyi
87b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa'o//de la 'byung mo rnams kyi ming bshad pa/rgyan can ma dang /rna can ma dong /do shal can ma dang /seng ge ma dang /rgod byed ma
87b5(rgyud): dang /gar byed ma dang /dga' ba ma dang /'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /lha mo rnam so//'byung mo brgyad po rnams chung mar don du gnyer ram/mar gnyer ram/yang na srin
87b6(rgyud): por gnyer na/sgrub pa po shing gcig par song ste/mtshon mo dang nyin mo dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas bzlas pa'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas gu gul
87b7(rgyud): gyis gdug pa byin te bzlas na des nas nam phyed kyi dus su rgyan can ma nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i yon che ba byin na dga' bar 'gyur ro//mo dang sring mi
88a1(rgyud): dang chung mar 'gyur te/gang mngon par 'dad pa de smra bar bya'o//gal+yA ta myur gyur na ni 'khor brgyad brgya'i gos dang /rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs sbyar ro//
88a2(rgyud): gral te chung mar gyur na ni dang tshe stong stong ster zhing /dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster ro//gal te sring mor gyur na ni dpag tshad stong nos bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster
88a3(rgyud): zhing dang lechu dang bcud kyis len sbyar la/lha'i gter sbyor re//mtshan mar dur khrod du song ste khri bzlas pa'i mthar rna cha dang /do shal can gyi 'byung mo nges par 'ong ngo /
88a4(rgyud): 'ongs po le khrag gi mched yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur//ma gyis shig ces basbyin me dang 'dra ba ri yongasu skyong bar byed de//mtshan mo lha khang stong par song ste khri bzlas
88a5(rgyud): na 'byung mo do shal can myur du 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la tshogs pa spyad na chung mar 'gyur//'gro ba bcu gnyi sa yongasu sbyong bar byed cing dang tshe nyi shu rtswa lnga dang ras zung cig
88a6(rgyud): sbyar ro//de nas seng gri mi'i sgrub thabs bshad pa mtshan ma long ga gcig par song ste khri bzlas na rang nyid 'ongs shing /kyo sgrub pa po bka' tse stsa la zhes smra zhing /sgrub
88a7(rgyud): pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces sgron lha'i dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len ster zhing /deng rtse brgyad dang ras zung gcig stor//de nas rgod byed mi'i sgrub thibs bshad/
88b1(rgyud): pa/byagan rdo rje'i khang par song ste phyag na rdo rje dang nye bar mdab ma la bris lnga/kar bi ra'i me tog byed to//nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na/rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du rim par
88b2(rgyud): 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la tsan+da chu'i mchod yon byin na/kye sgrub pa pos bka' ci stsol zhes smra'o//skyob pa pos bdog gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces brjod na rtog tu rje su 'brang
88b3(rgyud): zhing ras dang /rgyan dang /bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro//de ma lus pa zad par byas te/gal te cung zad bzhag na phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur//mtshan mo gzhal yas khang
88b4(rgyud): bskyed par byed do//de nas gar byed mi'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste/brgyad stong bzlas nas nyi ma bdun na mchod pa chen po byas la nyi ma shar
88b5(rgyud): btsom gyis bzlas pa rdzogs par bya ste/tsan dan gyi bdug pa byin nas yang bzlas na nam phyed kyi dus na nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs spyod na chung mar 'gyur//
88b6(rgyud): lha'i gser srang brgya mal du dor nas tho rangs kyi 'gro'o//de bzhin du nyi ma re re rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro//de yang ma lus par zad par byas te/gal te cung zad lus na phyin
88b7(rgyud): tshad 'byung bar mi 'gyur//de nas bran mo chen mo sgrubs pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/bzlas pa tsam gyis rtag tu 'grub cing sbyin srog
89a1(rgyud): gri las mi dgos la/sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas phyag na rdo rjes ji ltar gsungs pa ltar ska/da cig de la 'grub pa'i dge' byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/
89a2(rgyud): mtshan mo rang gi khyim sgor bzlas na nyi ma ge sum ni nges por 'ong ngo //bran mo'i las byed cing sa bon thams cad dang /zhing gi las dang /khyim gyi bya ba la sogs pa sgrub par
89a3(rgyud): byed do//de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/sha'i zas khyer to/ma mo'i gan su song nas mtshan mo nya dang shes bya ba byos te lon stong bzlas na nyi mi bdun
89a4(rgyud): noni nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la khrag gi mchod yon byin na/bdag po bka' ci stsa'o zhes smra bar byed do//sgrub pa pos lha mo chung mar gyur cig ces smras ni chung mar 'gyur zhing /
89a5(rgyud): rer ba thams cad skong la rgyal srid ster bar byed do//do nas lha mo'i sbubs pa'i thabs bshad pa/mtshan me lha mo'i khang par song ste ston bshams pa/tsa na dan dkar po dang /
89a6(rgyud): sna na'i me tog gi mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mthar nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la khyad pa dang /'o byas pa dang /ji ltar dga'
89a7(rgyud): bi 'dod pa byas na lha mo gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cod kyis brgyan pa chung mar 'gyur ro//dong tshe brgyad dang /ras zung gcig dang /gnas rnams dang /bza'
89b1(rgyud): po bzang po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa la ster ro//'di nyid kyis rnam thos skyes kyi khang par 'dug na/gsang ba'i mtha' dang /bzlas pa'i mtha' la shin tu myur bar rdzas blangs nas ster ba
89b2(rgyud): byed do//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rgya cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o////dpal rdo rje
89b3(rgyud): 'chang la phyag 'tsha lo//de nas shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs lha chen po thams cad gsod par byed pa'i stegs kyi cho ga gsungs pa/oM ha na ha nA/sarba mA ra ya badz+ra
89b4(rgyud): dz+wa le hUM phaT//de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rnon po 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pas gang par gyur to//hUM ha ni phaT/do//
89b5(rgyud): nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad dang /reg 'dzin du ma dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin
89b6(rgyud): dang /'byung po dang /yi dgas dang /lha'i bu mo dang /sha za dang /dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /na mkha' lding rnams dum bu brgyar byas te/dgug por
89b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dpag tu med pa yong 'khor der 'dus pa
90a1(rgyud): rnams ngo mtshar du gyur to/'di skad ces smraso//dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i tshe/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/bdug pa dang /lha thams
90a2(rgyud): cad tshar gcod pa ni leg so legs so//de nas lha'i bu ma rnams langs te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la mgu bo sa phyag 'tshal te/rang gi
90a3(rgyud): snying po phul ba/oM shrI zla ba'i lha mo'i 'o//oM shrI thig le mchog ma'i 'o//oM shrI gser gyi phreng ba ma'i 'o//aM shrI 'khyil pa'i phreng ba ma'i 'o//oM hU~M rin chen phreng ba mra'i
90a4(rgyud): oM sa rtsom pa mo'i'o//oM srung brang na gnas pa mra'i 'o//oM baM dpal rgyan ma'i 'o//de nas lha'i bu mo brgyad kyi dngos grub kyi sgrub pa thams cad kyi cho ga bshad pa/ri'i rtse mo
90a5(rgyud): la song ste 'bum bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas zla ba nya ba ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs lha
90a6(rgyud): mo rang nyid 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na dga'i tshig smra bar byed do//sgrub pa pos bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras na dngos grub kyi rdzas
90a7(rgyud): dang /dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len la sogs pa ster ro//de'i bcud kyis len gyis ni lo stong 'tsho'o//de nas thig le mchog ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/tsan dan
90b1(rgyud): dang /'o ma'i zas kyis khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun na mchod pa rgyas par bya ste/yur gyi ngo'i chos brgyad la ri'i rtse mor song la mtshan thog thag bzlas mtho rangs nges par 'ong ste/
90b2(rgyud): cung zad rgod pas tshogs pa byis nas/mdun du sdod do//mkhyud pa dang 'o byes shing dga' bas cha gos par byas nas 'di ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/gang 'drod pa de ster zhing /
90b3(rgyud): rgyab tu zhon na mtho ri su yang 'khyer bar byed//gzhan yang rgyal sred ster bar byed do//de nas gser gyi phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song
90b4(rgyud): nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byos te/gu gul gyi bdug po byin nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ste/'dod
90b5(rgyud): pa thams cad sbyin par byed do//de nas 'khyil ba'i phreng ba ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/tshes grangs mi dgos shing rgyu skar yang mi dgos la/smyung ba yang mi dgos
90b6(rgyud): par 'grub par byed pa ste/ri'i rtse mor song ste khri bzlas na/de nis phyed na nges par 'ong ngo //chung mur gyur la dong tshe stong steng zhing /dngu'i chu dang /bcud kyis len dang /grub pa'i
90b7(rgyud): rdzas ster ro//de nas rin chen phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/lha'i khang par song ste/zla ba gcig tu stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas zla ba de'i tha ma la zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas na
91a1(rgyud): nam phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra chen pos 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin na/lha mo legs par 'ongs sam zhes smras na bdag po bdag gis ci bya zhes
91a2(rgyud): zer ste/sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na/chung ma'i las byed cing lha mos 'dod pa sbyin por byed do//lo stong 'tsho bar byed do//de na sa rtsom pa mo'i sgrub pa'i thab so bshang
91a3(rgyud): pa/tshis gcig la brtsams te mchod pa byas nas can dan gyi chus dkyil 'khor byas te/gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas shing //
91a4(rgyud): zla ba nya ba la mchod pa chen po bas nas mtshon thog thag bzlas nas nges par 'ong ngo //gal te myur du ma 'ongs na 'tshe bar 'gyu ro//'ongs pa na chung mar 'gyur la/dngul chu
91a5(rgyud): dang bcud kyis len ster zhing ci ltar 'dod pas chags par byed la lo khri 'tsho'o//gang gi tshe'i chi ba na rgyal rig su skye'o//de nas brang na gnas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad
91a6(rgyud): pa mtshan mo lha'i khang par spang ste/tsan ran gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing khri khri bzlas nas zla ba de 'das pa dang /ji ltar 'byer pa'i mchod pa byas nas mchin thog thag bzlas
91a7(rgyud): na tho rangs myur du 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la me tog gi sten sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs zhes brjod na sgrub pa po bka' ci stsol zhes zer ro//sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig
91b1(rgyud): ces smras nas nga rgya chu dang /bcud kyis len dang /dngos grub kyi rdzas stor ro//gzhan gyi bud med la mngon par bgrod pa spang bar bya ste/lo stong phrag lnga 'cha'o//mtshan gcig
91b2(rgyud): gtsang sbra byas te/gro ba'i myang ba mya la gur gum gyis dpal gyis rgyun can byas te tsan don gyi bdug pa sreg cing bzlas la zla ba de tsam la mchod pargya cher byas te/re shig bzlas
91b3(rgyud): na nam byed na nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs po la myur du chags par byas na dga' bar 'gyur te/dbyig dang /gserar+ya dang mu tig la sogs pa ster ro//nyi ma re re zas bzang po
91b4(rgyud): ster zhod dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster be re byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyisku gsungs//lho'i bu mo rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o///de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
91b5(rgyud): drug rdo rjes 'di ces gsung ste/ dum rnams me klub na po 'gro ba 'di dang bcos te bzlas pa Sh+T+rIts+tsha//oMts+tshi A kar+dz+dza swA k+Sha/rgyu ba
91b6(rgyud): de'adi dang bcas te bzlas pa tsam gyis spyi bo 'gas shing dum bu brgyad du 'jig go/sngags 'dis bcing bar bya'o//oM ban d+ha bin d+hi ha na~M ha na/che ge mo hUM phaT/sngags
91b7(rgyud): 'dis dbang du bya'o//oM tsa la tsa la/che ge mo sa ma ya na ye hUM phaT/lha mo thams cad sgrub pa'o//de nas 'dir ni mi rnams la phan pa'i don du lha mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya rab
92a1(rgyud): tu bshad par bya ste/dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/dkon mchog gsum gnas par byed pa/sngags bzlas pa bde bar grub pa'i phyag rgya khro bo nyid
92a2(rgyud): kyis bshad pa/rgyud rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa 'byung po 'dul byed kyis gsungs pa 'di nyid la myur du bde ba sbyin pa'i lha mo rnams grub par byed pa po zlas pa tsam
92a3(rgyud): gyis 'byung mo rnams ma dang /sring mo dang /de bzhin du chung ma dang bran mo sgrub par byed pa khro bo zlos pa rnams 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba sbyin bsnyen bkur mUR+Ya
92a4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thab so//khu tshur so sor bcangs te/lag po gnyis ka pad+ma 'khor ba'i tshul du byas/gung mo'i sor mo khab lhur byas pa brkyang ba ni lha mo brgyad po'i phyi'i bde
92a5(rgyud): bi thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o//lag pa gnyis ka sor mo gcig gi steng du gcig bskyon pa'i sbyor bas bzung ba ni lha'i bu mo thams cad dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya ste nye
92a6(rgyud): bar byed cing mngon du phyogs par byed la/thams cad 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag po gnyis ka pad+ma 'khor ba'i sbyor bas bzung ba ni lho'i bu mo thams cad

92b1(rgyud): nAdabod par bya'o//oM sarba sid+d+hi b+ho ge shA ri sAt+ma/nye bar byed pa'i sdug so//oM k+Sha ma pri ye swAhA/mngon du byed pa'i sngag so//a ba hU hU~M d+h+r-i dzaHdzaHlha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par/
92b2(rgyud): byed pa'i sngagaso//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las lha'i bu mo rnams sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o////de nas gan+d+ha de sbyin mo thams cad langs te/dpal rdo rje
92b3(rgyud): 'chang gri zhe bsnga la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi snying po phul ba/oM A gits+tsha sur sun+do da ri swAt+ma//lcug gu mdzes ma'i'o//oM ma ni ha ri nAm swAtwA//yid 'phrog ma'i'o//
92b4(rgyud): kAn kA mi thu na pri ye s+t+wa~Mt+ma/gser ldan ma'i'o//oM A gan+d+he kA me sh+tsa ri swAhA/'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i 'o//oM ra ti pri ye swAhA/rgun ma'i 'o//oM pad+mi nI yo swA hA/pad+ma ma'i'o//
92b5(rgyud): i narti mad+hA ta ni su rU pa me ti swAtwA/gar byed ma'i'o//oM a nu rI gi ni mi thu ni swA hA/rje su chags ma'i 'o//de nas gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshig rgyas par bshad
92b6(rgyud): pa/rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag re bzlas na zla ba gcig gi nang du nges pa 'ang ngo //'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chus
92b7(rgyud): mchod yin byin na ma dong /sring mi dang /chung ma'i las byed do//gal te mar gyur na sem su dbyung bar mi bya ste/dngul chu deng bcud kyis len sbyar zhing /nyi mar ri nga tshe
93a1(rgyud): ster ro//gal te sred mor gyur na ni grub pa'i rdzas dang /dngul chu dang /bcud kyis lon sbyor zhing /lha'i bu mo bzang po blangs nas sbyar la 'das pa dang /rma
93a2(rgyud): 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba smra bar byed do//gal te chung mar gyur na/bsam po thams cad rdzogs par byed cing nor gyi bdag po chen po byed do//de nas yid 'phrog ma'i sgrub
93a3(rgyud): ba'i thabs bshad pa/chu bo'i 'gram du song ste/tsan drin gyis maN+Dal nye bar byugs te/mchod pa shin tu chen po byas na a ka ru'i bdug pa sbyin zhing nyi ma bdun du khri
93a4(rgyud): bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa le mchod pa rgyas par byas te/nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na de ni nges par 'ong ngo //gral to ma 'ongs na 'chi bar 'gyu ro//bka' stsol cig ces
93a5(rgyud): smra bar byed cing des bdag gi bran mo gyis shig ces bsgo na 'khor brgyad brgya'i zhal lta byed cing dong che brgya nyi ma re la ster ste/des kyang ma lus par zad par bya'o//gal
93a6(rgyud): ti nung zod 'jog na phyin chad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//de nas gser ldano ma'i skyob pa'i thabs bshad pa/ba ru ra'i shing gnas par song ste/nya dang shas sgrub cing /chang/
93a7(rgyud): yang byin nas bdag nyid kyang btung zhing /spags par gnas par bzlas par bya ste stong phrag re re bzlaso//de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa'i mtshan mo bsgrub par bya ste/ji
93b1(rgyud): srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'khor brgyad brgyas bskor nas rang nyid 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro//'khor
93b2(rgyud): bcu gnyis gos dang /rgyun dang /bza' ba bzang po rnams nyin cig bzhin du stor zhing dong tshe brgyad ster ro//de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mi'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/gro
93b3(rgyud): bu'i mdab ma la ba lang gi gi wang gi gzugs brnyan bris te gcig pu stan la 'dug la stong phrag re re bzla so//de nas zla ba'i tha ma la mchod pa rgyas par byas de/mar gyi mer
93b4(rgyud): me rab tu sbar nas mi smra bar gyur pas bzlas na mtshan mo de'i phyed na nges par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la chags pas longs spyad na chung mar 'gyur//lha'i rgyan mol du dor te tho rangs
93b5(rgyud): kyis 'gro bar 'gyuraro//gzhan gyi chung ma la mi bgod par yod bya ste/gal te bgrod na rnam par 'joms par byed do//de nas rgan mo skyeb thabs bshad pa/gAser gyi mdog
93b6(rgyud): tsacan n+ya ni thams cad kyis brgyan mra/lag na ud pa la thogs po/gzhon nu ma ras la ri mo bris te sna ma'i me tog gis mchod ming gu gul gyi bdugs sbyin la stong phrag brgyad
93b7(rgyud): brgyad bzlas te/zla ba tha mo la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar te/ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges parani/'ongs pa/
94a1(rgyud): la dga' byas chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyuraro//sgrub pa po 'khor dang bcas pa yongasu sbyong bar byed cing /lhas 'dod par bya ba'o zas dang /dngul chu dang /

94a4(rgyud): lnga chags pa byas na chung mor 'i gyur tI/lto mos 'dod pa ster zhing dngulo chung dang / kyi sA lan ster bar byed//de nas ga re bud ma'i sgrub thobs bshad pa/a sho ka'i shing
94a5(rgyud): gi rtsar yang sto bsgrub par bya'o//sha'i bza' ba dang /spos dang /dri dang /me tog sbyin zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na zla ba gocig gi nang du nges par 'ong ngo //mdong bsdus

94b1(rgyud): shos dang /rgyun dang /bza' ba bzung ba sbyor ro//ngul chu dang bcud kyis ljon yang stong bar byed do//de nas slong mo sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/bur gum gyis g+ho ga snang pa
94b2(rgyud): ma la gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris te de nas tshes gcig nes brtsams nas spos dang /me tog dang /mer mo sbying+ge zhing dus gsum du bzlas pa byas nas zla ba nye la ji ltar

95a1(rgyud): gnyis brgyad sde bkug pa 'di na khro ba'i mi phyed pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'dis 'jig rten grasum yang 'gugs par byed do//de nas gnod sbyin
95a2(rgyud): mo'i phyag rgya bshad pa/gung mo'i sor mo gnyis mi mnyam por byas te srin lago rnam par bau rkyang zhing mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar byas nAs/mthe' chung gnyis snying par

96a2(rgyud): phrag brgyad bzlas na/bzlas pra'i mthar klu'i bu mo bzang mo 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la spyi bor me tog sbyin zhing chung mar gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o//lha'i bza' ba bzang po

96a4(rgyud): che bar gyur pas 'ong zhing sdug pa nga so ci bya zhes smra bar byed do//chung mar gyur cig ces smras na/bdag nyid dang lha la ngas dang /rgyan dang /bza' bo la sogs pa ster
96a5(rgyud): zhing dong tshe lnga lnga ster ro//mtshan mo pod+ma'i tshal du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na klu'i bu mo rnams myur du 'ong ngo //'ongs pa lo chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur//
