96a7(rgyud): phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la klu'i bu mo nges por 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la ga ser gyi pad+ma'i gdan byin te legs par 'ongaso zhes brjed cing bdag gi chung ma gyis
96b1(rgyud): shog nas sman/ny+tsa ma re rlo gser snang re re sbyin par byed do//mtshan ma rgya mtsho chen par snang ste stong phyag brgyad bzlas na de nam bzlas pa'i mtha' la klu'i bu mo'ang //sa pa
96b2(rgyud): bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bskan rdo tshe gcig dang ras zung nI go ster bar byed do//kyai'i khang par sring ste/skyeb nI bats+tsham du chur zhugs te stong phrag bcud pazlas na danas
96b3(rgyud): bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bum 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la spyi bor me tog byin te legs par 'ongs zhes brjod cing chung ma gyis shig ces basbyin dang tshe brgya de dang lha'i zas pa rje

96b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par byed la/rgyal sring ster bar byed de//mtshon mo klu'i gan su sing ste l+li bzlas nA klu'i bu ma nges par 'ong ngo //klu 'ongs pa la myur du chags par byas nas/
96b7(rgyud): chung ma gyis shig bo sman/nyi marare re dang tshe brgyad dang /lha'i bza' ba bzang po dang gis rnams sbyor bar byed do//mtshan ma klu'i khang par song la stong phrag po
97a1(rgyud): bzlas na/de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo rings par 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la klu'i me tog spyi bor byin na chung mar 'gyur zhing /lha'i ra su dang /rgyan dang
97a2(rgyud): bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro//de nas klu mo'i dam tshig gi sngags bshad pa/oM phu/A gats+tsha nI gA ni pu/bong po'i sngag so//ai i phu/spos dang me tog gi sngag so//
97a3(rgyud): aM pu/a phu/dri dang mchod yon gyi sngags so//a phu/i phu/haM phu/baM phu/klu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sngag so//phu A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/shrI g+h+raM phu nA ya swA hA/
97a4(rgyud): slar btang ba'i stegaso//de nas klu mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/thal mo mnyam par byas te/sor mo rnams mgo bo'i tshul du sbyar li mdzub mo kha bsgyur

97a6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya ni khu tshur so sor bcangs te/mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bos mnan nas sor mo lkog ma brkyang ba ni klu mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//'byung po 'dul ba'i
97a7(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po las//klu mo rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thobs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o////de nas gsong ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje so khro zhing gsor te/khro bo 'di
97b1(rgyud): dang byanas nas gsungs pa/oM b+hA ra Na badz+ra ga che gro mo nA gau ni A kaR+Sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/dI nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis klu thams cad brgyal zhing 'gyol to/spyi bo'i nang chen pos
97b2(rgyud): she'o//gal te dam tshig las 'das na khri bo 'di dang bcas te bzlas pas myur du 'chi zhing dmyal ba chen po brgyad du ltung bar 'gyur zhes dpal rdo rje 'tshang gi sa gsungaso//'byung
97b3(rgyud): pa 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las klu mo rnams sgrub par byed pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o///de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der mi 'am ci mo drug langs te bcom
97b4(rgyud): ldan 'das da ngol rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos btid nas rang gi snying po phul ba/aM ma no ha ri swA hA/oM su b+ha ga sAt+ma/oM bi shA la ne tI swAhA/oM su raM b+hi pri yo swAhA/oM
97b5(rgyud): a shA mu khi swA hA/aM pi tha ka ra mu khi swA hA//de nA sa mai 'am ci mo drug go sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ra'i rtse mo li song ste/stong phrag brgyad bzlas na mi
97b6(rgyud): 'am ci mo drug gi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang /mchod pa shin tu chen po byas te/ba lang gri sha dang /gu gul dang ldan pa'i bdug pas bdug cing ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas
97b7(rgyud): na/nam byed na nges par 'ong ste/de la 'jigs par ma byas na kye skyob pa po bka' ci stsol ces smra bar byed do//sgrub pas kyang /kyai bzang mo bdag go chung ma gyis shig
98a1(rgyud): sa nas rgyu dunanan jug rgyun du khyud bar byud bzla' ba brnang po snor bur pyod do//de sa/ba pa'i thabs byom pa shA ga drung ba
98a2(rgyud): smatsug lag khang du khri bzlas nA bzlas pa'i mtha' la dang ny-id ri zhid /lha mo'i lag pa 'dzam pos rkang pa la tsug pa de byed cing /myur du chags pa byas na chung mda'i hU~M
98a3(rgyud): zheng //kha dong tshe brgyad dang /gos zung cig ster bar byed do//chu bo'i 'gram du song nas khri bzlas nas yang mtshan thog thag 'dis nas tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo /'ongs
98a4(rgyud): nas rlud mer 'gyur zheng nyi ma re re dang tshe lnga lta ster bor byed do//mtshan ma bo 'dus pa'o'i 'gram du stong phyag brgyad bzlas na/bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong nang
98a5(rgyud): bang byed do//nyi mi gnyis pa la mdun du 'dug cing gtum spro bar byed do//nyi mi gsum pa la chags pa sna de na dris par 'grub rgyung ma'i las thams cad byed lang
98a6(rgyud): bad+mad dang ras phrugs cig ster bar byed de//nyin gcig bzhin du dri'i rtse mor sha za zhing khri khri bzlas no/lha mo'i gzugs kyis myur du 'ongs shing mdun du snang ngo //
98a7(rgyud): mkhyud cing 'o byas te/me slabs chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur te/dong che brgyad steng ster zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed de//'byeng po 'dul
98b1(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mi 'am nI'i bu mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshig rgyus pa'i le'u'o////de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dbang phyug
98b2(rgyud): chen po lha chen po khyod nyon cig/'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po lha rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa mngag gzhug mo lus pa sgrib par byed pa/ma rungs pa rnams dang /lha
98b3(rgyud): rnams la bstan por bya'o//de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi phyed pa bstan pa 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams kyis 'da'
98b4(rgyud): bar bya ba ma yin pa skyob pa'i thabs kyi cho ge rgyas pa'i le'u dang ////phyag rgya dang /sngags kyi rim par phye ba bo shad du gsol/de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gan+da
98b5(rgyud): parnams kyis lha chen po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa gsol ba btab pa ni legaso leg so//de nas rdo rje 'chang khro bo
98b6(rgyud): bdag po chen phyis 'di skad ces gsungs// ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi po//rta babs bzhi yis rnam par rgyan//cha rnams bcu drug drag dang ldan//
98b7(rgyud): rdo rje rabs mdzes pa'o//de yi dbus su drag po che//rdo rje khro bo dgang bya ba//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug cing gsal//bskal pa tha ma'i me 'od 'dra//lce chen mig sman
99a1(rgyud): sgyur 'dra zhing //thod pa'i phreng bas rgyun du byas//drag shul bzhad cing tshe 'jigs pa//'jig rten gsum po 'jigs mdzad pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
99a2(rgyud): kyi g.yas log su lho chen po ni bri bya ste/bzho mu tig ltar dkar zhing //de bzhin dkar po dud 'dra zhing //mig gsum pa la lag bzhi pa//zhi zhing leg pa g.yon pa
99a3(rgyud): na//mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'o//g.yon pa'i phyogs kyi cha ru ni//sred med bu ni bri bya ste//g.yas pa na ni rnga yab dung //g.yon na 'khor lo gsal shing ngo //rgyab
99a4(rgyud): tu brgya byin rgyal po ste//de bzhin smin drug mdun du'o//tshangs pa lag na gdugs 'dzin pa//kha ba me tog kun da dang //zla 'dra brgya byin mdun bri ste//rang gi stan la
99a5(rgyud): 'khod por ro//yang na sngags pa si mu taM gi dang //pa yi zho 'dra dkar po ni//rje yab thogs par smin drug bri//tshangs pa kha dog de mang po bri//brgya byin kha dog ser po
99a6(rgyud): bri//rgyan kun gyis ni rnam spras shing //rnga yab thogs par khyab 'jug bri//de bzhin khyu mchog la zhon per//lha chen po ni bre bya ste//kun bged log na 'khor lo can//
99a7(rgyud): daded pa la zhen bri bar bya//brgya byin glang chen zhon pa ste//smin drugo rma bya zhan pa'o//phyi rol dang ni grwa rnamasu//'byung mo brgyad ni bri bar bya//pad+ma can dang pad chen dang //
99b1(rgyud): nam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma//'phrog ma mchog dang rin po che//rgyun ma 'gro ba skyong ma rnams//dpal gyi sgra yis rab grags pa'o//'byung mo chen mo brgyad po ste//pad+ma can
99b2(rgyud): dad pade chen ma//pad+ma dkar po lta bur bri//rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'jomo sa ma//kha dog dmar por bri bar bya//'byung mo bzhi rnams mtshungs par ni//gsor gyi mdog tu bri bar
99b3(rgyud): bya//rdzu 'phrul che ldan 'byung mo brgyad//ji ltar bstan bzhin de legs bri//de nas 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad pa//rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid me tog sngon po'i
99b4(rgyud): phreng bas rgyun cing gtsug to re sngon po bcings nas/ras sngon po zung cig bgos te/sngon bzhin du khro bo'i snying po 'di brjod par bya ste/sems can kun la phan dron du//myur
99b5(rgyud): du dngos grub skyen mdzad pa//grub pa'i rdo rje khro bo ste//lha nyid dam tshig la bzhugs shig/oM hUM badz+ra phaT saM/'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha thams cad grub par byed de//de
99b6(rgyud): ninas 'dir rdo rje gasbyor ba bshad pa/'di ltar yi ge hUM zlos shring phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa ltar/lha thams cad gzhom zhing lha'i bu mo thams cad dang /gnod sbyin mo dang /
99b7(rgyud): klu mo dang /'byung mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo can rnams skad cig de nyid la gzhom par bya ste/rdo rje gser ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/oM badz+ra dIp+ta ma hA kro d+ha ha na da ha~M pa tsa mAr
100a1(rgyud): ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/skad cig de nyid la lha thams cad gsad cing 'khrug par byed do//hU~M hU~M phaT pAT/sbyor ba 'dis kyang nges par sangs rgyas
100a2(rgyud): rnams kyang zhag par byid ngo //de nas slob ma ba zhugs par bya ste/khro bo'i phyag rgya go cha byas la sngags 'dis dbaba~M par bya'o//oM bi sh+ya kr-i d+ha hUM hUM a dz+wa la/ma la a ku lo/
100a3(rgyud): b+haiSha b+hi Sha na badz+ra a/'dis brjod pa tsam gyi phyi rol gyi dbab pa dang /dgug pa dang /ltung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyuraro//de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las khro ba
100a4(rgyud): /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/oM b+hu shrI sing hA d+ha dzA d+hi ri hri/khro bo'i mdun du'o//oM hUM b+h+rUM/ma hA pad+ma ba ti d+ha nur ba na d+ha ri hUM/brgya ba tu'o//oM hUM bi hUM ti/oM ku sho//
100a5(rgyud): d+hAd+ha rI ni hUM dza/lho ru'o//hUM b+hU su ra ha ri ni tsi Na d+ha ni d+hi dz+wa re ni srungs g.yon du'o//oM shri ba ra ha ri ni pusa? po ha re hUM/me tog dbang ldan gyi grA ra/oM shri rang ne shA ri duM ba ha ste hUM//spos
100a6(rgyud): me'i gra ru'o//oM shri b+hU shri naM gai na d+ha ha sde hUM//dri bden bral du'o//oM shri dza gAd pa li ni a te pra pa te hUM/ma re me rlung du'o//de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas par
100a7(rgyud): bshad pa/khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te/'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/gung mo brkyang ba ni yid bzhin
100b1(rgyud): nur bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag d+hA la//phyag rgya de nyid rnyed pa'i phyogasu bzhag pa ni gzu dang /mAda'i phyugad+hAr/lag pa goyas pa khu tshur brdungs te/mdzub ma brkyang ban sgru bak+Shi
100b2(rgyud): ba ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//thal mo mnyam par byas te/'dzubo rodenyes bkug pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o//ser mo rnams phan tshun du 'khyud de/'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni spras
100b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o//log pa sor ser brkyang ba ste//dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyisu bzhug po ni dri'i phyag rgya'o//log pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni mar me'i phyag
100b4(rgyud): rgyu'o/'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen lngas/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas po'i lce'u'o////de nas 'byung ba brgyad kyi bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad po/
100b5(rgyud): oM hrI dza/gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i'o//oM trUM dza rgyal ba'i'o//oM dwe dz+re/rdzogs byed kyi'o//aM srung dza/dur khrod kyi bdug pa'i'o//i ruM dza/rig sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o//
100b6(rgyud): oM aM dza/mngag bzhug mcho gi'o//'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i bsgrub po'i thabs bshad pa/rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste/sngon du bstan pa byas par 'gyuraro//de nas
100b7(rgyud): zla ba nyal mchod pa rgya chen pa byas te/ci ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras can dkar po dang /sbrang rtsi dang /zho dang /bu ram dang /'o ma dang /sha rnams kyi mchod cing gu grol gi bdug
101a1(rgyud): pa byin nas/mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'dra ngo //gal te nges par ma 'ongs nA skad cig de la 'chi'o//'ongs na sgo ba don med par mi byed do//
101a2(rgyud): sgrub pa pos mngag po zhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag bzhug gis las byed la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid gter bar byed cing dag thams cad tshar btsod par byed
101a3(rgyud): dedo/zla ba'i lha mo blangs nas ster zhing rgyab tu zhen na lha'i 'jig rten du yang khyer bar byed cing bskal pa bdun mchi'o//de nas rgyalo ba'i bsgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/mtshon
101a4(rgyud): mo sbyin byed ma'i mdun du song ste/nyi ma re re stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/gtor ma sbyin zhing gri gul gyi bdug pa byin nas
101a5(rgyud): bzlas nr-i/bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong ste/kye sgrub pa pos bka' ci stsol zhes smras par byed do//sgrub po pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyab tu zhon na
101a6(rgyud): gling bzhi pa rnamasu yang khyer bar byed cing /gzhan yi nga rgyal srid ster la l-i lnga stong 'tshe'o//de nas rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/rdo rje 'chang gi pho brang du srong
101a7(rgyud): ste/nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/'bras chan dkar po dang /zhes ji ltar gsungs pa ltar byin nas/ji srid
101b1(rgyud): nam b+h+yod tsog du bzlas nunas spyan dang nye 'dzang //'dus pa la matog gimachad man d+hunan dga' ba g+hu /dz+walA ng+ga dU byed do//bsam pa rnams cad yongs su
101b2(rgyud): rdzogs par byed rnyo lo steng 'tsho'o//ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mngag gzhug gi lAs byed do//che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig che ge mo sod cig ces smras na de dgra thams cad do//
101b3(rgyud): dun tu rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thebs bshad pa/sku gdung deng bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen par byas par 'gyur//de nas zla ba nyal ji ltar 'byor
101b4(rgyud): mchod pa byas te//ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rings par 'ongs na sa mdun du sdod do//kye sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed do//sgrub pa pos mngagaM gzhug gyis
101b5(rgyud): shig ces bskrun de phan chad mingag gzhug gi las thams cad byed do//gnod sbyin gyi bu mo byin mo blangs nas ster zhing gtor thams cad ster la/lhas 'dod pa'i bza'
101b6(rgyud): bster ra//nyin gcig bzhin du ras dmar po zung re ster zhing dang tshe lnga ster la lo lnga brgya 'tsha'o//de nas dur khrod kyi bdag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshig rgyas par bshad
101b7(rgyud): pa/mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste/nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la 'byung po la sha dang nya dang til dang /dza ma b+hU ti dang /mngar gsum zan
102a1(rgyud): gyis dril ba'i ril bu dang /rta shA kham+bu chad du gabs pa bsregs nas mar la bsngos la ldam bu ti ku dang /'bras chan dang /zho dang /
102a2(rgyud): bur ma dang /'o thug dang /sman tshod/snum 'khyer rnams kyisgra ji ltar ga sungs pa byin nas gru gul gyi bdug pa yang byin te/ji srid na pa byud kyi bar du bzlas na
102a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par byed do//'jigs par ma byas na rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te 'ong ngo //'ongs pa la gtir ma byin na dga' bar 'gyur te//
102a4(rgyud): 'byung po'i mngag gzhug byed do//nyi ma re re dang tshe borgyad brgyad ster zhing dag thams cad 'joms te lo lnga stong 'tsho'o//de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi bsgrub pa'i
102a5(rgyud): thabs bshad pa/lha'i khong par song ste spos dmar po dang /me tog dmar po dang /gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing khri bzlas na sngon du bstan pa byas par 'gyuraro//
102a6(rgyud): mtshan mo nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi lany+dza dang /shA dang /til dang /'dzam bu ti dang /'bras chenA dmar pos dzi lta bar sgrub cing /du ru ka dang /mai tog sbyin te/
102a7(rgyud): srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyid snang ba chen po dang /'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong ste/de la 'jigs par mi byas ni sdug pa ci bya zhes smra bar byed
102b1(rgyud): do/sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bskon/nyi ma re dus gsum du dong cha lnga lnga ster bar byed do//lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bzla' ba ster bar byed cing ma lnga stong 'tsha'o//
102b2(rgyud): de nas 'byung po dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/mtshan ma ling ga go cig par song ste/gtsi ga pu nub gsum du 'bras chu ni dmar po dang /ny+tsa dang shes gtor me sbyin zhing
102b3(rgyud): skyes kyi shwa dang /gu gul dang /sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i bdug pas bdug cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma dang po la rmi lam du mthong bar byed do//nyi ma gnyis pa la rang nyid mthong bar
102b4(rgyud): byed do//nyi ma gsum pa la rings par 'ong zhing mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smra bar byed do//bka' ci stsol/de nas sgrub pa pos mngag gi zhug gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o//rtag
102b5(rgyud): tu phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing /rang nyid song nu sa mi zad pa'i gter ste re zhing 'ongs pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba rnams smra bar byed do//gos dang /rgyan dang /bza'
102b6(rgyud): ba bzang po rnams ster bar byed cing lo nyis stong 'tsho bar byed do//de nas pho nya mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/rdo rje 'chang gi khang par song ste nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la
102b7(rgyud): khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun po la sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing me tog dkar po dang /'bras chan dkar
103a1(rgyud): pa dang /mar dang 'othug sbyin zhing ku sha'i khral 'dug ste/mar gyi mI rab tu sbar nas mtshan mo ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na mngag gzhug mchog/
103a2(rgyud): rang nyid 'ong ste/'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi mched yin byin na/kye sgrub pa pa bdag gis ci bya zhes smra bar byed do//do nas sgrub pa pos bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces
103a3(rgyud): bsgon/de phan chad mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing /lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro//dngul chu dang /bicud kyis len ster zhing gter snyed par byed la
103a4(rgyud): rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su yang khyor bar byed cing gzhan yang rgyalnga sring ster bar byed do//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mingag gzhug sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas
103a5(rgyud): pa'i le'u'o////de nas 'dir yod dag par bshad po ni dngos grub sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa slob dpon rnams la phan pa'i don du ji ltar gsungs pa mngag
103a6(rgyud): gzhug pa'i thabs te/bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i le lo can dang /sdig pa byed pa dang /brdzun tu skye ba dang /tshul 'chos can dang /dbul po dang /nad kyis gdungs pa
103a7(rgyud): dang /tshe thung ba dang //sems mi brtan pa'i mi rnams kyang spang bar mi bya ste/gal te longs spyod dang /ner dang /grags pa 'dod na yang skad cig gis phun sum tshogs
103b1(rgyud): bar stong ro//sngags 'dris dngul tshwa dang /bcud kyis len pa'i dngos grub dang /lha'i rgyal srid kyi dngos grub kyang grub par byed na/mi rnams kyi rgyal srid grub par byed pa lta smos
103b2(rgyud): kyang ci dgos te/de bzhin du 'di lha'i bu mo thams cad skad cig tsam gyis grub par byed do//gsang sngags 'dri nI bi kla gr-I pas grub par byed cing shin tu brtson 'grus dmin pa
103b3(rgyud): rnams la yang ji ltar bde ba ltar myur du grub par byed cing sems can thams cad lo bde bar rab tu sbyin pa/yi ge bzhi po cher gsang po/dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar byed
103b4(rgyud): ga patsam gyi sa mni por smyig par byed pa ste/di la rna tshim mi byedado//'byung ba'i 'dum bya'i rgyud chen po las dang sa sgra kyi smra jug nas shA' dug/
103b5(rgyud): de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/'byung po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshon nyid bshad pa/ser ma rnams phan tshun mkhyud de/gung mo brkyang nas khub ltar bzung ba
103b6(rgyud): ni 'byung po chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid gung mo bkug cing mdzub brkyang nas bkug pa ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo
103b7(rgyud): g.yon pa bskyil zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ste so sor bzung ngo ni rdzogs byed kyi phyag rgya'o//ser mo phon tshun mkhyud de bzung ba ni kun tu rdzogs par byed po'i phyag rgya'o//phyag rgya
104a1(rgyud): 'di nyid la mthe'u chung dang /mthe bong nang du bkug ste bzung ba ni dur khrod kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o//mthe'u chung gnyis rab tu brkyang ste bzung ba na
104a2(rgyud): rags kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o//thal mo kha sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni pho nya mchog gi phyag rgya'o//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/'byung
104a3(rgyud): po'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rdzogs s+ho////de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
104a4(rgyud): sprul to//rdo rje slob dpon lnga phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur mi'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya ste/'byung mo rnams
104a5(rgyud): kyis ni yid la dga' ba skyed cing phan tshun tshim par byed pa'o//de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo dpal chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabos kyi cho ga rgyas par
104a6(rgyud): bshad pa/dpal khro ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun tu 'bum bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro//de nas zla ba nyal ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas
104a7(rgyud): te/gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing mtshan thog thag bzlas so//de nas tho rengs nges par 'ang ngo //'ongs pa la can dan gyi mchod yon sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so/
104b1(rgyud): zhes brdad na/kye sgrub pa bco bka' stsal ces smra'o//sgrub pa blos bdag nyid kyi chung ma gyis shig ts+tshesma brjod na lha'i dngul chu dang /bcud kyis len pa ster zhing dngos grub kyi rdzus
104b2(rgyud): dang /gter dang /rgyal srid rnams ster bar byed do//zhi ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang po'o//de nas gzhan yang nan tur gyis sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/gro ga'i
104b3(rgyud): mdab ma la 'byung mo dpal chen mo bris te/mtshan mo gcer bu gyur pas dpal rdo rje 'chang gi mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na myur du'i drango //'ongs pa la chags pa byas
104b4(rgyud): na dga' bar 'gyu ro//'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid kyang ster ba ri byed do//brgya byin kyang ster ro//rgyab tu zhen na mtho ri swa su ye ngo 'khyer zhing lo khri 'tsho'o//gal te ma grub
104b5(rgyud): nA mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing skam la/skad tsog de nyi la 'chi'o//zhes khro bo nyid kyi sau gsung so//gur gum gyis ming bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas rdo rje gsor
104b6(rgyud): zhing yi ge hU~M hUM phaT phaT lan bdun brjod na brjod par gyur pas nges par skad cig gis 'chi bar byed de/'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga
104b7(rgyud): rgyas pa'o//gri gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing gtor ma beshams te ras dkar po bkab la sngags 'od len gsum brjod de//de bo saM b+hU ta ma hi ta/pri Na pa ta ya/bi ba dza yeng
105a1(rgyud): hrI thag d+hA thag ma d+hAk+ShatA/s+yas+thAn ma/twAd+d+hag+har+m+ma N+DIk+Sh+ma sh+tsan+thi dgas la ye d+han t+te/ts+tshar+dz+dzatu ye/ya? ka lI gai d+hA/dregs sa tAnAH/
105a2(rgyud): gats+tshan+tu/b+hU d+hA nA ma mo sa ma ye/pra tI pA li nu ya/yi sa oM N+Ditak+She Na/mUr+d+ha ne/sul yod/b+hU tAn+d+ha r-I ra wa nA ra kaM pa tId/yA tha yaH/swats+tshan
105a3(rgyud): gats+tshad+hI/ya thi su~M khi swA hA//rdo rje slob dpon gyis sa rnams nye bar bsdu bar bya'o//'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rim par phye ba gnyis pa rdzogs te/
105a4(rgyud): 'bying po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las ji snyed pa rnams rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud d+ha Akar po rma dang /lo ts+tshab dge slong
105a5(rgyud): chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/////
1b1(rgyud2): 
1b2(rgyud2): 
1b3(rgyud2): 
2a1(rgyud2): /la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das ri bo po Ta la
2a2(rgyud2): na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing sa la dang /ta ma la dang /tsam pa ka dang /mya ngan 'tshang dang /a
2a3(rgyud2): ti mr-ig+na ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par rgyan pa na/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang /byang chub sems
2a4(rgyud2): dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i
2a5(rgyud2): bu brgya stong phrag du mos yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshangs
2b1(rgyud2): ba dang /lha'i bu rnams kyis dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
2b2(rgyud2): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
2b3(rgyud2): tha la mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das ge la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces
2b4(rgyud2): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'o zhags pa'i rgyal po 'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis ti/bdag gis bskal pa
2b5(rgyud2): dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon log su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam paro blta bar de bzhin ga shugs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po
2b6(rgyud2): las mi nos nas/'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /ga naso gtsang
3a1(rgyud2): ma'i lha'i bu brgya skyong phrag mang po bla nA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du stsal nas/bdag
3a2(rgyud2): gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa lnga sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob por bgyis lags//bcom ldan 'das
3a3(rgyud2): 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der yang dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshangs pa la sogs
3a4(rgyud2): pa lha'i bu khri nyi so stong srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod
3a5(rgyud2): pa'i phun sume tshogs pa'i snying po'i de spyod pa'i sa phyogs dri mchod rten du yang bkur bar 'gyur lag so//bcom ldan 'das sems can
3a6(rgyud2): de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lag so//gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
3b1(rgyud2): snying po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/dam
3b2(rgyud2): pa'i chos spong ba 'am/mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod
3b3(rgyud2): par gyur cing /ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa thob par 'gyur lagaso//bcom ldan 'das re shig de nyid kyis zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe
3b4(rgyud2): 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang /gtugs pa dang /bsal bar 'gyur ro//rims nyin gcig pa 'am/nyi ni gnyis pa 'am/nyin gsum pa 'am/
3b5(rgyud2): nyin bzhi pa 'am/de bzhin du rim nyin bdun pa'am/mig nad dang /rna ba'i nad dam/sna'i nad dam/so'i nad dam/mchu'i nad dam/lce'i nad dam/dkar
3b6(rgyud2): gyi nad dam/snying nad dam/lto nad dam/ro rgyab dang /rked pa'i nad dam/yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/gzhang 'bram 'am/pho ba'i nad dam/
3b7(rgyud2): tshad pa 'am/lag pa dang /rkang pa'i nad dam/sna nad dam/klad pa'i nad dam/sha bkra chen po 'am/sha gzig gu 'am/'dze'am/rkang shu laM/
4a1(rgyud2): 'brum bu phra mo 'am/lhog pa 'am/mtshan par rdol ba 'am/'brum bu'am/brjed byed dam/byad dam/gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i
4a2(rgyud2): gsod pa'am/'ching ba 'am//rdeg pa 'am/spyod pa 'am/bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa'am/bcom ldan 'dres mdor na lus kyi gdung ba 'am/
4a3(rgyud2): sems kyi gdung ba 'am/rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongasu gtugs par 'gyur na/sems can dag pa lhag pa dad pa rnams kyi yongasu byang bar 'gyur ba lnga
4a4(rgyud2): smos kyang ci'i tshe la/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi'am/rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang /g.yos bdag gi don yod pa'o zhags pa'i snying po 'di
4a5(rgyud2): nyin par bgyid/'dzin par bgyid/'chang bar bgyid/klog par bgyid/'dri bar bgyid/'drir 'jug par bgyid/kun chub par bgyid/sems can
4a6(rgyud2): gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gran su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna khung du gtad rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems
4a7(rgyud2): par bgyid de/skur ba ma mchis pa dang /gzugs ma mchis pa dang /rnam par mi rtog pa dang /kun tu 'byung ma mchis pa dang /ring du 'gro ma mchis pa dang /
4b1(rgyud2): bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /gos pa ma mchis pa dang /sems mnyam pa nyid dang ma bral ba dang /phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom par
4b2(rgyud2): bgyid na/de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur pa la sogs po rgyas par sbyar ro//glegs bam du bgyis
4b3(rgyud2): te khyim du 'chang bar bgyid dam/rje dpon gyis skyugs pas sam/gzhan gyi ngor ram/bzhad gad tsam gyis rgyus mnyan par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas
4b4(rgyud2): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grags pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis
4b5(rgyud2): tsan dan nam/ga pur ram/gla rtsi zhig la khros sam/yongasu smod de rdo la btags nas bdag nyid la byugs na tsan dan nam/ga pur ram/gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis
4b6(rgyud2): bdag la khros sam/yongasu smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de nyid la dri bda' ba bgyid lag so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don
4b7(rgyud2): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung bas bzhad gdi tsam gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro//bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang /skyes mchod par bgyid na yang de nyid
5a1(rgyud2): sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lag so//gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang /ti nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /bskyod
5a2(rgyud2): nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/tshul khrims kyi dri bda' bar bgyid pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong
5a3(rgyud2): pha dang /dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen pa 'am/dge bsnyen ma 'am/de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar gyi ngo'i ches
5a4(rgyud2): brgyad la bskang ba bgyis te/gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod na/bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig
5a5(rgyud2): thob par 'gyur te/nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung ni yang myur du
5a6(rgyud2): zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyuraro//skye bo mang po'i snying sdug pa dang dbang po skyes par 'gyuraro//de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur//de'i
5a7(rgyud2): don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te/zhugs kyis mi chog/tshab kyis mi 'tshal/rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo ma thog par 'gyur//de'i las kyi mtha' rnams//
5b1(rgyud2): skyes par 'gyur te/ser bas ma lag so//chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lag so//don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang /chu la lan bdun/
5b2(rgyud2): zlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis nr-i gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//gzi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rngo mi thog par 'gyur zhing /
5b3(rgyud2): sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'thad par 'gyuraro//de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyuraro//
5b4(rgyud2): de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags/mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa
5b5(rgyud2): drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//me dang /mtshon dang /dug gis 'bum par mi 'gyur ro//de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /sbed pa'i phyir
5b6(rgyud2): gnas par 'gyuraro//gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /'bral bar mi 'gyur te/de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig
5b7(rgyud2): po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lagaso//gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te/brgyad gang zhe na/'grim pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi
6a1(rgyud2): gzugasu mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyuraro//bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyuraro//lta bu 'khrul par mi 'gyuraro//lag pa mi g.yob pa dang /rkang pa
6a2(rgyud2): mi g.yo ba dang /bshang gtso ma mchis pa dang /khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyuraro//dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro//khas phub du 'chi ba'i dus
6a3(rgyud2): bgyid par mi 'gyuraro//'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyuraro//de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen
6a4(rgyud2): dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro//nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//chang dang /shri dang /rku na drong dang /ke'u dang /sgog skya dang 'dres
6a5(rgyud2): pa dang /lkog rol dang /'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o//don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la
6a6(rgyud2): mthu mchis pa dang /mthu ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrags par bgyi'o//slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o//'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing brag dog ser sna
6a7(rgyud2): spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnam
6b1(rgyud2): nang du gtogs so//byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/sems drunga' zhes bgyi ba ni/thubs lpags te/chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa lag so//
6b2(rgyud2): gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjesu gnang na/'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang /gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang
6b3(rgyud2): sman pa dang bde slad du bsgrags par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sbyin res gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bkri' stsal to//sems
6b4(rgyud2): can drag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig/de bzhin gshegs pas rje su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams
6b5(rgyud2): la pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//
6b6(rgyud2): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'o thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs
6b7(rgyud2): brtse ba dang /skye bo'i tshigs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol/dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
7a1(rgyud2): la phyag 'tshal//rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshan/
7a2(rgyud2): yang dag par song ba rnams dang /yang dag par zhugs po rnams la phyag 'tshalo//sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tsha lo//byams pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems
7a3(rgyud2): dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bag med la phyag 'tsho lo//dkon mchog gsum la
7a4(rgyud2): byuphyug 'tshalo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa sman rus gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//tad+ha b+h+yo/oM tsA ra tsa ra/tsi ri tsi ri/tsu ru tsu ru/
7a5(rgyud2): i h+ye hi mahA ko ru Ni ka/tsi ri tsi ro/mi rI mi ri/tsu ru tsu ru/maMt+ma kA ru Ni kA ya/si ri si ri/tsI rI tsi raM/bi ra ba raM/bi ri bo re/mid+d+ha pad+mA hoste/ka la ka li/ki li ki li/ku lu ku lu/man+d+ro shrud+d+ha
7a6(rgyud2): bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/d+hA bad+b+ha ba/ka NA ka NA/ki Ni ki Ni/kuN+Du ku N+yai/pA ra ma shud+d+ha sItra/ka ra ka ra/ki ri kI ri/ku ru ku ru/ma hA s+thA mA prap+ta/tsi laM tsa la/sany+tsA la sany+tsa la/bi tsi le br-i tsaM la/ai tsa Ta/
7b1(rgyud2): ak+ShA ra brah+mA ShA d+hA ra/d+hA rad+hA b+h+r-id+d+h+r-i r-i/d+ha rut+tA ru/Shu ra ta ra/sa ra sa ra/khar par tsar nar/rAsmr-i sha ta sa twas+yA prA ti mar+d+ha ta/sha rIR+ShA ya/dz+wA la dz+nyA lA/tA bad+d+ha pa/d+hA ga wAn swo ma U daH/
7b2(rgyud2): ma bai ru Nau/ku bo ra/bran+na ri Shi daM ba ga Ne/ai b+h+yAM tsau ta tsa raH/su ru su ru/tsu ru tsu ru/mu ru mu ru/bu ru pu ru/sa nad ku mA ra/ru dr-i/bA sa ba biSh+Nu d+ha nad/de gai/raM Shi nI ya kaM/bA hu bi bi d+hA/be She d+ha rad+ha
7b3(rgyud2): ra d+ha pa d+hi ri d+hi raM/d+ha ru d+hu ru/tha ra tha ra/g+ha ra g+ho ra/ya ya ra ya ra/la ra la ra/he ra ha ra/ma ra mra ra/pa ra pa ri/ba ra ba ra/ba ra dA yai ka/sa man+ta/a waM lo ka ti/bi lo ki ta/lo kaM shwa raM
7b4(rgyud2): mati shAr+ya/mu hu mu h+yA/mu ru mu ru/mu ya mu ya/mur+d+ha muSh+Ta/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugi dang lnga sa gsum gyi lha rnams bdag dang /sems can thams cad 'dzin pa
7b5(rgyud2): dang /gnod pa thams cad dang /'tshe ba thams cad dang /gdon thams cad las bsrungs shig/bsrung shig/bsad pa dang /bcing ba dang /brdag pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /rgyal po dang /chom po dang /rkun
7b6(rgyud2): po dang /me dang /chu dang /dug dang /mtshon las yongasu thar par mdzad pa/kA Na ka NaM/ki Ni ki NAM/kr-i Nu kuN+Du/tsa ra tsa ra/in+d+ri ya/bA lA bo d+h+r-i ga/tsa dur Ar+ya sat+ya saM pra kA sha ka/tA pa tA pA/dra ma da mA/
7b7(rgyud2): sam sa ya/sa ma sa mo/ma hA ta mo/oM d+ha kA ra/bi d+ha man Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/mi lo mai la~M/Ta Ta TaT/Sha dza dze tra/Ti Ti Ti To/Tu Tu nu ts+yai/oM na ya tsarma kr-i ti pa ri ki raM/e h+ye ti/i
8a1(rgyud2): ra ma he shwa r+ra/muh+nA b+hU ta ga Na sau b+hany+dza ka/ku ru ku ru/ba ra ba ra/ka ra kaR+Sha/ka Ta ka Ta/maT ma Ta khi shud+d+ha/bi Sha ya/bA sa na/ma hA ka ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/
8a2(rgyud2): rarAt+na mu ku Ta/mA lA d+ha ra/sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi re si kr-i te ma ku Ta/mA lI d+ha ra/ma hA da b+hU ta ka ma la a laM kr-i ta rad+ha rA ya/d+h+ye na sa mA d+hi /ba mo k+Sha A pra kaM bya/ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/mai tA kU ruM Na/
8a3(rgyud2): ka/sarba karma A wa ra NA bi sho d+hA ka sar+b+ba byA d+hi pa ro mo tsa ka sar+b+ba AM shA pa ri pU ra ka/sar+b+ba satwa sa mA shA sa na ka ra na mistu te swA hA///bkrigs pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro//dus
8a4(rgyud2): gsum du bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongasu dag par 'gyur ro//mtshams gcad pa la ni a ga ru'i bdug pa 'am/thal ba'i//
8a5(rgyud2): chab bam/yungs kar dang /seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs paso//rims thams cad la ni skud pas//nad thams cad la ni mar rAm/'bru mar ram/chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar dpya
8a6(rgyud2): byad dgrol bar la mtshon gyiso//lto ba la ni srung ba'i skud paso//dug bsad pa la ni sde 'am chab kyiso//mig nad la ni skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o//so na ba la ni
8a7(rgyud2): shing ke ra bi ra'i so shing giso//mtshams bcad pa ni mtshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas phyogs bzhir
8b1(rgyud2): gzugs par bgyis na mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyuraro//thams cad srung ba ni skud pa 'am/chub bam thal bas bya'o//gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud paso//rims thong la ni skud pa gang
8b2(rgyud2): pos//g.yan pa dang /khyi rngo dang /lhog pa dang /'brin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang /be pI ling bsres paso//mig nad la ni dre chu dang /shing ba la sha'i chu 'am/shing mngar gyi
8b3(rgyud2): chu so//rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyiso//'thab pa dang /'thab mo dang /rtsod pa 'gyed pa dang /bskur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni/chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha bshal bar bgyi'o//
8b4(rgyud2): dpung dang /yul dang /rgyal srid dang /yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni bum pa gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas bklags par bgyis na zhi ba chen
8b5(rgyud2): por 'gyur ro//des yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyuraro//yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa dang /'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang glags
8b6(rgyud2): lta ba rnams la ni tsan dran la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying kar byug par bgyi'o//mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyiso//khyim
8b7(rgyud2): srung ba la ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg giso//sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang /'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang /gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg giso//dza ya dang /ba dza
9a1(rgyud2): ya dang /nA ku la dang /gan d+ha na gu li dang /ba ru ni dang /tso'i dra ba ru Ni dang /a b+hU ya ba ni dang /in+da dra ba ni dang /gAn d+ha pri yang ku dang /rgya spos dang /tsakra dang
9a2(rgyud2): mA hA tsakra dang /biSh+Ta krAn+ta dang /so ma ra dzi dang /su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/nor bur bgyis nas spyi bo 'am/dpung pa la gdags pas/bsel bar
9a3(rgyud2): bgyi'o//khye'u rnams li ni mgul par ro//bu mo rnams la na sta zur nas te/dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsres ni thams
9a4(rgyud2): cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyuraro//dug dang mes mi tshugs lag so//dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyu ro//skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing myur du zhi bar 'gyuraro//gangan
9a5(rgyud2): rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro//rlung dang 'brug dang /ser ba bcad pa/chab kyi rgyun dang /ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing kau ra bi ri'i lcug mas te/las thams ca de bgyid pa 'phags pa
9a6(rgyud2): sprin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs parare las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lagaso//de nas sgrub par 'tshal na thang sku'i cho ga ni ras la lhag ma
9a7(rgyud2): mo yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang /e na ya'i lpags pa dang /phyugs bdag
9b1(rgyud2): gorgyu lugs 'chang ba/rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa zla bar bgyi ste/ri mo mkhan paso sbyong can 'dir sprul bar bgyi'o//de nas sgrub pa po sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba
9b2(rgyud2): dkyil 'khor bgyis te/me tog dkar po'i sol ma bkram la spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bgyi'o//sna brgyad pa'i ma/drug cu rtsa bzhi pa 'am/gzhan yang lha ba
9b3(rgyud2): shwa dang khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la e ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//nyin zhag cig gam/nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung ba
9b4(rgyud2): bikyis nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos gtsang mas bgos na/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nis bsam pa
9b5(rgyud2): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do//ldong ros sre ma/mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te mig lnga bskus na/de nas mi gda' bar gyur nus na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur
9b6(rgyud2): zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te/ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyuraro//de nas 'grub pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
9b7(rgyud2): bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
10a1(rgyud2): dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs
10a2(rgyud2): so///de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
10a3(rgyud2): dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyid
10a4(rgyud2): pA'i lus kyis/bcom ldan 'das gangan pa de ldog su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang /
10a5(rgyud2): snying rje chen po'i mthu yid le byed pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten lo phan pa dang /snying rtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid
10a6(rgyud2): grub pa/mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i chos zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i
10a7(rgyud2): snying po 'di mchis te/'di pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de nyid chen po snying por 'phags pa snying por gyur pa/de kho na nyid slob pa pad+ma dam pa/dkyil 'khor
10b1(rgyud2): chen po 'di phyag rgyu dang/gsang sngags dang /snying po rimya par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang sgrub pa gsang ba 'dri bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
10b2(rgyud2): chen po'i mdun dang /rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'di yang bsgrags par bgyi'o//gang yang dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshangs pa dang /lha dang /
10b3(rgyud2): gshin rje dang /chu dang /lus ngan dang /drang srong gi tshogs dang //zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /skar ma'i tshogs dang /rgyu skar dang /rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams
10b4(rgyud2): kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/dngos grub sgrub pa glags pas grub pa dang /sgom pas sgrub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
10b5(rgyud2): rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
10b6(rgyud2): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bsod nams stong gis rgyan po/mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spros pa/phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lte bu 'od zer
11a1(rgyud2): 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang /spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang /
11a2(rgyud2): phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems can drag pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig/de bzhin ga shogs pa rnams kyi byin
11a3(rgyud2): gyis brlobs te/ngas kyang de ltar byin gyis rlob kyi khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rje su yi rang bzhin byin gyis
11a4(rgyud2): brlabs pa gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rje su yi rang bar mdzad do//de nas byang
11a5(rgyud2): chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i
11a6(rgyud2): gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to//oM pad+ma tasta ma hA oM mo g+ha pA shA sA d+ha ya sA mA ya hr-i dra ya/tsa ra tsa ra hU~M/dron yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin//
11a7(rgyud2): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po Ta la 'di brag dang nags tshal dang /rtsa shing du bcas
11b1(rgyud2): pa dang /ri robo khor yug dang //khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldog par gyur te/thams cad 'dar por gyur to//klu'i gnas
11b2(rgyud2): dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to//rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to//chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to//de ma
11b3(rgyud2): thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzug brnyan zhugs pa rnams kyis leg so zhes bya ba byin te/'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to//rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa
11b4(rgyud2): gsang ba'i snying po bklags paso 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legaso leg so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems
11b5(rgyud2): dpa' dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba klags pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gsang
11b6(rgyud2): ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i modado la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang ga klung sa yo bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang /
11b7(rgyud2): spyi ba la bzhag nas leg so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la mngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/zhig par brgya
12a1(rgyud2): sdig pa thams cad dang /nad thams cad dang /de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do//sdig pa dang /sems can gdugs pa rnams dang /phas kyi rgo lta ba
12a2(rgyud2): dang /mi mdza' ba rnams 'jog par bgyidade/'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o//rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin blta 'tshal bar 'gyur lag so//rig snga
12a3(rgyud2): 'di yi cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu/gos gtsang ma bgos par bgyi'o//byams po dang /snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung
12a4(rgyud2): po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o//'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o//me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba
12a5(rgyud2): dang /byug pa dang /mar me dbul bar bgyi'o//tshes brgyad dmo/tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o//ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo kAng bcwa
12a6(rgyud2): nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang /yungs kar gyis
12a7(rgyud2): dbang bskur bar bgyi'o//phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon par bgyi'o//gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o//phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi
12b1(rgyud2): de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//bzlas brjod bton pa ba tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po/
12b2(rgyud2): dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyu ro//bzlos brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
12b3(rgyud2): gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro//don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang snying dgo' ba dang spyi bo'i gtsug
12b4(rgyud2): 'bar bar 'gyur ro//'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin zhes grub pa'i rtags dang leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub por 'gyuraro//
12b5(rgyud2): de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyi de'i mod la 'grub por 'gyur logaso//de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya spong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang
12b6(rgyud2): mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma
12b7(rgyud2): dang bral zhing yongasu dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro//mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro//rnam pa thams cad grub pa stsol
13a1(rgyud2): par 'gyur//don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro//ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob
13a2(rgyud2): kyi bar du yongasu skyong bar bgyid do//de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par rgyan po byang chub sem
13a3(rgyud2): dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa na/khang pa rtsegs ma legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'gro
13a4(rgyud2): ba'i skas bzhugs shing chos ston pa blta bar 'tshal na/rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar
13a5(rgyud2): gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang /dang ba dang /zhe sa dang /bla mar bgyi'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i
13a6(rgyud2): gzugs la ci 'byor pa me tog dang /gdugs pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /lhab lhub dang /bo dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o//tshes
13a7(rgyud2): brkyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o//ri ma'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la
13b1(rgyud2): nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar
13b2(rgyud2): bgyi'o//mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o//a ga ru dang /tsan dan dang /du ru ka dang /gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas
13b3(rgyud2): bslang bar bgyi'o//dgugs pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/don yad khams gsum rnam par grags//bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med//gang phyir bdugs pa ci//
13b4(rgyud2): gyis ni//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyuraro//dri 'khrigs pa de dag gi/
13b5(rgyud2): sang+yas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin/
13b6(rgyud2): pa rnams lo dri chen po'i mchod pa dang /bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis por 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro//gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gtogs pa'i sems
13b7(rgyud2): can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor na de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu gtugs par 'gyur//'thob pa dang /'thab mo dang /mu ge
14a1(rgyud2): shAdang /rtsod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /nang 'khrug pa dang /'khrugs pa dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa dang /'tsho ba dang /gdung ba dang mA
14a2(rgyud2): dri ba thams cad dang /nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyura'o//rlung dang /ser ba dang /grang ba dang /tsha ba'i sprin rnams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro//sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur//byed dang /
14a3(rgyud2): g.yengs byed dang /stegs kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /dug dang /dbyig dug dang /dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro//gladon thams cad dang /brjed byed thams cad dang /rims des
14a4(rgyud2): bza' nyes dang /bsgoms nyes dang /gnod sgrib dang /gnod bltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur//'jigs par 'gyur/'gyes par 'gyur te/byang chub kyi snying
14a5(rgyud2): po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur//bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o//'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod po'i zhugs
14a6(rgyud2): pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang /khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad ba zlas brjod bgyi'o//zlas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul por bgyi'o//snying po dang /nye ba'i snang
14a7(rgyud2): po rtsa brgyad bzlos brjod bgyis la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar mo dbul bar bgyi'o//ri mo'i gzugs de nyid mdun du nam langs kyi bar du mchis nas nyal bar bgyis te rmi lam
14b1(rgyud2): du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bad+ma/rin po che'i shing dang bcas/rin po che'i ri dang bcas/rdzing dang bcas/gnas dang /khang pa
14b2(rgyud2): brtsegs ma dang bcas/rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
14b3(rgyud2): kyis yongasu bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po 'jo
14b4(rgyud2): dang bcas pa mthong ngam/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag me de yang rig sngags 'chang de
14b5(rgyud2): la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing legaso zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de/kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang /khyod kyis
14b6(rgyud2): dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang /khyod kyis lhags par ming du byas pa dang /khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
14b7(rgyud2): po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang /gsang sngags rnam par bye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/ligaso leg so//khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid gyur
15a1(rgyud2): khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te tshe rjes nas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyuraro//byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
15a2(rgyud2): du'agro bar 'gyuraro zhes phyag g.yas pa klad pa'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi dngos grub sgrub pa ste/
15a3(rgyud2): 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sado nas dga' bar mthong ste/sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
15a4(rgyud2): phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol par 'gyuraro//gzugs kyi ri mi de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur//
15a5(rgyud2): yin tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyuraro//'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyuraro//skye bo dang rgyal po dang /blon po dang /bram ze dang /
15a6(rgyud2): khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mcher mchod par 'gyuraro//dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro//grub pa chen po bla
15a7(rgyud2): na med pa yang 'thob par 'gyur//nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag rgyo bcing bar bgyi'o//de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor
15b1(rgyud2): pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o//de nas bdag nyid longs spyod par bgyi'o//gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang /
15b2(rgyud2): lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsong sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lo gdug
15b3(rgyud2): par bgyi'o//bdug pas bdug pa tsam gyi mdo la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing dge ba 'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/nyams pa'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur//
15b4(rgyud2): ji tsam che'i mthar thug gi bar du gsungs pa 'am/'gro ba 'am/'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur//de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang /sgrub pa'i don dang /las kyi cho ga yang ji
15b5(rgyud2): lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o//oM pad+ma d+ha ra/a mo g+ha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru swA hA//don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye bi'i snying po'i gsang sngagaso//oM pad+ma pA shad+d+ha
15b6(rgyud2): rA ya/a mo g+ha ba ra sany+tso dra ya hUM/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sprin dang /dri za dang /lha mi yin
15b7(rgyud2): dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsau dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /me dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskal ba'i gsang sngags te/bdug pa'i rgyal pos btugs nas/
16a1(rgyud2): chab dang /yAng s+yA k+Shar bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pagyi sgra nas phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur/
16a2(rgyud2): trai loHa b+h+yA hA na/a ma g+hA pU sha/pad+ma bo lo ki ta A yan+tu/b+hu ba ne su ra/su ru su~M ru/bi ma la d+h+waM/dgug pa'i gsang sngags tAM/gu gul gyi bdug pa la lanA brgya rna brgyad brnya
16a3(rgyud2): brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gau twor bir bgyi ste/thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags//oM pad+ma b+hU dza mahA pA sha d+hA ra Ni man+t+ri ya mA~M/
16a4(rgyud2): mo b+ha pA sha yan tu b+hu pra swa/mu ru mu ru hU~M/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /dkyil 'kho
16a5(rgyud2): thams cad na gnas po'i lha tshogs la sogs pa spyan drangs pa'i gsang sngags te/rIlu pa spyi blugs dang /chab dang /me tog dang /tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs
16a6(rgyud2): te/thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngogaso//oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na ku ru ku ru swA hA/sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing
16a7(rgyud2): ba ste/chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor nas dpag tshad sum rgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis
16b1(rgyud2): brlabs par 'gyur//de thams cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje smra ba'i semasu 'gyuro//ngagra rnams kyis myi mthong ba dang /bgegs dang /log 'dren dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'thad
16b2(rgyud2): po dang /sha za dang /brjed byed dang /ro langs dang /mkha' 'gro ma dang /'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/
16b3(rgyud2): rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas rdo rje sra bas 'gyu ro//oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad+mo t+ta ro si hA/san+na Ti si ri si ri hUM/gdan gyi gsang sngags te yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad
16b4(rgyud2): bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gden du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
16b5(rgyud2): la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng+ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la tsha ba dang /yungs kar la lan/
16b6(rgyud2): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/rog sngags grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngagaso//oM ma hA kA ru Ni ka dAng+ga oM mo g+ha pA shA dri D+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+Ti ha
16b7(rgyud2): b+hu ru b+hu ru ban d+ha ri swA hA//dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang /nags tshil dang /kun dga' ra ba dang /gtsug lag khang dang /sti gnas dang /'tshig sa dang /phug
17a1(rgyud2): dang /dgon pa dang /gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang /yungs kAr la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis rta//
17a2(rgyud2): gan su gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro//hU~Ms par bgyid pa dang /bgegs dang /log 'dren dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'byung po
17a3(rgyud2): thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngagaso//oM pad ma a mo g+ha pA sha na sa man+ta da sha su dik+Shu si mA b+han d+hA yu/tu ru tu ru hUM/lcags kyi phur
17a4(rgyud2): bu sor brgyud pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sna lha'i skud pas dkris te lan+de stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o//lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzung
17a5(rgyud2): par bgyi ste/rgyang grags bdun 'i'akhor ba mtshams bcing bgyis par 'gyur//ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyuraro//
17a6(rgyud2): AM a mo g+ha muN+Da la ban d+hA ya sa man+te na/pad+ma mahA pad+me/d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA//dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/dri chab dang /yungs kAr la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
17a7(rgyud2): bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang /de bzhin du 'og dang /steng du yang gtor te dkyil 'khor chen po bcings par bgyis par 'gyur ro//bgegs dang log
17b1(rgyud2): 'dren dang /gnod sprin+da dang /srin po dang /sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur//sems can gdug pa dang /lha 'am/klu gdug pa gang su yang ru
17b2(rgyud2): ba de dag thams cud zil gyis mnan par 'gyur//'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang /sngags ngan pa dang /sems can ngan pa dang /bgyis pa ngan pa thams cad yongasu spong/
17b3(rgyud2): pAr 'gyuraro//oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud+d+he sho d+ha ya sa man+te na/d+hi ri d+hi ri shud+ha satwa ma hA pad+mi tAM//'dis pa'i rnam lnga pa lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor
17b4(rgyud2): gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na btsug lag khang ngam/dgon pa 'am/bya skyibs sam/tsheng tshing ngam/'chag sa 'am/gnas sam/tshal lam nags tshal lam/bskyed
17b5(rgyud2): mos tshal lam/kun dga' ra ba 'am/brangs 'am/skyabs sa mau/khang pa la gtor na stong pa 'am/mi stong pa 'am/'dam rje ba dang /mi gtsang ba dang /phyag da
17b6(rgyud2): gyis gang ba dang /'byung po dang /sha za dang /yi dgos la sogs te/rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur//gtsang ma dag par 'gyuraro//gnas
17b7(rgyud2): gtsang mar 'gyuraro//bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/bza' nyes dang /sgom nyes dang /gnod bltas dang /gnod sgrib kyis gnas ngan pa thams cad yang su dag
18a1(rgyud2): par 'gyur//gtsang ma dag par 'gyur//mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur//tshangs par spyod pa ma lhags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur//bstan pa
18a2(rgyud2): ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyuraro//de la lha thams cad srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba bgyid par 'gyuraro//dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /
18a3(rgyud2): tshangs pa dang /khyi'i 'jig dang /khyab 'jig chen po dang /gshin rje dang /rmu r+dz+dza dang /lus drin la stsogs pa srung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /skye ba'i slad du rtag tu rnas
18a4(rgyud2): 'brang bar 'gyuraro//'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro//tshig brtsan par 'gyuraro//nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur
18a5(rgyud2): sdig pa dang /sgrib pa dang /gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro//phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na 'thab pa dang /'theb mo dang /rtsod
18a6(rgyud2): pre dang /'gyed pa dang /mu ge dang /mi dras dang /yams dang /gnod pa dang /'tshe ba dang /'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro//nyin gcig bzhin du bdag
18a7(rgyud2): nyid la dbang bskur ram/reg par bgyis na rig sngags dang /phyag rgya dang /dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang /las chen po 'grub par 'gyuraro//don yod
18b1(rgyud2): pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro//gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der mchod par 'gyuraro//thams cad kyis mi bzlog par 'gyuraro//nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya
18b2(rgyud2): chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang /rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro//dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /brgyal rigs
18b3(rgyud2): dang /khyim bdagra dang /rgyal po dang /blon po dang /btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes mchod par 'os por 'gyuraro//rtag tu gtsang myur spyod
18b4(rgyud2): par gcong zhing zhing dag par 'gyuraro//rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyur//'dod pa thams cad kyis mchog stsol bar
18b5(rgyud2): 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
18b6(rgyud2): bde ba tsana? du skye bar 'gyur//oM pad+me sa ra sa ra/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa mA yau swAhA//gosang sngagaso//oM pi pu la pad+ma a mo g+ha pra sa ra pra bi shra tu/ku ru ku ru swA hA/
18b7(rgyud2): 'jug pa'i gsong sngags so//oM i mo g+ha a nu shi ya~M ma hA pad+ma ban b+hu re hUM//slob ma'i gsang sngagaso//oM a mo g+hi pad+ma shi gai tu ru tu ru/tiSh+T+r-i badz+ri ban d+hi swA hIM/
19a1(rgyud2): spyi gtsug gi bcing pa'i gsung sngags te/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso//oM a mo g+ha pad+ma dza long k+She pa/b+hi ri b+hi ri hU~M/chab bteg pa'i
19a2(rgyud2): gusang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso//oM I mo g+ha bi ka TaM b+ha ra pad+ma a sa Ne dza laM ba ti/ku ru ku ru hUM/bum pa'i gsang sngags te lin brgya rtswa brgyad bzlas/
19a3(rgyud2): oM pad+mo pre sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA//chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso//oM a mo g+ha pad+me su pad+me/pUr+Na ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma le/
19a4(rgyud2): swA hA//lag pa'i gsang sngags te/lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor dang /gsang sngags dang /phyag rgya dang /cho gra zhib mo dang
19a5(rgyud2): sgrib pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub por bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad du bgyi'o//oM oM mo g+ho bi ma la dzi hA gra saM sho
19a6(rgyud2): d+hi no pad+ma ka ma la dzi hA/saM sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+hi rA su bi ma le swA hA//lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te kha ba shal la l+le'i
19a7(rgyud2): dri ma yongasu dag par 'gyuraro//pad+ma dang ku mu da'i mdab ma dang 'dra bar lce gnyen par 'gyuraro//so dang /dkan dang /mgul pa yongasu dag par 'gyu ro//oM a mo g+ha ga na
19b1(rgyud2): d+hAd+ha ba ti su ru su ru/pra b+hu ru di bya gan+d+he pad+ma pra b+he swA hA//gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal ba'i ril bu dang tsan dAn dang /na la da dang /s+thi ka dang /ut+pa la dang /gur gum dang /gla rtsi lhan/
19b2(rgyud2): tsog bslang ba bgyis le phye mo zhi ba mir btegs nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi
19b3(rgyud2): snod du stsal nas/bzlos brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na rtag tu kha nas udat+pa le'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/rgyang grags tsam du the
19b4(rgyud2): tsom med//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang dgyes//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu
19b5(rgyud2): dga' bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po////bam po gnyis pa//bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur pas//don yod
19b6(rgyud2): rig sngags bla na med//rig sngag sde 'chang dang gtam bgyid pas//dus kun rul dri spang bar bgyi//mkhris pa pad kan snabas+ye dag dang //de bzhin kun 'jog myur du ni//kha
19b7(rgyud2): nas mi dri dag 'byung //su la tshig dag smras pa ni//de ni myur du da'i du'i gyur//lha rnams dbang dri mi chis pa dang //bad sogs bdag po dbang po dang //gan na
20a1(rgyud2): lha lus ngan dang //tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che//'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang //zla ba nyi ma nyid drug dang //thams cad dbang du gyur nus mchis//
20a2(rgyud2): 'di ni kha na mur bgyid na//tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo la//mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur//rtag tu mi men dbyings 'gyur te/dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs//tshigs bcad
20a3(rgyud2): stob ni klog pa dang //sngon bklags pa ni nyams mi 'gyur//hUM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang //lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis//phaT ces bgyis pas gdug
