20a5(rgyud2): yang 'gyel bar 'gyur//ril bu kha ni thogs na ni//dus kun tu ni mkhas par 'gyur//grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te//thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur//tshig mnyen 'jam zhing
20a6(rgyud2): snyan par 'gyur//rol bu 'di ni btsang bgyis na//don yod pad+ma dri mA med//ril bu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur//oM ma la bi ga twe/pad+ma bi ba re/sany+tsa ra ba ba tsa re swA hA/
20a7(rgyud2): oM mo g+ha sod+d+haM/sho d+ha ya hU~M/na ga pus pa'i shun pa dang /i shi ra dang /tsan dan dang /pad+ma gi sar dang /li shi dang /ka ko la dang /spang spos dang
20b1(rgyud2): rgyu spos dang /gur gum dang /pra pu na da ri ka dang /e la dang /sa ma kra dang /u gra dang /su gan+d+hi kA 'di rnams chu mnyam par bgyis te zhib tu btags nas gsang sngags
20b2(rgyud2): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba 'am/chab dron pos khrus bgyi ba 'am/'tshal pas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang me
20b3(rgyud2): dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis pa gton pa tsam gyis/sngon gyis drag po'i las rnams dang //gdon kun 'joms pa 'grub pa dang //nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang //
20b4(rgyud2): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/mun pa mi zad sbyong bar gsungs//bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni//dri ma kun zhi som nyi med//dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar//bsod
20b5(rgyud2): nams phung po rnam par 'phel//gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'dir//zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes//gtsang ma'i lus gyur pa ni//lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur//mi gtsang ba ni
20b6(rgyud2): gtsang bar 'gyur//ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur//tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur//thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur//tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur//
20b7(rgyud2): mgo skya gnyer ma spang ba dang /rtag tu bro nad ma mchis 'gyur//lus la lha yi dri rnams 'byung //pad+ma ku mud mnyen pa'i lus//sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te//lha yi
21a1(rgyud2): can dun dri dag ni//mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med//rtag tu 'dro bar nyal ba dang //bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur//gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang //
21a2(rgyud2): lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang //gdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur//mi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang min//lus nyid sbyangs pa bgyis nas//bzlas brjod brtson
21a3(rgyud2): pa'i sgrub pa bgyi//legs pa'i sgrub pa'i las bgyis na/de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur//rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa'o kun//de bzhin mod la gzigs par
21a4(rgyud2): 'gyur//lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan//dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi//ci 'dod yid lo bzlas pa yi//rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur//thog mar
21a5(rgyud2): lus sbyangs cho ga bgyi//de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad//oM oM mo g+ha pad+ma lo tsa nI dwi bya//driSh+Ta pi ri shud+d+he/su ru su ru pad+ma ak+Shi sha b+hu ru b+hu ru sa man+ta bya ba
21a6(rgyud2): lo kri nau swA hA//ldong ros gi bang rgya mtsho dbu ba sa ha dza//ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la//gsang sngags sum stong rdzi brgyad bzlas pa'o mgo sman 'di//
21a7(rgyud2): de bzhin gi shegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs//'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis//kun pas bkra shis shis 'di mig nang kud//
21b1(rgyud2): 'joms par bgyi de g.yar lam bzang po rmi//yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur//ngan par snang drang ngan par blta//nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur//gtum po 'joms
21b2(rgyud2): ba gtum po dang //lhag ma sbags pa sgrom nyes dang //bza' nyes gnod bsgribs gnod sbyin dang //srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag/thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu//mi snang
21b3(rgyud2): bar ni the tshom myed//mig gis bzang po mthong ba dang //rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur//zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas//lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur//mig yongasu
21b4(rgyud2): sbyong ba'o//oM bud+d+ha bud d+ha/bi bud d+ha pad+ma a mo g+ha mu khi//ba ra ba ra ba ra de swA hA//rig sngags 'dris pi wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyi'o//don yod
21b5(rgyud2): po'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o//khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o//snying po dang /nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtse brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
21b6(rgyud2): bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang rang blangs te dpral ba'i dbusu thig le bgyis te//thi ga le lan cig bgyis pas dpral ba'i steng na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur//
21b7(rgyud2): gdugs pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis//gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang //srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid//thams cad 'jig 'gyur the tshom med//sems
22a1(rgyud2): can 'dug pas gdugs bsams kyang //phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas//de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te//me la phye ma leb bzhin no//rtag
22a2(rgyud2): tu rgyal po skye bor bcas//'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang //blon po che dang mdun na 'don//btsun mo tshogs bcas dbang du 'gyur//dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag/thams
22a3(rgyud2): codro dbang du mchis par 'gyur//rgyal rigs dmangs rigs nyid dag ste//thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur//mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur//rig sngags
22a4(rgyud2): lo ni thams cad dang //gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste//de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/rje su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur//phyogs bcur srung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing //
22a5(rgyud2): rtag tu grub pa bla med stsol//thig le 'di bgyi grogs med rgyu ba dgal chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang //g.yul 'gyod nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa//kun nas
22a6(rgyud2): bsgral bar 'gyur to som nyi med//seng ge stag dang dom dag dang //glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang //wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang //sro gdugs sbal kun
22a7(rgyud2): mgo nas za//gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas//de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te//nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//ser ba me dang tshig pa dang //char pa mi
22b1(rgyud2): bzang mtshon chu byad//mkhas pas thig le 'chang pa'i lus//khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur//mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don//thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur//
22b2(rgyud2): shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang //'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med//bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'ching gis bdag dran par bgyid cing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
22b3(rgyud2): po dran par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun na bdag mchis nas yid la bsams pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//thams cad kyi mchog
22b4(rgyud2): thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o//dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o//don yod grub pa rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o//bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig
22b5(rgyud2): rje su bskyang bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par bgyid na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
22b6(rgyud2): dang //de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkras rje su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur
22b7(rgyud2): na/bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis me nong so//de lta bas na rig sngags 'tshang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang //cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas gsang sngags dang /
23a1(rgyud2): phyag rgya sgrub pa bgyi ste dgos pa de drag thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyuraro//de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/oM a mo g+ha
23a2(rgyud2): prA sha d+ha ra pra sa ra hU~M//mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i grasang sngags te/gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i bskud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod kyis nus mdud pa gsum
23a3(rgyud2): dor bar bgyi'o//au a mo g+h+ya pra ba ra Na/mu ru mu ri dwi bya ka shi ki/saM b+ha bA tu ta ra ta rA swA hA//gos kyi gsung sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//au
23a4(rgyud2): a mo g+ha bas+t+ra ts+tshed k+Shi pA mi bo d+hi ni pad+me swA hA//gros bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lani nyi shu rtsa gi cig bzlas so//oM da byo da ka si b+hu ta a mo g+ha ba ru Ni tsa re b+hi k+Shin
23a5(rgyud2): ts+ya hUM//khrus kyi sngags te lon nyi shu rtse gcig bzlaso//oM a mi ta a mo g+ha pad+ma a sa ne/baR+Sha ni/tsu ru tsu ru swA hA//nye ri go gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
23a6(rgyud2): byazlas so//oM e mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni/ku ru ku ru swA hA//bdag srung ba ste/yungs kar dang /chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bsku ro//
23a7(rgyud2): oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/mi hA pad+me tiSh+Thi tiSh+Tha hU~M/dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM sar+b+ba tra a mo g+he ba ba ti tiSh+Tha rak+Sha tu hUM/slob ma dang
23b1(rgyud2): grogs bgyid pa bsrung ba ste/thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o//oM trai lokya pad+ma a mo g+ha kra ma ne mi li mi li swA hA//gom pa do ng+ka bsngags te lan
23b2(rgyud2): ny+tsi shU rtswa gcig bzlas//oM pad+me mahA pad+me sa ra sA rI/su man+te na pa ri baSh+Ta ya/a mo g+ha pA she na su ru su ru sAMhA/tshon skud sna ldi l-i lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar dgyi'o//
23b3(rgyud2): oM bi tsi tra a mo g+ha bstan/raM gi bi shu d+hA ya/ki Ni kI Ni swA hAM/bA dani gyi glasang sngags ti lan bdun bzlas//oM a ma g+hA sha re badz+ra tun+ta thA ra the ra swA hA//mda'
23b4(rgyud2): gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM ba~M pu la A mo b+ha mi hI d+ha ra bi shud+d+he/si ri si ri swA hA/rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//su dag dang
23b5(rgyud2): zhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur//sdig pa dang sgrib pa thums cad yongasu byeng par 'gyuraro//oM nA nA bi tsi Ti/a mo g+ha puSh+pa/pha la tI kIR+Sha pU ra ya/
23b6(rgyud2): par pA rA hUM/bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lani bdun bzlas//oM a mo g+ha rAt+na br-i mA Na/ka Ta tsa/a dr-iSh+Ta bi byA glan d+ho dza s+pha ra Na/sa man+te ni dz+wa lo dz+wa lu swA hA/
23b7(rgyud2): pog phor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun ba zlas so//oM dz+wA la wi ti/rat+na g+hA ta/sau ri Ni tu nri tu Ti swA hA/gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te la bdun bai so//oM
24a1(rgyud2): d+hA dzan/a mo g+ha ts+tsha nA amr-ig+h+na pad+ma pU ro b+hA ra ya dz+dza/kham por gyi gsang sngag sa lan bdun bzlas+ho//oM a mo g+hA sa~M pur Ni dro Na gan+d+ha paSh+Tha
24a2(rgyud2): swA hA/thig le'i gsang sngags twa lan bdun bzlas//A~M sa ri ni sA ra ya/a mo g+ha b+ha dzA na mA dA ne hUM/rol ba mgrin rings kyi gsang sngags te ldan bdun bzlas//oM
24a3(rgyud2): di bya rat+na kum b+ha ba ti sA ga re/sau pU ra Ni swA hA/bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM bi tsi two dza la nA na raM ga b+hi b+hak+ta ya saM shro d+ha ya tu Ti swA hA/mtshon rtsi'i
24a4(rgyud2): gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM di bya a wa lo ki ni bi b+ha dza yi tu sa man+te na sa ma ra Ne swA hA/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o//
24a5(rgyud2): oM na nA pra hA ra Na a mo b+h+ra mu dA dz+wa lA dz+wa laM swA hA/phyag mtshan bri ba sne lan bdun bzlaso//oM u mo g+ha rat+na su tra d+ha re/ki Ni ki Ni swA hA//thig skud kyi gsang sngags
24a6(rgyud2): telan brgya rtse brgyad bzlas brjid bgyis te dkyil 'khor ram ri mo bri ba'i ras sam/gzhan gzhi ci yang rung ba la yang gdab par bgyi'o//oM bi bu la bA re pre be sha
24a7(rgyud2): ya/oM mog+ha n+thi hU~M/sgo'i tshe bye ba'i gsang sngags ste sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//oM su b+hib+hAk+Sh+mI su maM ga la d+hA ra bA ban ti/oM da d+yaH
24b1(rgyud2): nA/a mo g+hA pA sha nu ba na ba re gi rI gri ri hU~M/au saM pUr+tha/ru pyid byA ba dza ni/oM mo g+ha pad+me swA hA/lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o//oM bi bi d+ha rU pa hA ro ba kA ra Na/tsA la/
24b2(rgyud2): tsA la/a mr-i b+ha ba ti swA hA/lan nyi shu rtsi gcig bzlas so//oM di bya gan+d+ha nu sa ri NaM I mai g+haM ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra s+yAhA/mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas//
24b3(rgyud2): oM gan+d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/a mo g+ha pra s+phA ra hUM/drini gseng sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM nir ma la kA ya sho d+ha ni dI bya gan+d+ha pra pu ra Ni pU rA ya hU~M/byug pa'i gsang sngags
24b4(rgyud2): te lan bdun bzlaso//oM g+han+na tsUR+ShA pre pU ra Ni/tsu ru tsu ru swA hI/dr-i'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te/lan bdun bzlaso//oM sa maM se man+te na/bi me lo g+han d+ho ta ta re swA hA//bskul
24b5(rgyud2): ba'i gsang sngags te lan bduni bzlas so//au da bya gan+d+ha pra b+hU rA Ni sA ga ra dza la dipe bye a d+hiSh+NI te ka la sho d+hi ra/pUr+N+Na pU ra ya dza ya sid+he swA hA//bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang//
24b6(rgyud2): sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so//oM ra s+t+r-i sA gri pa ti/sar+b+ba bi d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Tau twe saM pU ra ya hUM/gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi
24b7(rgyud2): shu rtsa gcig bzlaso//oM dib bya b+ho dza na/saM pU ra ya/bi pu la pra b+he swA hA//kha zas kyi gsang sngags te/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso//au tri shukla b+ho dza na/
25a1(rgyud2): ba li bri pU la ra swA gra ba tI su ra pra su ra d+h+r-i/zlas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma 'am/gtor ma gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//oM pha la
25a2(rgyud2): ba tI skA ra ba tI dpe byA ba nA sU ti/tA rA t+tArA tu nI swAhA//'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM dpe byA gu su mod pA lan+d+ha nA pUSh+Ta pra ban+d+ha ni b+hA ba swA hA//me
25a3(rgyud2): tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso/oM bi bi d+hi la ta puSh+pe pa kurba thi ta ba ne s+pha ti a hA ra saM b+hAH/kr-i b+he swA hA/me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas//
25a4(rgyud2): mahA d+hU pa mi g+ha be Ta la sany+tsa dA ya/saM mAn+ta nu hUM swAhA//bdug pa'i gsad sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//oM U tha ra pa Ni dz+wa la dz+wA la/de ba mu khai swA hUM//ma'i
25a5(rgyud2): gsang+ge sngags te lan bdun bzlaso//oM b+hi bi d+hi ma Ni ka na ka rat+no dz+wa la pUSh+mi ma Ni a mo g+ha ma Ni swA hA//cha zhing brgyan pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas//oM pad+ma
25a6(rgyud2): ka re bi me lA na kha/ang gu li/sA ma sA mA sar+b+bA tA thA gA tA/a d+hiSh+To taM swAh+ma//thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas//oM sarba gu Na hri
25a7(rgyud2): Na ta/shi ro b+ha na d+ha nA ya na ma ska ro mi/mi li mo li tuM ri Ni swA hA//phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngogs te lan bdun bzlaso//oM da sha di sha a b+hi ban d+ha na pra sa ra
25b1(rgyud2): ts+tshab+h+yo//bskor bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtswa gcig bzlas so//oM bA~M bi d+hA yu d+hA dz+wa li ta pa ni/pradz+wa la pra sUr b+h+rUM/thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan shu rtswa gcig bzla
25b2(rgyud2): oM de baM bya a mo g+ha bi pu li swa ro ma d+hu ra nir g+ho Sha ru twe na ra Na ra Na hUM//dril bu'i gsang sngags te nyi shu r+dz+dza gcig bzlaso//yang nA brgya rtse brgyad do//oM ra sh+mi dz+wa la sa min+te/
25b3(rgyud2): na a ba b+hA swa ya ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi khaM swA hA/mar me'i g+hasang sngags te lan+da brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso//oM d+ha ru d+hu ru aM pa hA ya shI g+ho dza be hU~M//dgug pa'i gisang sngags
25b4(rgyud2): tAM gu gul gyi bdug pa lan biN+ya rtsa brgyad bzlaso//oM duSh+pa se de bi bo d+ha ni//sa ma sa mA ya b+hA rI swA hA//dam tshig gi gsang sngags te len nyi rtsa gcig bzlaso//
25b5(rgyud2): bi tsi tr-i ma Ni bi bu le pra ba ra ta no hU~M//bo glang phreng gI gsang sngags taM lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso//oM bri tsI tre rit+no dz+wa lo dri ba bya//ku su mo ba re puSh+ka rA ti swA hA//me tog
25b6(rgyud2): phreng ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas//oM dIb bya lo tse ne a mo g+ha pro ba re//sarba dipa bya a d+hiSh+Thi ta sid+d+hi shud+d+ha bi lo ki te swA tA//dgug pa'i gsang sngags te
25b7(rgyud2): len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//aM a mo g+ha pad+me sau man ta shu b+ha ne taM re ta ra/gats+tsha swa b+ha ba na ma swA hA//slar ga shegasu gsol ba'i gsang sngags te len nyi shu
26a1(rgyud2): gcig bzlas//oM dib byA saM pU ra Ni//nA ga bo la kin+da hU~M//'khar bsil gyi gsang sngags te lan ny+tsi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//oM pad na s+pha rit+ti sU
26a2(rgyud2): rA ya//a mo g+ha bi ta sa mun+ta prA b+h+re swAhA//lhung bzed k+ShiM gsang sngags te lan ny+tsi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//oM dwer b+hu sr-i stA ra bi d+h+ya a tiSh+Thi tA pr-i sA ra//su ra~M su ra/
26a3(rgyud2): Shi pU dzi te swA hA//rtswa gting ba'i gr-isang sngags tre lan nyi shu rtsa gricig bzlas so//oM dz+wa lA du ma dz+wa la shi khi ri sh+mi ga raM b+he swA hU~M//sbyin sreg gi gsung sngags te lan
26a4(rgyud2): brgya rtsa brgya bzlaso//oM pad+me nI pad+ma se ne ba re nA ga b+hu ba ni swA hA//'bib chu dang /mtsho'i gsang sngags tI lan bdun bzlas so//oM khA gra tsa ri Ni//ge ma ga ma
26a5(rgyud2): ya prad pra tse ri NI hU~M//len pa'i gsing sngags te la ni brgya rtsi brgyad bzlas//oM sarba tA a mo g+ha b+hi She ka ma hA tsU Di bi ma le//a b+hiShiny+tsa tu man//pra bur
26a6(rgyud2): pU NI b+hU dzi prad+me d+hA dza~M swAhA//dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lano nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//rig sngags 'chang gi sA gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor
26a7(rgyud2): cho ga zhib mo'i sgrib po ji lta bu bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na rigs pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang /me tog dang /bdug
26b1(rgyud2): pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang /nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lha'i me tog dang /gdugs
26b2(rgyud2): dang /ba da na sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro//ro brgya dang /ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang /ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//gtor mo bzang po rnam pa
26b3(rgyud2): sna tshogs 'bying bar 'gyur ro//ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta
26b4(rgyud2): bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuro//lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro//klu rnams dang /gnod sprin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha'
26b5(rgyud2): ldeng rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams la/so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta bo de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro//mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang /
26b6(rgyud2): khyi zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de lta bus na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang /de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang /
26b7(rgyud2): cho ga dang gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'tshang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro//gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las
27a1(rgyud2): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste don yod bu'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis
27a2(rgyud2): nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o//sdig pa dang /sgrib pa dang /gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur//yongasu dag pa'i lha chen
27a3(rgyud2): po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o//cho ga zhib mo dang /phyag rgya dang /gsang sngags dang /snying po dang /dkyil 'khor dang /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam par thar
27a4(rgyud2): pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad sbrul por bgyi'o//rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro//de kho na nyid
27a5(rgyud2): yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o//don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o//
27a6(rgyud2): shin tu rgya che zhing bgu tsha ba ma mchis pa drang /mchod pa dang /bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang /
27a7(rgyud2): dpal stsol bar bgyi'o//'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o//sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
27b1(rgyud2): stong rje dang /dga' ba dang /tang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o//bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu bad+d+ha bar brgya'o//
27b2(rgyud2): pUr sme ba dang /bden par dga' ba dang /snyan par smra ba dang /snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o//bzlas brjod
27b3(rgyud2): kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis
27b4(rgyud2): nas/sangs rgyas rje su~M drin pasgom par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o//'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
27b5(rgyud2): phyag bgyis nas mngon sum du sgom par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyanA ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te mdun du rtsa'i gding ba grating
27b6(rgyud2): nas skyil mo krung bzlas te mchi sa nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste/'dri na gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o//de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi
27b7(rgyud2): bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig/'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang /sems can dag pa
28a1(rgyud2): lag na pad+ma can/sems can thams cadang+ga la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs dang /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
28a2(rgyud2): gshegs pa kun dang /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /srin po lha min gosang ba pa dang //'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang /drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs//gshin
28a3(rgyud2): rje chu lha lus dran dang //drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du//zla nyi kun bged gzhon nu dang //de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang //phyag rgya bcing ba tsam gyis ni//de dag myur
28a4(rgyud2): du 'du bar 'gyur//sgrol me bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur//de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang //mgrin sngon de bzhini gos dkar can//de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang //rgyal dang rnam
28a5(rgyud2): rgyal nyid dang na//lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgyogs dang //lha mo khro gnyer mA ma ki/dpe med pheM nye mo dang ni//'jigs med dpal dang dbyings can drang //pad+ma ko ti ung+ga
28a6(rgyud2): yau//pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du//te se yi no rtse mo na//'phrog mi 'byung po'i ma dag dang //de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu//mthu chen ji bzhin rigs 'dzin dbang //rdo rje 'chang
28a7(rgyud2): tshen de bzhin du//bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang //sum nu gnyis nas lha dag ni//gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis//de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur//
28b1(rgyud2): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do//de'i med la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag
28b2(rgyud2): tu mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro//rtag tu mgron po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong po dang /phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa blta 'tshal bar 'gyur//
28b3(rgyud2): phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis na//bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags//mthong bar 'gyur te sdom nyi med//mgrin sngon dang nI rta mgrin dang //de bzhin rgya mtsho'i glong dang
28b4(rgyud2): no//mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dang //de bzhin zhal ni bzhi drag dang //mgron po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang //de bzhin gzigs pa bas mo mi khyab//rnam pa
28b5(rgyud2): sna tshogs gzugs dang ni//sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin//phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis//mgon pos thams cad ston par mdzad//bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams//
28b6(rgyud2): rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpagra med//byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba//mgon po mod la mthong bur 'gyur//gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong drag gi/chu bo grang
28b7(rgyud2): ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i//de bzhon gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor meg na//phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis
29a1(rgyud2): mthong bar 'gyur//mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste//nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang //chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje
29a2(rgyud2): gdan//de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas//de la yid gnyis som nye the tshom med//sangs rgyas rnams kyi go shung ba 'am mtshams med lnga//mgon po che la
29a3(rgyud2): gdugs sems nyid dang ni//byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags pa la//kha zer nyid dang dam chos bslu ba dang //rgyal bas gsungs spong menar med gzhol
29a4(rgyud2): pa dang //maM bzod dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang //bskal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol//phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam//thos sam mtho
29a5(rgyud2): ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang //sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med//don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong pa yang //'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par
29a6(rgyud2): 'phags//sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang gA yi//bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur//byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang //chos kyi 'khor lo
29a7(rgyud2): rab tu bskor bar mtshungs//don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang //gsang sngags mthong nas bsod nams bung chen gyis//bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar
29b1(rgyud2): 'gyur//de'i tshe yang rnam par 'phel b.rar gyur//de ni dpag tu med par som nyi med//de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas//gcing ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar//
29b2(rgyud2): yang //yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang //rtag tu yan lag spros ni sna tshogs dang //sna chags bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing //dpung pa lag pa lha'i spos
29b3(rgyud2): kyis byug/gtsong ma'o sa phyogs gtsang mo'i stan ba shamos par//skyil mo krung bcis nas ni byams sems dang /snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam gzhug nas//phyogs bcu'i dus
29b4(rgyud2): gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //rtag tu 'jig rten dang nga la phyas bgyi zhing //rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson//shin tu reg pas tshig gzhan mo smra bar//shin
29b5(rgyud2): tu reg pas srung ba'i cho ga bgyi//shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus//bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang //sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can//lhan cig rjes
29b6(rgyud2): 'thun gyur nas de nas ni//phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste/log pa pad+ma'i tshul du bzhig la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings tI mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying kar bzhago/phyag
29b7(rgyud2): rgya 'ad ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do//mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di
30a1(rgyud2): brjod do//oM a mo g+ha bi ku ra be ta/sA man+ta a wa lo ka ya nA mas+t+rai yA d+hA/a d+hiSh+Ti tA a mo g+hA pad+me tsa ra sany+dza ra hU hUM//de ma thag tu ngus ba
30a2(rgyud2): la rnam par blta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam po'i dus gsum du gshegs
30a3(rgyud2): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyuraro//dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od
30a4(rgyud2): zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma drag byung nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos
30a5(rgyud2): phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyuraro//grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin
30a6(rgyud2): gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro//dbang phyug dang /dbang phyog chen po dang tshangs pa dang /lha'i bu dang /gshin rje dang /chu lha dang //lus ngan dang /khyab bdag dang /
30a7(rgyud2): kun bgod gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /snyed pa bgyid par 'gyuraro//phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang /slob pa thams cad
30b1(rgyud2): dang /'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang /chad pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro//de'i grub pa yid du ma che bar 'gyuraro//las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du
30b2(rgyud2): mchog lags par grogs pa lagaso//don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa//pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing //'dzub mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyid li se
30b3(rgyud2): mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor brtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do//oM a mo g+ha pad+mi ku sha sa ma A
30b4(rgyud2): na/grah+Na gr-ih+Na/d+ha ra d+ha ra/ma hA satwa hUM//phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu 'am/gzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
30b5(rgyud2): thaman kyis legaso//zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang /mnyes pa dang /rab tu dgyes pa dang /tshim pa dang
30b6(rgyud2): thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol par 'gyur zhing /yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar
30b7(rgyud2): 'gyuraro//mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro//don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
31a1(rgyud2): kyi chog zhib mo phyag rgya dang /gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung bu tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjesu 'jug par 'gyur//thams cad/
31a2(rgyud2): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang /dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//thams cad dgos pa'i gsang sngags/
31a3(rgyud2): grub par 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu lta ba 'tshol bar 'gyur ro//lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje
31a4(rgyud2): lhur bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang po'i phyag rgya ni/pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang //me tog la sogs dri rnams dang //phreng ba byug pi phye ma dang //ba dan gos dang rgyan dang
31a5(rgyud2): ni//gtor mu mchod yon rab tu dbul//bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang //tshon skud sna lnga tshon phye'o//gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la//phyag rgya 'di ni kun la
31a6(rgyud2): mchog/'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs//thams cad du ni don yod mchog/go bir bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni//pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs//gung myor
31a7(rgyud2): nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag tsha ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te 'di ni grub pa dmo pa lagos//spyan drang po'i gosang sngags ni//oM
31b1(rgyud2): a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA satwa a ya tu mi ha maN+Da lo/bi rI bi ri pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA//dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags ste//byang
31b2(rgyud2): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug/lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du//dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug/phyag rgya 'di ni brjengs pa yis//byo
31b3(rgyud2): bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang //de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //dri bra lha min de bzhin du//namakha' ldeng dang mi 'am ci//lto 'phye chen
31b4(rgyud2): po nyid dag ste//do kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing //srung dri'i phyir ni si ma nyi med//lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la//ldog pa'i mthe'u chud rnams pad+ma'i mtsham su bya ste/
31b5(rgyud2): gung mo rnams yid tsam bskum pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcings dang //dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yA//srung ba'i las las bag
31b6(rgyud2): med//phyag rgya 'dri ni bcing tsam dang //gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis//dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu//mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang //
31b7(rgyud2): srung ba'i los ni bgyis par 'gyuraro//oM a mo g+he badz+ra dr-i D+haM pad+ma pani d+ha sa man+te na ma hA sa man+ta rak+Shan+tu muM/tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/de nas don yod phyag rgya ste//grub ldan sems
32a1(rgyud2): can kun smra na//don yod pa yi phyag rgyu ni//byed par 'phyags pa gzhan yang bstan//rdo rje thul mo sbyar nas sor ma rnams mnyam par gzhag
32a2(rgyud2): ste/srin lag khwa gdengs la sor mo rnams yid tsamo bsgoms pa ni/don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi//pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags/phyag rgya 'di ni las kun
32a3(rgyud2): dang //'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang //dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs//phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang //gsang sngags dam pa bsrung bgyis na//
32a4(rgyud2): rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur//dus gsum ga shugs pa rnam thar pa'i//dkyil 'khor dom pa grub par 'gyur//oM badz+re bidz+re/a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me bi shwa rA
32a5(rgyud2): pa d+ha ri/d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/pra be sha tus+t+rai ya d+ha nu ga tan d+hi ri tu ni swA hA/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis//de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi//sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam
32a6(rgyud2): drug tu//g.yo brar 'gyur bar som nyi med//phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'brer nas//mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis//rtag tu lta
32a7(rgyud2): zhing mdun na mchis//sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang //mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur//sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na/gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byod cing //sun/
32b1(rgyud2): cu rtsa gsum gnas sgron//gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed//bde chen 'jig rten khams dag ni//sgro na gnas pa sgo 'byed//phyag rgya 'di ni bcings btsam gyis//gnas/
32b2(rgyud2): kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur//phyag rgyu sdig pa thams cad 'phyog/nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms//sdug bsngal kun la sa rnam par grol//gnod pa thams cad 'di
32b3(rgyud2): par bgyid//dmyal ba bcu drug rnams lwa thAr//phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni//mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang //nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid dmyal
32b4(rgyud2): ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur//mi bzad 'jig so las bsgral ba 'brung phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis//mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang //sdig pa kun las rnam
32b5(rgyud2): par thar/sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob//phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/gung mo pad+ma'i ral pa'i
32b6(rgyud2): tshul du bgyis te/spyi bro'i rol pas lI bzhag pa ni pad+ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te/'dri na don yod pa'i lag pa zhes bsgrags te/sems can thams cad la sman pa'i
32b7(rgyud2): slong du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o//oM a ma~M b+h+ya pad+mo rna mo bi sho yats+tsha/rdzi bai ri bi me le swAt+ma/phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas rnga bdag gis//dkris
33a1(rgyud2): nas gang mas gsang sngags ni//brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas//phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas//rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis//mi
33a2(rgyud2): gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur//mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang //tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur//mi thub pas ni thub par 'gyur//bsod nams phung pos lha bzhin /
33a3(rgyud2): 'bar//zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes//'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub//grub pa don yod zhags pa yi//don yod de nyid 'grub par
33a4(rgyud2): 'gyur//lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te//srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med//mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs//sems dpa' mchog sbyin dag pa po//mchog sbyin rgyun/
33a5(rgyud2): tu thams cad du//nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing //tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur//de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur//thams cad du ni las 'grub ste//gnod pa kun
33a6(rgyud2): las rnam par grol//sdig pa kun las rnam par thar//thams cadadu ni bkra shes mchog/khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag no//don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no//lag gnyis
33a7(rgyud2): bsdams la 'og tu bsten//srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskum pa ni/pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya legs te/kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu
33b1(rgyud2): 'di//skyil mo krung bcas mchis nus//phyag rgya 'dri dag bcings pa gyis zhing //mnyam par bzhag nas g+ha smang sngags bzlas//bcings pa tsam gyis mong nas ni//smyol klung rdo rje
33b2(rgyud2): lhun mnyam 'gyur//kun nas ge cher gyur nas ni//bgegs dang ldog 'dren thams cad dang //gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas//lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong //
33b3(rgyud2): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu//de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros//bgegs med par ni la sngo 'grub bla//bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med/oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dr-i
33b4(rgyud2): D+ho pad+me shwa rA dzA//thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas mthe bong pad+ma khwa phye ba ltar bgyi ste//don yod pa'i dpung phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o//'phags pa
33b5(rgyud2): spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bo cing brarA bgyi'o//oM paud+me shwa ra a mo g+ha ba ra da/b+hI ri b+hi ri s+t+rI hA//'dis thog myar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa
33b6(rgyud2): gcig bgyi'o//de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa'i bsam pa rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o//lan cig bzlas po
33b7(rgyud2): tsam gri mod la dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco/
34a1(rgyud2): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig sngags 'chung de la logaso zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro//dbugs 'byin par mdzad//rig
34a2(rgyud2): sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad//mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyuraro//
34a3(rgyud2): 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
34a4(rgyud2): ldan par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyuraro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyuraro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu
34a5(rgyud2): dag par 'gyur ro//phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'o snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la yon tan+da dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyuraro//bzlas
34a6(rgyud2): brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas zhag gcig bsnyungs pa bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
34a7(rgyud2): bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol te/rig sngags 'chang legaso lagaso//'di ni bzlas brjod kyi ngom
34b1(rgyud2): pa yin no zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/tshur shog bu glang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang
34b2(rgyud2): sbyin no//khyod rjesu bzung zhing byin gyis bslab pas nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig/rig sngogs 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas rnam par
34b3(rgyud2): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang /cho gzhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig/snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la goms par
34b4(rgyud2): gyis shig/khyod 'di nas mi 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phros tAM 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gri bar 'gyur zhing khyod pad+ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas rgyan thams cad
34b5(rgyud2): kyis brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur//'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bor lan stong rtsa brgyad
34b6(rgyud2): bzlas brjod bgyis te/phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas badz+rod bgyis te/phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bci ngas pas/lan stong rtse brgyad chang nas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyuraro//don
34b7(rgyud2): yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro//rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongasu bskor
35a1(rgyud2): bar 'gyur//tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyuraro//don yod rgya tshor snang ba zlos bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul glang gi mthus stong
35a2(rgyud2): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar ldog par 'gyuraro//bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya
35a3(rgyud2): stong bcings na tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod pa'i mig yongasu
35a4(rgyud2): dag pa 'theb par 'gyur//dbang phyug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshangs bya dang /lha'i bu daM dA/drag po dang /dbang po dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /gzhon nu dang /
35a5(rgyud2): gshin rje dang /chu lha dang /lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyu ro//klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur//ji
35a6(rgyud2): lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/'odi ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum lagaso//'bum bzlas
35a7(rgyud2): pas 'jig rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur//de bzhin
35b1(rgyud2): shogs pa thams cad la lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur//byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi byang du b+hi mi ldog par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//phyag rgya bcings te skyel ma hA/
35b2(rgyud2): bcus nas sems can thams nAd laM brje ba dang /'byung ba thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang basprin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la ni cig pas/
35b3(rgyud2): brjod pakyi'o//bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan d+haglu brgya bzhi bcu bzlas brjod pagyis par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad ci
35b4(rgyud2): dran pa dang /blo gas dang /gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid//bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis med la pha rol du phyin pa drug/yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//ri mo'i sku
35b5(rgyud2): gzugs de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur//mchog tham
35b6(rgyud2): cad stsol bar 'gyur//de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyur //sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongasu bsal ba dang gdugs par 'gyuraro//nang thams cad
35b7(rgyud2): spangs par 'gyur//'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rdzasu dran pa sgom par bgyi'o//'phags pa don yod pa'i zha/
36a1(rgyud2): pa'i tshi ga zhib mo'i rgyal ba//dam po gsum pa//thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yud tsam bkug ste khar gtad la/
36a2(rgyud2): srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo d+h+r-i lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod de//oM tu ru tu ru pad+me a mo g+ha sid+d+hidz+haiM//phyag rgya 'di ni den yod gyu//las rnams g+ha
36a3(rgyud2): dang ldan pa yi//'di ni bcing bu bgyis pa yis//kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur//myur du ston pa stsol 'gyur te//rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog/mchog kun
36a4(rgyud2): rab tu stobs par 'gyur//'jig rten 'das de 'jig rten pa//sgrib pa thams ci dri las ni rnam par gro laM//bsod nams phung po dgra ni rtag tu 'phel//bkra shis sgra
36a5(rgyud2): ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o//lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur//rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing //rtag tu sems ni bstan por bgyi//mdzum mo dag ni yid bskums
36a6(rgyud2): nas//snying kha dag tu rab tu brkyang //don yod pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /snying po gsungs pa dang /pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams
36a7(rgyud2): cad grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/oM e mo g+ha hri da ya/pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad+me d+hA ro ma hA mad+hA ye hr-i da ya
36b1(rgyud2): hU~M/snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yi//pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi//grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med//thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/de ni
36b2(rgyud2): grub par 'gyur te som nyi med//shin tu gsing ba'i phyag rgya bzung //shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas//shin tu bkrus pas gotsang bgo/gtsang ma'i sems
36b3(rgyud2): kyis 'chang bgyid cing //sems can kun la baN+yer g+hor nas//rtag tu bla ma gus par sgom//rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing //pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi//myur du las
36b4(rgyud2): 'grub myur du ni//pad+ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'thob//myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug 'thob//myur du sems can kun phan ldan//log pa g.yon pa tsam gyis kha ra
36b5(rgyud2): pad+ma tshul du bzhag li lag pa bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyi na du sgreng /mthe bong yod tsam la bkug la lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la mthe
36b6(rgyud2): bong yid tsam bkug ste/gung mo don yod pa'i zhags pa byigyi ba ni don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga chen po'i mig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i
36b7(rgyud2): bdag nyid can lags te/gaMsang sngags 'di brjod do//oM pa shu pe ti pA shA d+ha ra sa ha swa rash+mi pra ti ma Na Di ta kA ya/A ka ro Sha ni/sats+tshe da ni/b+hu ru b+hu ru/a
37a1(rgyud2): mo g+hA p+tA shA sid d+hId+b+ha//phyug rgyu dris gsang skyugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas lhag pa g.yas/
37a2(rgyud2): pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bdag cing slar yong rong gi gnas bzung zhing gsong sngogs lan bdun bzlas te/len bdun du yang bdeg go//don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni//
37a3(rgyud2): bsam pa mchog tu dag pas bgyi//bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni//don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis//byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang //mod la sangs rgyas nyid du
37a4(rgyud2): 'gyur//gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang //ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin//mod la grub pa bla med dang //mod la thams cad dgug par 'gyur//lha dang klu dang gnod
37a5(rgyud2): sbyin dang /dri za lha min na mkha' lding //mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che//reg sngags 'chung la blta ba'i phyir//thams cad de yi mod la 'du//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tham
37a6(rgyud2): cid dag/de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyi'i phyir//byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur//mgon po 'phags spyan ras gzig
37a7(rgyud2): mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur//yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi//rang bzhin mod lo ston par mdzad//gang dag mnar med song ba dang //sems can mtshams
37b1(rgyud2): med lnga bgyid dang //gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang //grang drag dam chos spong ba dang //phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug dang //bcing bas mod la sdig pa kun//'jig
37b2(rgyud2): 'gyur mod lnga 'dren pa mthong //phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni//dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang //gsang sngags bzlog par bgyid
37b3(rgyud2): pa drang //rig sngags 'chung ba mthong ba de//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dab ni//mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya//tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni//brgya dang stong du bas
37b4(rgyud2): pa yi//sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams//phyag rgya bcungs som mthong tsam gyis//de kun 'byeng 'gyur sdom nyi med//thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar te/mkhas pas pad+ma'i
37b5(rgyud2): tshul du bgyis la mdzub mi nor bu bgyis to//gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste//log pa spyi bor brkyang ni sa
37b6(rgyud2): smye bor dbang bskur bstsal pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do//oM s+yu d+hA nu ga ta/a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu/sarba s+yA d+hA/a b+hi She kr-iHpad+ma ma Ni su pad+me/a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga ta/a d+hiSh+Ti te/
37b7(rgyud2): hU~M/'dis dbang bskur po tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag gis
38a1(rgyud2): dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
38a2(rgyud2): thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig po'i gnas su 'gyuraro//spyi gtsug rdo rje pad+ma bcing //rtag tu ser mo'i rtse mo brkyang //mdzub
38a3(rgyud2): mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi//rang gi gdong gi khro gnyer bzhin//khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che//las kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi//thams cad sgrub bgyid phyag rgya ste/kun
38a4(rgyud2): sgrub dam pas gsang sngags pas//'di dran grub pa kun gyi mchog/oM kro d+ha rA dz+nyo d+ha ma mahA a mo g+ha ha ni hA na/sar+b+ba duSh+TA nA hUM/phyag rgya 'di dran tsa mo gyis kyang //mthu
38a5(rgyud2): chen po yi gsang sngags kyis//gdug pa kun no rnam 'jig ste//ri rab kyang ni snyil bar bgyid//phyag rgya bcing bar bgyis pa yis//sdig pa thams cad 'jig par
38a6(rgyud2): bgyid//sems can gdug pa dang gdug pa'i klu//bgegs dang log 'dren badrug pa ste//de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//phyag rgya bci ngas pa tsam gyis ni//thams
38a7(rgyud2): ca dbang du gyur nas mchis//lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang //bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa//thams cad dbang du gyur nos ni//mchis par 'gyur bar som nyi med
38b1(rgyud2): rgyud nortag tu mnyam gzhag lnga//mthe bong mnyam du \u0f7f tag nas ni//phung mo yis ni grung mo nyid//yid tsam bklag nas sbyang bar bkyi//'di na pad+ma chen po yi//l+h+wa mau k+ko lA ma'i byun//
38b2(rgyud2): rgya ste//grub pa bla na med pa yi//thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags//thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar//mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la//mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni//dkar
38b3(rgyud2): shi chen mo'i phyag rgya ste//'di ni kun grub bla na med//rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyar dam bcings shing //shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la//khro gnyer bzhin bash+tsi/
38b4(rgyud2): khrob dang //phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab tu sbyin//lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar brkyang nas ni//gsang ba de brkyang gung mo bskum nasu//mthe chung brkyang nas lcags sgrogs
38b5(rgyud2): pad+ma yi//tshul du snying ka'i gnasu bzhag por bgyi//phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che//phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis//dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang //dkyil 'khor
38b6(rgyud2): lha kun dga' bar 'gyur/thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang //kun gyis srung bgyid som nyi med//phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni//thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin
38b7(rgyud2): du byas te//snying karare bzhag pa gnod sbyin pho nya mo//'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags//dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la//gung mo lhag mi bskums
39a1(rgyud2): gling mthe bong byazhag/pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin du na sgrol mdun ste//b+habyA b+ha kun gyi bla med phyu rgyu 'di//sdig pa thams cad 'jog cing nyon mongs kun/
39a2(rgyud2): nad kun nye bar zhi bar som nyi med//don yod pa'i 'grub pa bla na med kyis//cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub//lug pa gnyis ni mnyam gzhag s+ho//rdo rje'i tshul du
39a3(rgyud2): pad+ma bcing //mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni//mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi//'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste//cho ga zhib mo'i pad+ma lags//pad+ma'i tshul du thel mo
39a4(rgyud2): sbyar//mdzub mos mkhyud le gung mo ni//lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi//don yod zhugs pa'i phyag rgya 'ad//rgya mtsho'i glong gi khi lta bur//rdo rje zla ba nyid kyis
39a5(rgyud2): gasrungs//'di ni las kun bgyid pa'o//grub pa kun gyi bla na med//phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bo gnyis//lcogs sgrog lhag ma bskum nas pad+ma'i tshul//snying
39a6(rgyud2): gnas bzhag pa man sbyin gyi//'di ni dgas mad las kun phyu rgyu logs//lag gnyis pang+gA'i.U tshurate/g.yas g.yon du ni bzhag nas//kun nas
39a7(rgyud2): bzhin du bzhag/byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyi ba ni//zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste//de bzhin kun gyis mi thub pa'o//mthe bong mnyam par mnyam gyis la//sor
39b1(rgyud2): mo'i rtse mo bsgoms pa dang //mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul//rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgyu las//phyag rgya 'di nyid dbusu ni//'khyer lo'i tshul du 'dzub mo bskum//g.yon//
39b2(rgyud2): pa brkyang pa de bang chen gyi//phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms//lcags sgrog dam du bgyis na sr-i ni//lag pa gnyis po brkyang nas kyang //snying dkar bzhag pa'i
39b3(rgyud2): phyag rgya ste//'di ni rgyun tu gau shin+da rje legs//lag pa g.yon pa brkyang na su//sor mo bsgreng ba'i thor to dgugs//g.yas po snying kar bzhag na su//mthe bong dang
39b4(rgyud2): ni mtho chung dgug/lkog ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te//'dri ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste//klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lagaso//lag pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis la//sor mo
39b5(rgyud2): phyeng ga log tu sprul//g.yas pa dang nau g.yon pa dag/sgying ka'i gnas su bzhag bgyi ste//phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi//gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid//lag
39b6(rgyud2): po g.yas pa spyi bor yang //mthe bong mdzub mo dgug bgyis la//lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su//mdzub mo gyen du sgreng bu ni//'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste//thams
39b7(rgyud2): cad du ni las skyob pa'o//phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi//mthe chung sor mo dgug bgyis te//drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di//lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o///
40a1(rgyud2): lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la//blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste//lha min thams cad dgugs pa yi//khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsung
40a2(rgyud2): g.yas pa bi dza pu rar bgyi//g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi//mthe bong mthe chung bskums pa ni//'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa//'do ni drag po'i phyag rgyar
40a3(rgyud2): gsungs//ga yA pa khu tshur bcings nasu//mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni//bkur bstan khu tshur bcings nas bzhug/sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi//drag
40a4(rgyud2): po rgyun tu blta bgyid pa//de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi//gzhon nu phyag rgya 'dri zhes gsungs//gyen du lag pa gnyis sgreng nas//sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyis te/
40a5(rgyud2): mthe bong mdzube mo bkug pa ni//'od zer snying dag 'phro bgyid pa//'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags//phyag rgya 'di nyid ser mo gsum//bkug nas so mo gnyis gnyis

40b1(rgyud2): 'grubyu 'grub par 'gyur//oM pad+ma tA r+ye tA ra yA pad+ma b+hu dzo d+d+ho/oM muh+mA ral+lo shwo ti ga hu ru hu ru swA hA/oMd+h+r-i ku Ti pad+mo ta rat+na ra tAM/oM pad+mo b+hUt+tA ra b+hA s+yai ni kAN+Da kuN+Da swAt+ma/oM
40b2(rgyud2): u mr-i g+hA pad+me ba ra de sid+d+hi sidz+yaM tu hUM/oM sarba tra ga mi ni oM b+hA ma~M/ dr-iN+Di hUM/oM a mo g+han tA r-i tA rA ya pad+d+he b+hU dze hUM/oM dA ru tu ru la pad+ma a mo g+ha hU~M/A~M ba Da ba mu

41a2(rgyud2): phyug rgyu bcings pa bgyis pa nr-i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ste lung bstan pa dang /

41a4(rgyud2): gcig pur 'gyuraro//dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba dang /dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyuraro//tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyuraro//don yod pa'i

41b1(rgyud2): 'dren dang /lha ma yin dang /klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyuraro//rgyal po drang /blon po dang /btsun mo'i

41b3(rgyud2): bar 'gyuraro//nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro//skyon gyi dri ma dang /ser sna dang /phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro//legs par dran zhing lus shin tu

41b5(rgyud2): cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig ces shin tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro//
41b6(rgyud2): dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyuraro//ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyu//'di nis ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur//skye ba
41b7(rgyud2): na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//thams cad du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro//byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'jig rten
42a1(rgyud2): dbang phyug sprul pa yi//phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par bgyid//khru gang kho na'i tshe de dag gi/dkyil 'khor lha mo gyis bri bar bgyi//gang zhig mthong ba'i myod
42a2(rgyud2): gyis//dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur//sdig po kun las grol ba dang //de nyid dag ni 'grub 'gyur//rgyun tu gling gis go tshe yis//rtag tu gro chu bgos par 'gyur//glo
42a3(rgyud2): cha'i go ni 'brar ba dang //mdzes pa rtag tu skyil bar 'gyur//cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste//gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyi//
42a4(rgyud2): gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur//mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun kyang //'jig par 'gyur te some nyi med//gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te//nad kun las kyang de
42a5(rgyud2): bzhin no//pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung dam//myi thub pa'i dgra kun las//rtag tu legs par rgyal bar 'gyur//rtag tu don las srung ba dang //dus kun tu yang 'grub par
42a6(rgyud2): 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang rnams bde bgyi'i phyirare//de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis//phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag//
42a7(rgyud2): dgos pa kun gyi rjes 'thun par//gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur//pad+ma kha byi zhes bgyi ba//pad+ma mdab mas mdzes pa dang //kun nas 'a'o
42b1(rgyud2): bar 'bar bu'i phreng //rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi//phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung //'di nas thams cad 'bras bu stsol//rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mda'//dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje
42b2(rgyud2): dang //pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan//pad+ma rab gnas pad+mo gnyis//rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid//pad+ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du//pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma'i lcags kyus thal mo sbyar//
42b3(rgyud2): pad+ma'i lcags sgrogs pad+ma'i gzeb//rtag tu pad+ma sems pa dang //nor bu pad+ma rdo rjer gsungs//don yod pad+ma de bzhin du//pad+ma'i ril gri pad+ma'i dril//rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun
42b4(rgyud2): shing 'chang //nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/dri bzhin zhags pa gtun shing dang //chu sbyin 'dzin dung 'khor lo byed//bI dze pU ra tu si'u 'bru//zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa
42b5(rgyud2): dang //tho ba 'dzin dang tshims shing dang //me tog phur ma bgrang phreng dang //rdo rje rtse lnga don yod zhags//don yod grub pa de dag ste//thams cad pad+ma'i steng du dgod/
42b6(rgyud2): lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba//gang dang gang du dgod pa ni//lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu thams//'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi//kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi//nor bu'i rgyan
42b7(rgyud2): gyis srubaso par bgyi//dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni//rab 'amo rtsig par bgyis pa 'am//ci yang rung ba de dag ste//de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam//mthong ba
43a1(rgyud2): rnams tshun no//rgyug tu rtog pa thams cad stod//mnang mod gnas su rdzogs pa dang // rdzums ston rgyu//thams ca na cig sa/
43a2(rgyud2): //sems can gA bdun babyidan//me ldog pa sbyi du 'gyur//sems dpa'as cur rlu tu gnas//don bye mi ldog pa gnos//gang dag lakhor mang/
43a3(rgyud2): ni//sbyin dus gags dang mchog sbyin ni//rkyen tu smra zla'i gan rdzogs//klung gis drug N+DI 'dumathong ba//rgyun ma jog sbyin 'ji na dang //rtag tu mngon sum
43a4(rgyud2): /de dang mchu sa ti kye padul nas//gsang sngags sum cu rtsa tshig/rtogo drin pabyed thams ca ba//na dus rnams kun tu yang //na grong ma
43a5(rgyud2): bar mi 'gyu //nim gro la denal 'khor rab myur bar//myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'bruba' gyur//'di dngag med kyi smos pa yis//thu bor 'gyur bar sa ma nyi med//'jig
43a6(rgyud2): rkyen mthon gyi thugs zhi ldanas//skyes smras myig tu thu blor 'gyur//'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang //chos las skyes par lung ston 'byung //gang ga'i klu sA ya
43a7(rgyud2): sang dang mnyam pa'i byem kyi de bzhin gi shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyug/
43b1(rgyud2): tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur//gang gi sug par phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na phyag rgya ni de lta bu'i blan
43b2(rgyud2): ng+ge smrag / ltag gas ni//sa sa mA 'i m+bi mim saswAk+ShaSh+Ta ka.oM hU~M /
43b3(rgyud2): oM sarba ta thA ga ta/a d+hiSh+Ti tAM/d+hi ri d+hi ri hUM/oM pad+me hr-i da ya muSh+Ti hUM/oM bI swa dA bi sa ra sarba mA lAn tA rA dza ya hUM/oM badz+rim+b+ha hu ru su ru hUM/oM a ku shA/
43b4(rgyud2): a mo g+hA A kaR+Sha ya hUM/oM kA paM tsa ma tu ru tu ru hU~M/oM a maM g+h+r-i shaM ka li mI li hUM/oM a maM g+ho tsi ne tA ma? Ni tu ti tu ri hU~M/oM a mo g+hi ma Ni tsi li tsI lI hUM/a~M
43b5(rgyud2): badz+rA tu Ti tsi li hUM/aM a me g+ha hI da ya tsA ra tsa ra shud+d+he satwa hUM/oM g+ho ShA ba ti tsi Ti tsi Te hU~M/oM bid+yA khang ga tsin+di tA ya sha tru nAM hUM/oM tri ma laM pa ri shud+d+ha b+hi Ti b+hi Ti hUM/
43b6(rgyud2): AM su ru su ru hU~M/oM mU Ni ma Ni d+b+h+yAM/oM puSh+Ta ba ti dzA ye ts+tsha/oM bo d+hits+tshit+ta pA shA d+hA ra d+ha rA hUM/oM pad+ma pA sha bi shud+d+he hUM/oM badz+ra ba she b+hu ba tu mu ru muM ruM hUM/oM tsin+d+ra
43b7(rgyud2): ma Ni bo sha ba ra do hUM/oM tsakra pA shisa?/na ra g+ha ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM/au taM shu lI pA sha bi lo ka tA ra yaM hUM/oM nAM ga pA sha b+han d+ha ya kaD+hA ya duSh+Ta na ga na bAM sha bA ta/
44a1(rgyud2): /yAts+tsha/o dz+ha la~Md d+hAr+m+man+d+ha yadz+dza/ts+tshan+d+ra bI ma la ts+lid+d+ha yA An+tak+ShAr ba ts+tsha/ bad+d+ham+mA/ d+d+ho y+YAm+mar+N+Na da d+d+ha/ d+hAH
44a2(rgyud2): tu ri dz+dza/oMd+g+haHmaN+Da li dza ya trUM/oM sataswa ra~M shrI kI N+Te hUM/oM sAH duSh+TA na p+l-ih+ni r+ya shAs+t+ra yA hU~M/oM min nr-i sho d+hi ya mA lA bi ma la~M hUM/oM suSh+Ta byA trI sI
44a3(rgyud2): d+hA ba rits+tsha/oM bI sha sa ha sra gur+b+ho tI k+ShA NA k+ShAr+Nab+h+yAM/A~M badz+rod k+ShA pa su tsI mu khaM tsi Te tsiTi hU~M/oM i mo g+hA A pr-i ti ha ta p+tA she ha sne hUM/oM sarba tra A mo g+hA sid+d+ha
44a4(rgyud2): s+yA d+ha ya~M hUM//lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang //de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgyu dag/lhan cig bzlas pa tsam drang ni//phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kyang //

45a6(rgyud2): ba 'phrog/de ni mod la 'bras bu ste//'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun//phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs//sangs rgyas kun dang shAk+ti yi//rgyal po de bzhin gyi bye
45a7(rgyud2): pas brlabs//de lta bas na mkhas pas su//b+hag tu kun nas mtshon bcangs na//sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te//sras kyi the bor som nyi med//phyag rgya rim
45b1(rgyud2): spyo dam na ba kyang //'dug rgyun mgon pa'i sgras kyi mthu por 'gyur//don yod nags pa'i snying po gsad pa yi//rnam pa rlon ltung po blun mod/kur+b+ha dang
45b2(rgyud2): goseng sngags dam pa dge/'di 'tshang ba la myur du grub par 'gyur//de nis don yod pa las thams cad pa dang //rje su 'thun pa'i zhags pa bdun pa shed par bgyi ste/de
45b3(rgyud2): grub pas ji lta bu yi//cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin//so so so sor 'tsham pa yi//de dag kun ni rtogs par bad+mo//de nyid grub pa'i ji lta bu'o//mtshad nyid gzugs ni
45b4(rgyud2): bzhin pa//de nyid bsgrubs pa zhugs pa ni//smad pa lnga lus 'grub 'gyur te//gsang sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni//grub phyir 'gyur te si ma nyi med//ras sgyu dpa d+ma'i slad
45b5(rgyud2): pa dang //An khe tsho da dag gi//skud na pa'i myed pa ste//smad pa 'di dag la nas de kho na nyid kyi cho ga dang /che gzhi ba mo sgrub pas zhugs pas ras skud kyi rgyu la
45b6(rgyud2): te/rgyud byazhin bkal nas rtag tu bsnyid bya bgyis la legs par bkrus pa/gos gtsang mnan tshangs par spyod pas zas dag rigasum 'tshal nas gnas gcong ma'i
45b7(rgyud2): srin na yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o//de nas non tu mnyam par gzhig pas brgyad sgril du ga la to donas
46a1(rgyud2): po thal mo sbyar bas pad+ma kha phye ba thogs pa/ralnga pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/rgyan thams cad kyi klubs pa'i lus phyed sor bzhi pa'i tshad
46a2(rgyud2): du bgyi'o//bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/nges pa'i gzugs dang /khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang /khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/dngul lam gser las

46a4(rgyud2): 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i chos bco lnga 'am/chos brgyad la legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag cig mchi ste/skyil mo krung bcas nas sangs rgyas la
46a5(rgyud2): mchod pa rnams pa sna tshogs bgyis te/tshig gzhan mi smra bar zhags pa la lin stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /stan bzang

46b1(rgyud2): yang dbul bar dgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang bris yungs kur la lan ny+dzi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o//'phags pa spyan ras

48a1(rgyud2): g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pas bzung nus don yod pa'i zhugs pa'i snying po la nu brgya rtswa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nu mi gda'

48a7(rgyud2): yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang /zhags pa bcings te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phangs na de dag thams cad
48b1(rgyud2): dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa dang /rang gi dpung dang /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad dang /phas kyi rgol ba dang /mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//
48b2(rgyud2): 'jigs pa dang /yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa thams cad dang /mi nges chen po dang /mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//ha cang char che ba dang /
48b3(rgyud2): dus ma lags pa'i char dang /grang ba dang /rlung dang /tsha ba mi bzang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro//dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po

48b5(rgyud2): byar yang bgyi'o//mchod pa dang /gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te//de lnga yid gnyis dang som nyid bskyed par mi bgyi'o//
48b6(rgyud2): cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyis cho ga de bzhin du sgrub par bgyi'o//de nas skad cig de'i modo la thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//
48b7(rgyud2): byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o//sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
49a1(rgyud2): dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o//dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang /bla mar yid/
49a2(rgyud2): la sgom par bgyi'o//mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongasu dag pa'i ngang tshul can du sgom par bgyi'o//don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub

70b5(rgyud2): b+hu dzau saM hA sra ne tra/nA nAd b+hU ta/pra bA rIt+tha/mudr-i bi b+hu Shi tA sa ha swa b+hu dza/dzaM ya dza ya/shI ta sa ha sa rish+mi pra ti mat+k+r-i taM sha rI ra/b+ha ra b+ha ra/bi tsi tra/AM b+ha ra Na d+ha ra/
70b6(rgyud2): ma Ni kan ka/badz+re bain+duR+ya/ma ra ki ta/in dra ni lai pad+ma rA ga b+hU Shi te shA rI ra/tsi ri tsi ri/bi tsi tA/tsa ra NAM/ma hA bo d+hi sar+b+ba be radA pr-i hA/briSh+Ta ma he shwa ra rU pA d+ha ra/
70b7(rgyud2): pad+me shwa ra lo ke shwa ra/a nan+te shwa ra/ya ma ba ru NaM/ke bai ra ra Shi ga NaM ku mA ra/se nA ba ti bi Sha d+ha ra/d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+ha ri d+hi rI/d+hu ru d+hu ru/ma hA da b+hU ta bi Sha d+ha ra/
71a1(rgyud2): sarba ta thA ga ta a bi ShA nak+tA sa ma ya nu sma ra b+ha ga bana?/pU ra ya ya A tA shrAn+ta ra ya b+hA ra na/shA ya ya sat+kA/ta ra dza ya duSh+Ta nA bA ta yA bIg+h+na na//
71a2(rgyud2): mA ra yA trid+ho shAm+b+ha la/sA ri sa ra/b+hu paM/d+hId+h+waM d+hA/phaT phyiT phaT+Ta/sid+d+ha sid+d+haM/maHtsini d+d+hi muH/a maM g+ha b+h+ra sha d+hA ra/sA d+ha ya sA d+ha yA/bi pu la sid+d+ha/
71a3(rgyud2): ma ma tri b+hu ba na de byA pra yats+tsha ma hA kA tu Ni ka/br-i d+hI bud+d+ha/b+ho d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/so bo d+ha yaye/si bo d+ha ya/mahA pa shu pa ti pA shA d+ha rA/a nan+ti ba kur bAn/ri d+hI
71a4(rgyud2): sad+d+ha R+Sha yai/tA ru tu ru/ti ra ta ra/ga ga ne bi puM laM baM mA na/san d+ha r-i Shi ka/na mr-i stu te bi bu la pu N+ya ko Sha d+hi ra/mahA e mo g+ha sid+d+he hUM hUM/a b+hi ShIny+tsi tu mAM/
71a5(rgyud2): pI puM le kIrti ka re swA hA/b+hu ba swA hA/b+hu ra b+hu ba s+yAhA/a mo g+ha bi pu le swAhA/ma hA tsi naM tA ma Ni sid+d+he swA hI/ma hA tse na tA ma Ni sid+d+he ba ra dau s+thit+saM/sarba sad+d+hiM bai ra dai swAhA/
71a6(rgyud2): au bi pu li shra da/lo kaM shwa re/ma dA tsin+ni ma Ni/ma hA a mo g+ha sid+d+he hUM phaT swA hA/don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag
71a7(rgyud2): tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'ber bar 'gyuraro//don yod pa'i zhigs pa lag pas mnan nan mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro//sgyu
71b1(rgyud2): ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyuraro//'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'ang bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs
71b2(rgyud2): dang bcas/'khor dang bcas/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/
71b3(rgyud2): bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag ti mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod po'i sprin chen por gnas
71b4(rgyud2): par 'gyur ro//bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin geshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags 'chang la legaso zhes bgyi bsnol bar 'gyuraro//rig
71b5(rgyud2): sngags 'chad des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//gal te rig sngags 'chang na mkha' las 'bebs par
71b6(rgyud2): 'tshal na de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur//'on te mi 'tshal na na mkha' de nyid na na mkha' la grub pa dang /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don
71b7(rgyud2): rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur//dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongasu bskom
72a1(rgyud2): bar 'gyuraro//cho bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyuraro//'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur//'jig rten dbang phyug
72a2(rgyud2): dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyuraro//'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyuraro//lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i
72a3(rgyud2): mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyuraro//mchod pa'i 'o su yang 'gyuraro//lha thams cad
72a4(rgyud2): kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyuraro//thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyuraro//gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi
72a5(rgyud2): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang /lha dang
72a6(rgyud2): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lnga mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la

72b3(rgyud2): gtong bar 'tshol ba 'am/nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/gtsang mas gos gtsang mo bgos nas ci 'byor pas
72b4(rgyud2): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang /bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o//dbus mo gtsugs
72b5(rgyud2): te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o//yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o//'phags

73b1(rgyud2): nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang dge ba'i rgyu ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro//dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams

75a1(rgyud2): kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong pa 'am/dge slong ma'am/dge bsnyen pa 'am/dge bsnyen ma dang pa'i rjesu 'byung ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid/
75a2(rgyud2): brjod par bgyid/klog par bgyid/'dod par bgyid/sems par bgyid/sgom par bgyid/mchod par bgyid/'dre bar bgyid/'drir 'jug par bgyid na de nges par bla

75a4(rgyud2): ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rje su 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//gzungs 'di nyin re shig kun chub

75b2(rgyud2): blangs te/lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur nas gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/mtshan ma yeb nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyan par ji lta ba bzhin

75b5(rgyud2): 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur//mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur//nyon mongs pa dang /nye ba'i skyon thams cad sangs par 'gyur ro//
75b6(rgyud2): 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal ni zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o//gtsang mas gos gcung ma
75b7(rgyud2): bgo bar bgyi'o//gtsang ma'i gaunas sam phyogasu ba'i lci ba ste ba'i rnam lngas yongasu sbyar bar bgyi'o//gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbusu drare dkyil 'khor bgyi'o//

76a2(rgyud2): par phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po ba shams te shin tu mnyam par go zhug pas zhags pa skal 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o//dbus

76b7(rgyud2): cang gda' bar 'gyur te/de la the tshom dang /yid gnyis dang /som nyi mi bgyi ste/dngos po de na yod gzhan du mi 'gyur//char mi 'bab pa'i dusu klu'i gnasu nor bu
77a1(rgyud2): bzhag na ma 'tshal bar char rtswa dz+nyAn 'bab par 'gyur//hA cang char ches na namapa' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chung bar 'gyur//DUn
77a2(rgyud2): 'char kar nyi ma la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro//zla ba ches pa la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgur thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid//
77a3(rgyud2): rgyu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//nags khung du bstan ni sman gyi rdzas thams cad ring gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'bru

77a5(rgyud2): der 'byung bar 'gyur//ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan te/spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhig na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshen kyis 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyi
77a6(rgyud2): mdun na mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang las thams cad bgyid por 'gyuraro//rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/blon po'i
77a7(rgyud2): tshogs dang bcas pa/btsun me'i 'khor dang bcas pa/dbyig dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shang ka shi la dang /byi ru dang /sa li sbram

84a1(rgyud2): bAr ri mo'i gzugs//rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs bal zhing //'gas pa ri gzugs ni sna tshog dang //de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang //ribo sngags

84b3(rgyud2): de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/sgrib pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid pa/
84b4(rgyud2): dgra thams cad 'joms pa//bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa//gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog/sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa//dmyal ba'i
84b5(rgyud2): sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/'jigs pa mi bzud pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog phra/mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa/pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog/
84b6(rgyud2): nad thams cad 'joms pa med la 'thab pa dang /'thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/yams kyi na dang danod
84b7(rgyud2): pa 'joms pa/lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid/
85a1(rgyud2): pa/sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba/lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob 'gyur
85a2(rgyud2): ba/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs pa ro som nyi ma mchis pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/dus kun tu shin tu mnyam
85a3(rgyud2): par gzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sprin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas/blon po dang bcas pa srung ba'i
85a4(rgyud2): don du thams cad du rtag tu rje su 'bring bar 'gyur lags so//de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnasu mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te//
85a5(rgyud2): gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam//ca com michis dben par ni//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o//zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi//don du sdig
85a6(rgyud2): pa thams cad 'joms//rgyas pa rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te/thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur//dag dang log 'dren gdug pa dang /gnod srin srin po gsang ba pa//
85a7(rgyud2): gdug sems can rnams dred pa dang /skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul sprod//gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste/gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla na mod//'jig rten
85b1(rgyud2): 'jig rten pha rol gyi//sbyin srog gi ni las bgyi'o//me lha'i lha dang ku dag dang //de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa 'ang dgug/khung bad+mos dri la pad+ma'i tshul/pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi//chog
85b2(rgyud2): ji bzhin khung nang gi/pad+mo la ne ge sar bgyi//gru bzhi 'am ni zlum paM ste//dri lta bur ni bad+mo bar bgyi//legs par byugs shring shin tu gnag/shin tu spras shing tshad la dbab
85b3(rgyud2): tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang //shin tu bkra shosaM dag la bigyi//bkra shIs phyag rgya chen po dang //bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi'o//bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/
85b4(rgyud2): bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod//thog mar me lha bkug nas ni//de nas sbyin srog las rnams bgyi//rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa//legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos
85b5(rgyud2): bgos nas//gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi//de la 'tshams kyang brjod bur bgyi//bdage srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang //gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang //
85b6(rgyud2): de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang //rgyun tu u ka'i shring sbar te/dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang //mor drang yungs kar 'bras yos drag/nyi shu gcig dngul mo
85b7(rgyud2): tog bgyi//de nas mo yaM lha dgug//oM na mo ag+ni dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/dz+yod sne pra b+hA/maN+Da la/sar+b+ba bid It+ma ti/pra hU ti rak+ti ni rata tuSh+Ta dz+wa la/d+hu ma shwas
86a1(rgyud2): a tsiShAM mu kha tIk+She/ra sh+lid pa ag+nI shru bi tu taSh+Ta hU ta shun mu kha na? te/sar+b+ba dwe bA nAM/sar+b+bA yak+Sha ma t+sa baiR+ya ma hA dza ya/ma t+ta bA la ni ra ma r-i shan//
86a2(rgyud2): sar+b+ba da ha na bA pu la Aka sha sa mu gdi ki sh+tsa oM ba pra swa kI shan/maN+Da laM b+hu dzi to/me ni ta sar+b+bA tra daM bye rU pe bi ShI ra da I b+h+r-i hA na sar+b+baM tA gAn/dre ba hU~M te/shan hu tra/
86a3(rgyud2): shan ta ma si bi d+ha ma kan+ma/an d+ha kA rAn/muk+Sha rIshrI ma pra yaM kugan d+ha pheM lA ha ra/sa ra sA re/a gr-i dza/s+yASh+mA su tIk+taM sh+tsa mr-i tAM sin dzi bi nau/prI yo bAsh+ma puSh+Ta
86a4(rgyud2): bAsla bstA tsa ba sma bas+thA ni/saM bkam/ba smA sats+tshe d+hi ni d+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/dzA yA se/ba ke sid+d+ha ra sa d+hA ra sa grA tsau ra~M sir+b+be tra~M pra dz+nyo bai ri shwA/sArba tri nai ra ma ri sha/
86a5(rgyud2): nr-i t+ya smiSh+TaM d+haSh+Ta ni mun+ti tsa si d+hA tra shra/b+ha ba ni de pa ag+ni/mu khA de bI taM/a ru tsi ru dz+nyA ba la ba dra kaM mAhA na ta/ai tha pa ra No//daM bra de be ni/bi shA ra da a yAn tu sA
86a6(rgyud2): d+ha ya tid tAM ti/oM dz+wa la dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sa ma ya na/hu ru tu rU hUM phaT swA hA//gsang sngags 'dis ni lin+da bdun du//bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi//gu gul yungs
86a7(rgyud2): kar mar sbyar ba//spar bdun spar bas me la dbul//mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang //de bzhin spar ba'i sper bas so//dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang //bdug
86b1(rgyud2): brgya chen dbul bar bgyi//de bzhin 'bras bu spar bar dbul//de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi//ji ltar lha rnams ram bzhin du//nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi//de nas rig sngags
86b2(rgyud2): 'tshong gi su//sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag baN+Dim//dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang //brag sha u dumaM ba ra dang //sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang //kAr nI ka ra nyid dag dang //pad+ma
86b3(rgyud2): ud pa la thang shing dang //de bzhin dri badra'i tsan dan dang //byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang //'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang /sha mi shi ba'i las lags pas/mchod
86b4(rgyud2): yon de bzhin rtsa dag ste//de dag gis ni mai sbar nas//sbyin sreg gi ni las dgyi'o//'bras yos tsan den phyi ma dang //u ga ru dang du ru skra//kun tu ru la sogs pa
86b5(rgyud2): dang //du ru skar bcas spre ka dang //spang spos pri yang gu blangs te//de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing //mar ram mor sar lan cig brdzi//don yong rgyal po'o gsang sngags
86b6(rgyud2): ni/brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gro mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o//lan stong rtsa brgyad chang ba dang /nam
86b7(rgyud2): phyang nam lha rang gi gzugs 'brab shin tu gnas pa longs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro
87a1(rgyud2): dun rig sngags 'chang legs lagaso//bad sa tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin srog gi chag grub kyis mchog slodas shig drung thams cad /
87a2(rgyud2): sbyin no//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi ste/ji ltar bsrungs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid//de nas rig sngags 'cha
87a3(rgyud2): gos mchod yon gyi snod dag dbul ba'i las bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i grong bu chen po dag gis sprin sreg bgyi zhing 'bras bu'i shing la spar
87a4(rgyud2): nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhigo lus phyed tsam phyung nis dngul gyi gzhong pa

87a6(rgyud2): sngags 'chang gis lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyuraro//na mkha'i rig sngags kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro//bskal
87a7(rgyud2): pi bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyuraro//gal te snod mi len na
87b1(rgyud2): de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na tsher g.yo bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na rig sngags 'chang la dbugs
87b2(rgyud2): 'byin par bgyid de rig sngags 'chang leg so legs so//reg sngags 'chang khyod kyis skyon sreg gi cho ga de bsgrubs zin gyis mchog slongs shig dang sbyin ni zhes de'i tshe rig
87b3(rgyud2): sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/rang gi

87b6(rgyud2): yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho gra zhib mo'i rgyal po////bam po drug pa//gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam
87b7(rgyud2): pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro//gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khri phrag dat+ta stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis
88a1(rgyud2): kyi bye ma dang nyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal mod khang don yod pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//rin po che sna bdun gyi gna' med khang ri dang //

88a3(rgyud2): gyi me tog/kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog drag go/gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /ta ma la dang tsam
