88a5(rgyud2): dang /bskyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid
88a6(rgyud2): du mchis par 'gyuraro//lha'i chu klung dang /'bab chu dang /steng ka dang /rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri chab kyis yongasu gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal

88b1(rgyud2): bdU 'gyur ro//lha'i bu mau dang /mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang /dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar 'gyis pa/lha dang /lha ma yin dang /dri za dang /klu dang /rig 'dzin dang /mi'am
88b2(rgyud2): ci'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing lha'i 'byor pa'i gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/dga' bar bgyid/dga' mgur spyod par 'gyu
88b3(rgyud2): byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas byang chubo la mchis kyi bar dang /chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba nas yongasu mya ngan 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do//de
88b4(rgyud2): bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug go bar du rtag tu rjesu 'bang bar 'gyur te/da ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i

89a2(rgyud2): rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lag so//klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtags par rgyun tu mchis

89a6(rgyud2): dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyuraro//

91a5(rgyud2): thug pa sgrub par bgyi ste/gnas gtsang ma bcom bskyangs par shing ka ra bi ri'i lcug mas bkrus cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/

91b1(rgyud2): bar bgyi'o//de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o//de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /skyes

113a7(rgyud2): cho ga rdzog so///de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
113b1(rgyud2): rnam par grol ba dekyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/'di ni ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur//chos grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang /
113b2(rgyud2): shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la//legs por khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgro/byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag/sems can kun la brtse bya da //snying rje dam
113b3(rgyud2): pas rgyan pa dang //don yod zhugs pa rig sngags tsho//grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgya'o//bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag/'grub par bgyid som nyi med//'jib
113b4(rgyud2): rten blo ma'i snying po dag/de bzhin grang dag rtag brjod na//lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyis phyag na pud+ma rtag tu 'gyur//ji ltar gang ba'i de snyed kyi//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
113b5(rgyud2): stong lnga//bsod nams phung po khri phrag spyod//dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang //sangs rgyas bya ba bgyod par 'gyur//bsnyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gtsog/mkhas
113b6(rgyud2): dri'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa//dge slong pa dang dge slong ma//dge bsnyen pho mos de bzhin du//da ba can du myur bu mchi//sdug bsngal mI bzung myong 'gyur ba'i/
113b7(rgyud2): mongs pa las zer bar 'gyur//rtag tu sangs rgyas bying sems dang//mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med//de nas don yod zhigs pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin
114a1(rgyud2): du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par brgyu ste/bzlas brjod kyi ni lus bgyis na//rig sngags 'chang ba de nyi 'grub/don yod zhags pa'i gzugs
114a2(rgyud2): brnyan gyi//mdun du ba lci'i dkyil 'khor bgyi//gru bzhi kho re khor yug tu//tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis//gru bzhi lhag par thig gdab bo//ngos bzhi rnams
114a3(rgyud2): sgo bzhi dag/dbus nas ngos bzhir ba shisu dbab//tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni//dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dag/mdab brgya gur gum gyis gtor cing //pad+ma'i ze
114a4(rgyud2): ba'i dkyil dag tu//ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni//spos chab kyis ni bkang pa yis//yungs kar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi//a ga ru yaM bdug pa dbul//bum pa grang
114a5(rgyud2): ba dgod par bgyi//me tog sna tshogs rgyan par bgyi//mchod yon snod kyang bzhi bzhag go/rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par//gcing ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi//
114a6(rgyud2): legs bkras rnam par dag pi dang //gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang //dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal na su//dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o//dus gsum bzlas brjod
114a7(rgyud2): bgyi ba ni//don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad//'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te//ba
114b1(rgyud2): badz+ra phyug rgyu btsongs nas//daglang brod drug ni blang bar 'gro//ma khyA ma dag nI mthe bo dag/brkyang nas kyi dadul ba yi//yid kyis byams san+na sa mnyam par gzhag/
114b2(rgyud2): 'dzin brten pas lus snyoms ber//legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta//tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi//bzlas brjod bgyis patsam gyi mad las chen po g.yo bar
114b3(rgyud2): 'gyur//ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis na sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyuraro//brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o//sems can thams cad
114b4(rgyud2): la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa zhabs pa mthong ba tsam du bris la/ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlaso//lan bdun
114b5(rgyud2): bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po goyo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur//

114b7(rgyud2): lta bar bgyi ste/gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g.yas pa nas legaso zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar
115a1(rgyud2): 'gyur//mig bskur bar bgyid cing kun tu leg so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung rig sngags 'chang gis sgribs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nAs lus

115a3(rgyud2): bA'i 'o su 'gyuraro//lus 'jam pa dang /shin tu gzhon sha chagaso ba dang mnyon par 'gyur ro//skra cung zad 'khyol ba dang mnyen po dang /snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyuraro//
115a4(rgyud2): mig yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/lus yong su dag pa dang /yid yongasu dag pa dang /gnyer mA dang /sgra skye bo spangs par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad la lta
115a5(rgyud2): ba drag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur//ji tsam du 'dug ce na/phyags pa spyan ras gzigs drabang phyug rang gri gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par
115a6(rgyud2): bgyid de/lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nus mtshig thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro//na mkha' la mchi ba 'am/mi granga' bar bgyi ba 'am/lha'i mig 'thob pa 'o ma/sangs
115a7(rgyud2): rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa 'am/gzungs rab tu 'thob pa 'am/don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhi mo 'grub pa 'am/gtsug lag

115b5(rgyud2): pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro//dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur//ji ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongasu skyong bar 'gyur ro//mtshams ma mchis bA lnga/

116a3(rgyud2): rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o//zas dkar gsum 'tshal bur bgyi'o//rigs kyi bu po 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yiyan lag

116b1(rgyud2): 'byung po dang /shA za dang /gradon dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa dang /phas kyi rgol ba dang /mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyuraro//chos brgyad dmya/bcu bani/

117a1(rgyud2): 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro//pad+ma sbyang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa rtseg ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas rang gi lus
117a2(rgyud2): rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'chal ni rAg sngags 'chang des smos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/byang

117b7(rgyud2): gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/'od dpag mod kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/thams cad ring bsrel dang bcos par dkyi
118a1(rgyud2): ste rwa'i steng gi pad+ma'i spyan la mchis par dgyi'o//gcad mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig mchis

119b1(rgyud2): yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na da ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dpe ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro//de la lha thams cad dang /

120a3(rgyud2): la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad yid la byas te/yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod

120b2(rgyud2): brgya rje brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa spyan rami gzigs dang de phyag ru gi gzugs kyi mdun na bzhugs te/pad+mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhegs
120b3(rgyud2): pasbyin par mdzad cing /dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad//rgyal ba 'od dpag med log so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad//gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
120b4(rgyud2): trug bai srung bstan pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa bskrun par 'gyur//lha thams cad dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang /

154a1(rgyud2): ba bar/b.rad+hA s+ya//sam+b+han+tu u rma ka ste/mahA bad+d+hA sa/bar dngad+ma sa na pat+sa glo'u ra/dz+wA ladz+wa la/sar+b+batwAnA gAt+yA a bi She ka/aH
154a2(rgyud2): ShAkrA ste/ma hA kA ru Ni k+Sha/ba la ba la/mAts+tsha be ga d+ha raM/biM kri tA na ya na/daMSh+T+rA kai rA laM mit+s+ya tAM dzi/d+hu ra d+d+ha/pi pu la dza ne ba re da/mar+g+haM k+ShA ruM NI k+ta ya/mad+hA pa shud
154a3(rgyud2): pa ti bo d+ha ra/sar si ra/pra bar bud+d+ha saM b+h+re ra/su gA tu d+h+waM ni sa mAd+d+ha/saM man+ta e ba li~M kita/A~M shA rAmA hi shwa ra/duSh+Ta da ma//r-i dri pra la daM ma ka/kr-i d+ha rA dzi ma

154a6(rgyud2): binA shA na ka rA/ mai tI tsit+ta ma hA kAR+Sho NIk+Sha/par+yA pU ra/ba ri pUr+Na maN+Da li/saum+b+ha mu She/Sha Ta pA ra mi twA pa ri pU ra ka/mi li mi l-i/a Na ye tsarmaM ni ba san
154a7(rgyud2): mr-i ta ye/d+hu ra d+hir/sar+b+bAts+tshinaN+Di a tha la ki tA/ni NA~MHshU la d+hA rau/bing+ku dz+wa la d+hi raM/a la~M g+hA thA sha haste/ya ma b.ru/ku ba ra t+na b+he d+ha ra/nAn na
154b1(rgyud2): /s+t+rai lo kya ba shaM ka ra/sar+b+ba satwa bI shad+d+ha kA/bi d+hA satwA bA rA dA/sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta

176b2(rgyud2): kI dang skang spos bcas//bI ya? gu bcas tuR+YA s+t+wa~M//ka ya s+thA dang ba yas//na ma ru dang zla skang bcas//ru tra ya~M ga ru nag nyid//ga bur dang ni gla rtsi nyid//l-i ka gas

176b4(rgyud2): nyid//nA ku lI dri nA ku lI//tshangs pa'i dang ku mu ding //pad+ma'i chu ba sbrang rtsi dang //bu ra ma dkar po'i khu ba dang /'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi//bdug pa'i mchog

197b3(rgyud2): rgyas pa dang /mngoni spyod la sogs pa bstan par bgyi/gang gis bdag mngon gsum du mdun na 'dug par ci zhig gis shes par bya zhe na/rnam pa gsum gyis shes

197b5(rgyud2): mchog tu smra zhing so sor khyad par du byed pa'o//kha nas ud pa la'i dri dang ldan pa'i rlung gnas pa dang /lus las kyang gla rtsi'i dri gnas pas te/'on kyang 'jig su rung ba'i
197b6(rgyud2): gzugs la shin tu dpal gyis 'bor bar byed do//des na rig sngags 'chang gis gzhan nam/'jig rten gyi rigs bzhi po gang yang rung ba 'di 'phags pa spyan ras

198a3(rgyud2): yongasu btang bar mi bgyi'o//des mchog sbyin pa la ltos par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das rdzun du smra ba de'i dngos grub yang dag par rje su ma mthong zhing lha rnams de

321a5(rgyud2): kyi sngags//oM su ru su ru kr-i b+ha ba ti swA hA/gtor mo'i sngag so//oM meN+Te pad+mA aM sh+tsi ni sA d+ha ya hUM/gtor mo zer gzhug pa'i sngag so//oM pha la bi shud+d+he/pra b+hA ra hUM/'bras bu'i sngags/

366b2(rgyud2): na/rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyur ro//mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang /wa dang /khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyuraro//sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ba thams cad 'bar
366b3(rgyud2): la ma he'i gzugs can du sna ngo //shi ba'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byedado//thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyags phan tshun rgyug par byedado//lamo gyis bzhir mdor/
366b4(rgyud2): gtor na gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'byung ba thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid mtsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khodo//nyon gcig bzhin bdag nyid la
366b5(rgyud2): gtor na mchod po chen po'i gnasu 'gyur te/gzhan yang rang bzhin gyi blo rnams kyis las 'bum snyed byed//don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o///
366b6(rgyud2): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po////bam po bco brgyad pa/de nas de'i phyir gdugs pa chen po dang /lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad//
366b7(rgyud2): par bya ste/gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang /phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du ston to//rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che//rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang //de bzhin rta no rgod ma'i kha/
367a1(rgyud2): bdud d+hi'i byol ldan gzugs pa che//lakA 'dren rnams ni rab 'joms dang //khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan//ke laT ki la'i rgyal po che//zla 'char
367a2(rgyud2): pa stobs po che//de bzhin rdo rjes 'og gzugs//rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang //klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs dang //sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang //de bzhin thogs khro khros chen
367a3(rgyud2): dang //de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dang //rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgroka/sgra yi dbang po stobs kyis gnon//mgon pa gos sngon gyon pa dang //dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal
367a4(rgyud2): ba dang //'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma'i lte//phyog nA pad+ma pad+ma byug/de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang //de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten blo//sna tshogs gzugs sto bza
367a5(rgyud2): po dang //sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang //drag po deN+Di dbang phyug dang //nag po chen po gzhon nu dang //gshin rje dang ni tshu lho nyid//nyi mo dang ni zla ba dang //rgyu skar sgra gcan
367a6(rgyud2): mjug rings dang //de bzhin bza' dang lha ma yin//nam khe lding dang mi 'am ci//gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che//'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu//de bzhini yul skyeng mig
367a7(rgyud2): mi bzang //'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang //mi'u thung dang ni drang srong gzugs//nor bu bzeng sras gang ba bzang //sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang //rgyal po dang ni
367b1(rgyud2): ded dpon dang //tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang //bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang //dge sbyong stag dang seng+ge dang //khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha//shing lha de bzhin lo rtog lha//
367b2(rgyud2): gang+ga sI ta ya mun//zla ba skal ldan ru sbal nya//lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can//skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang //me tog rgya rlabs chen po dang //sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tsho/
367b3(rgyud2): de ltar dgugs pa bstan pa dang //de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid//sprin sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis//rgyu 'phrul slad byung gsang sngags grub//rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub//
367b4(rgyud2): don yod zhag pa sgrub pa'i phyir//de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa//mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang //lha yi gnas dang de bzhin grong //grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i dod //

367b6(rgyud2): bu go cha gyon pa dang //de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong //khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang //de nyid rmad du byung ba ste//rdzas nyung sbar ba nyung gyur kyang //de nyid dngos grub bla na mod//
367b7(rgyud2): sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas//bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad//rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub//dbul po rnams na nar 'thob cing //sdang ba
368a1(rgyud2): rnams ni byams par bgyid//mu stegs gzhan rnams dad par bgyid//mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid//gdul dka' rnams ni thar bar 'tshal//dag
368a2(rgyud2): slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob//ting 'dzin bla na med pa 'thob//chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong //sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig/mi rigs byas rnams thar

368a5(rgyud2): cad med la spong bgyid de//de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni//bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags//'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das//don gyi dngos grub bla na med//gang/

387b7(rgyud2): 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing //d+ha ra b+ha'i stan la skyil krung du//shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya//byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste//don yod rgyal po dran bya bzhin//
388a1(rgyud2): snga dro'i dus su sbyin bsreg bya//gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing //spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni//phye ma bred dus su bya'o//gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs
388a2(rgyud2): la//sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang //grub pa kun du cho ga yi//bdag nyid dbang bskur mi kun gyi//sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs//kun tu gnas ni thams cad ni//
388a3(rgyud2): rgyas pa gnas mchog rwa gcig dang //gar gre de bzhin phur bu dang //mdun na 'don pa me lha ni//sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten pa//mtshungs shes ston pas lung bstan to//
388a4(rgyud2): 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa//rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang //phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang //bye ba 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang //mnyam pa pas kyang lhag pa nyid/
388a5(rgyud2): de yi sgron sreg byed pa la//de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis brlob/ga lA ti zhag bdun dus gsum du//de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni//mi lA sbyin sreg byed pa la//mad
388a6(rgyud2): la mngon shes lnga theb ces//de skad 'jig rten 'dron pa gsum//las ni byas nas de nas ni//sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya//sreg blugs sbyin srog byas tsam gyis//
388a7(rgyud2): las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/lha rnams rtag tu 'ang 'gyur zhing //de bzhin gshegs kun dgyed par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni//maud la mthong ba'i sbyin
388b1(rgyud2): par mdzad//sdig pa dmas cad sreg par 'gyur/shin tu mi bzad sngon gyis las//blugs nam gyis mod la sreg/'bar ba'i mo yis phye lob bzhin//de la sogs pa'i sdig pa ni/
388b2(rgyud2): sdig 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med//snang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang //mi bzad pas kyi dbri rnams dang //phor ba dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid//de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung //
388b3(rgyud2): de kun sbyin sregs byas tsam gyi//mi gnang bar 'gyur the tshom med//de bzhin mi ngas gtsang kun dang //nad kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//mu ga'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang //
388b4(rgyud2): sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis 'jig/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang //de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren dang //sha za brjed byed yi dgas dang //de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs

388b6(rgyud2): thams cad ni//kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin//rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa nyid//btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni//rtag par kun tu gasngal bar ni//mi 'jigs sbyin par
388b7(rgyud2): the tshom med//rtag tu nad med 'gyur ba dang //dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang //lus can dag ni thams cad la//rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas//rtag tu me yi lha nyid ni//
389a1(rgyud2): rgyun tu mthong bar 'dod pa yi//me la sbyin sreg sa tsam gyis//me lha nyid ni bzhugs b+hAr tI//rtag tu lngas na thams cad mdzad//rgyun tu phyi ba

514b5(rgyud2): dang byad stems dang /gsang sngags dang /phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad la dri dang bsros pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad yongasu bzlas pa byos la bkru bar bya ste/bkrus pa tsam gyi
